column2:
>

 

Entirely made with a technical polymer that guarantees, at the same time, great strength and rigidity of the poles and excellent flexibility of the arms, Pluvi is an ultra durable, lightweight and colorful umbrella, with exceptional resistance when subjected to wind stress and a weight of only 265 grams.

>

 

The stretcher, designed to last thousands of opening and closing cycles, is made of a single piece of flexible material with integrated joints.
column3:
>

 

Unlike traditional umbrellas, which are made up of a multitude of pins and rigid rods that break easily, our particular patented geometry allows it to flex elastically, avoiding deformation and damage.
column4:
>

 

The number of components has been considerably reduced, from over 130 in traditional umbrellas to just 24 in Pluvi. The assembly has been simplified by replacing the traditional screws and hinges with long-lasting snap-fit, increasing the overall reliability of the umbrella.

column2:
>

 

The handle and the shaft have been designed to take full advantage of the high flexibility of the whole umbrella when it is subjected to wind stress.
column3:
>

 

The canvas, made with a high density micro fiber Pongee 210T fabric, ensures a high degree of water repellency that allows water droplets to quickly slip away and performs an important protective function by shielding 95% of UVA and UVB rays.

column1: We compared Pluvi, in terms of Durability and Flexibility, with traditional umbrellas of the same Price Range.

Few components to minimize the chances of failure and all produced by the same injection moulding technology. Our unique technical polymer, used for every single element of the umbrella, has been specifically developed to be easily recovered and reused for the manufacturing of new products.
column2:
> 

Perfectly suitable for a complete cradle-to-cradle system or an alternate version made from zero-impact biodegradable polymers.

column1: Pluvi is an umbrella with a modern look and attractive colors, combining sustainability with Italian style.
column2:
>

 

For those who are looking for something practical and stylish or simply as a useful original gift.

column1: Traditional Umbrellas are made of many rigid metal parts not suitable to withstand the stress of the wind.  Once broken it’s almost impossible to repair and the recycling of the materials turns out to be difficult and very expensive.
column2:
>

 

The data collected by the International Trade Center states that over 2.5 Million umbrellas per day are imported by the major countries in the world
column3: since the global market is stable, this means that:
column4:
>

 

If we consider that in a traditional umbrella (average weight of 350 grams) there are approximately 280 grams of metal and almost 1 square meter of fabric, this means that:
column5:
>

 

Let’s put these numbers in perspective:

column2: at present Pluvi is in the pre-series production phase utilizing temporary moulds. This is a truly passionate project for our team and we are here to ask for your support in making it a success.
column3:
>

 

With your help we can shine a light on a fresh design and a new solution and introduce an umbrella that is fully recyclable and can actually improve the environment.

Before starting this project we asked ourselves, ""Is there one bag that can replace all bags?"" We searched everywhere but could not find anything.

More than a year later we've come up with the solution. The Adjustable Bag aims to replace all bags. 

With 3 sizes and 12 configurations, The Adjustable Bag is the only bag you need. You'll never have to go through the hassle of switching between different bags again.

The Adjustable Bag can instantly expand or contract to fit what you need, has multiple configurations, and is completely collapsable.

multi-size

Depending on your activity or occasion, The Adjustable Bag can transition between 3 different sizes - S, M, L (31l, 46.5l, 62l). 

multi-configuration

The Adjustable Bag can be configured into a variety of different ways. Whatever fits your style or occasion. The straps can also be completely removed so that that The Adjustable Bag can streamlined for shipping.

collapsable

The Adjustable Bag is also completely collapsable so that you can easily store it anywhere or carry it with you wherever you go.

The Adjustable Bag uses an innovative and simple cinch system that allows it to instantly expand or contract. It is inconspicuous and completely integrated into The Adjustable Bag's design giving it a low key look. No other convertible bag is so easy to use.

 The Adjustable Bag grows

The Adjustable Bag ​shrinks

 

The Adjustable Bag ​collapses

 

Whether you need a day, weekend, or travel bag,The Adjustable Bag is all you need.

 

The Adjustable Bag is made of the highest quality materials, simply built to last. We've equipped it with features such as water-resistant rip-stop nylon, waterproof zippers, and Duraflex™ brand hardware.

sizing

The Adjustable Bag 's size versatility is unparalleled. Below picture indicates the precise measurements.

balance handle system

The Adjustable Bag has a symmetric design that allows it to expand to either side. To comfortably carry it we've equipped it with three top handles allowing it to always maintain it's balance. 

magnet-closure pockets

The Adjustable Bag's cord pockets use two strong neodymium mangets as the closing mechanism. Magnets have a longer lifetime and keeps the cord safe from scratches, thus ensuring The Adjustable Bag's durability. 

 

The Adjustable Bag can make space instantly on the go to fit anything your trip may throw at you, keeping things safe, and allowing you to enjoy your trip.

When arriving to your destination, The Adjustable Bag can easily contract into a day bag, saving you the hassle of having to carry an additional day bag on your trip.

Needless to say, The Adjustable Bag can consolidate all your different sports / exercise bags into one. There's no equipment too big or too small for The Adjustable Bag .

 

How tough is The Adjustable Bag? We tested it with 200 pounds (91kg's) of kettlebell's, that's how much actor Ryan Reynolds weighs! 

Will it hold or will it break? Check out our video!

Hi, we are Simon, Max, and Kristine - friends, entrepreneurs, and creatives, with a passion for travel and design. The Adjustable Bag was born out of our goal to help simplify the way people move around and travel. We’d like to thank all those who support our project and let’s make this happen!

column1:
0,"

Introducing the Fire Escape, a small, 1.7 oz multi-tool that can save your life! We, Outdoor Element, are a small company with big dreams and ideas. Our goal is for everyone to explore with confidence and we need your help to make that happen.

Inspired by First Responders, the Fire Escape has been dubbed a Must-Carry-Tool for just about everyone.

We are currently in production and need your help for the initial PO. The Fire Escape should be on everyone's list of must-have items. Not only is it great to keep in your car, on your pack or holding your keys, but it has great every-day-carry functionality as well.

For over a year we have been testing prototypes and are finally ready. We need your support for the first production run which is currently underway. Thanks for supporting small business and all our first responder buddies who are itching to get their hands on one of these! Seeing them in production is exciting.

Yes, we're a small company...but we've been featured in big places! Among the many accolades, our firebiner® was labeled ""Best Essential Gadget"" by Backpacker Magazine in their 2019 gear guide. Much love and respect to our community!

The Fire Escape is the next-gen to the acclaimed firebiner®, and shares some of these tried and true features:
Titanium coated stainless steel body (rated for 125 lbs of gear)
TSA Friendly (see update for more details on experiences with TSA)
• 4 Color Choices: Black, Silver, Aurora (Multicolor), and Red
It also boasts some awesome new ones:
• Bigger, beefy custom cutting blade that is replaceable (includes rubber cap to safely cover blade when not in use)

The Fire Escape is just as useful for every day carry as it is for emergencies. When you need it, you will certainly be glad you have it. Don't leave home without it. 

Seat Belt Cutter: easily slice through a seat belt to escape in an emergency

 

 Window Breaker: quickly smash out a window to escape a disaster

Mojica had too much fun field testing this. The owners of Littleton, CO U-Pull Automotive Recycling center were awesome (we owe them a couple of fire escapes).  

Fire Starter: light your camp stove or campfire quickly with the EverSpark fire wheel. It is the same tried and true technology we use on the firebiner® so you know it will work every time with ease. 

 

Accessory Kit: always have a dry piece of tinder with you by carrying a TinderQuik in your Wombat Whistle attached to your Fire Escape. Available with packages that contain an optional Accessory Kit, or added on later.

 

Hex Driver: tighten or loosen screws as needed by inserting a hex bit and taking care of business. Fits all standard 1/4"" bits. 

 

Bottle Opener: pop, fiz, happiness...  Easily remove your bottle cap.

O2 Wrench: ditch unnecessary extra tools and know you're covered. No more fumbling around when every second counts - oxygen tank open in no time. We let one of the prototypes take a hospital and ambulance run...it performed flawlessly. 

 

Replaceable Ferro Rods: with 2 extra replaceable ferro rods lasting over 2,000 sparks each, your Fire Escape will be your go-to fire starter. 

Why carry 8 different tools when you can carry a 1.7 oz Fire Escape?

For the price of a movie night out you can invest in the newest and coolest life-saving device on the market. Fire escape - $20. Peace of mind - priceless.

To clarify,
Accessory Kits come with 3 Tinder Tabs + 1 Wombat Whistle/Vial + 1 Mini Screwdriver tool. The vial will also have a quick connector for easy clipping onto your Fire Escape or Firebiner.

Kodiaks are survival bracelets made with our customer survival paracord which contains jute, a great fire tinder, and fishing line inside the cord. A fish hook is braided into the bracelet. The buckle has a hardened steel striker plate and a thick ferro rod to throw great sparks and easily start your fire, grill, stove, etc.

Maintenance Kits contain 5 replacement Ferro Rods + 2 Set Screws + 1 Spring + 1 Mini Screwdriver tool + 1 Split Ring to attach the mini screwdriver to your Fire Escape or Firebiner or to your Accessory Kit. With the stretch goal being met, you will also get a free ferro rod holder. See the picture below.

Tinder Tabs contain 15 easy-to-start, wax-infused, cotton tinder tabs that burn from 1 to 2 minutes to easily get your fire started.

Options

Please note that you will be able to choose your different options in CrowdOx, after the campaign, when you also confirm your shipping address. You will get to choose the following options:
• Fire Escape: choice of 4 colors - Black Forest, Silverthorne, Aurora (multicolor) and Red (we are still trying to decide the actual color name)
• Accessory Kit: choice of vial, 3 options - Packrat (silver aluminum) or Wombat (POM plastic) whistle/vial combo in either Black or Orange
• Firebiner: choice of 4 colors - Black Forest, Silverthorne, Aurora, Blue River
• Kodiak Survival Bracelet: choice of size (SM, MD, LG) and color (Black, OD Green, Red)

If you love to explore, have a passion to be prepared, ...have a camp stove, have a vehicle with a window, you need this. It needs you. Let the Fire Escape join your adventure. Be prepared for anything, escape when necessary. 

And for all you brave men and women risking your lives to help the rest of us on a daily basis, we think you will love the functionality and ease of use of this small, lightweight multitool that you can carry with you anywhere and everywhere.  

We love our National Parks and are a proud sponsor of the PLA. If you happen to be running in a park with Vacation Races, you very well might see Mike, his wife or his daughters on the trail or on the ""podium"". Help us support our public lands.

For you technical folks out there, check out all this fun stuff: It's always a process...it all starts with an idea, a conversation, a scratch in a notebook, 2D drawings, 3D models then prototypes...it evolves. We love this process. 

Stretch Goals

We met a couple stretch goals along the way and have unlocked a ferro rod holder to be included at no extra charge in the Maintenance Kit.

We also unlocked 2 new colors that were chosen by our backers to be Aurora and Red, in addition to the Black and Silver initially offered.

We have some additional fun stretch goals. We surpassed the first two and are approaching the last one.
• 1,000 backers Mojica will wax his legs (why? it was his wife's idea)
• 1,500 backers: OE will make a donation of Fire Escapes to a local fire station
• 2,000 backers: Mojica will take a polar plunge (with some added twists)

Mike did wax his legs (poor guy). We are making a donation to a local fire station. Now, let's get Mike in the frigid water and then watch as he uses the Fire Escape to make a fire to warm himself up before he freezes. If he starts turning blue we will rescue him.

Spread Some Love 
We need your help to get the word out. Make some noise and introduce everyone to a great little gadget that could end up saving their life, in more ways than one. Use the Indiegogo share tools that are available - nice and easy.
 

Media

Here are some recent write-ups on the Fire Escape:
• Dyrt: ""a highly functional resource for emergency and survival situations""
• New Atlas: ""The Fire Escape carabiner is indeed made with [first responders] in mind, although it's also designed for use by civilians""
• Hunting Insider: ""being prepared is important and brings peace of mind""
• Geeky Gadgets: ""specifically designed to help you be prepared""
• Trend Hunter: ""a seven-in-one device for those who are looking for a better way to stay prepared""
• Gear Junkie: ""the newest model has even more cool features""
• Solid Smack: ""really friggin handy"" - read about halfway down

We stopped adding to the list because we kept getting more and more media attention which was great.

Timeline

Our factory was willing to start the tooling process to help us meet our timing needs. Tooling is already in process. Now we need your help for the initial PO. Here are some of our expected milestones with dates:
• Dec 4 initial production completed and packaging started
• Dec 7 packaging completed and ready to air-ship
• Dec 15 receive shipment and begin shipping out from our ""warehouse"" (US early-bird orders first, to arrive before Christmas)

We are in constant communication with the factory to ensure all their preparations are in order for a smooth and seamless production. Even with the best planning and backup plans, there are always possibilities for delays. We are doing all we can to minimize those chances and to get the product into your hands before the holidays.

We have experience. We learned from the firebiner®. We listen to our community. We made improvements, dialed it in, and are ready to deliver a great product. We are working with the same factory that produces the firebiner®, so the learning curve will be short and we can get a quality product into your hands as soon as possible.

Production

Production is underway, making great progress and on schedule. Here are some pictures of the Fire Escape bodies after being molded and before entering the heat and pressure treating machine.
 

Meet the Team

Michael Mojica (aka Mojica) is the founder and chief innovator. He is an accomplished engineer with lots of experience in medical and aerospace, and several patents under his belt. With his passion for the outdoors and for business, he embarked on a new adventure in life, quit his day job a couple years ago and is focusing all his attention on Outdoor Element, despite several offers to bring him back into corporate life. His wife and four girls keep him young and active. His native American name is Bodaway, which means ""fire maker"", which turns out to be pretty appropriate here.

Joe is the operations chief. He has over 25 years experience successfully running operations for small consumer product companies. After the last company he was with sold, Joe was semi-retired (aka being lazy and driving his wife crazy) when a mutual friend introduced him to Michael. Joe agreed to buy dinner at their first meeting but conveniently forgot his wallet and stuck Michael with the bill. True story, and forgetting his wallet really was an accident (or so he says).

This is where the logistic magic happens, in Joe's basement. Yes, our pick &
column2:
staging station is really a covered pool table. The storage table in the back is the air-hockey table. And that is Michael's beautiful bride in the picture with us. It is a good thing Joe's kids are mostly out of the house, with only his daughter, his wife and him left at home, so the pool table and air-hockey only get used a couple times a year. Otherwise, this is what it basically looks like in our ""warehouse"". The commute is crazy. :)

Explore with confidence.  

Risks and Challenges

Our partner-factory making the Fire Escape has been great. We have worked with them for a few years now. They get us. They get the product. The learning curve will be minimal. However, we still have to wait until the body mold is finished before we can make the blade mold and the silicon cap mold, so that adds to lead time. We do plan to air-ship the initial orders to save time. This will be right before the holidays, but should be after the main rush to get product to retail. We have the current tariff wars going on which adds some cost pressure, but we have already factored that into our pricing. If the tariffs go up, then we will need to reevaluate prior to the close of the campaign.
As for the product, we learned a lot with the Firebiner, having delivered tens of thousands to the marketplace already, and are incorporating those lessons into the Fire Escape.

We are in constant communication with the factory to ensure all their preparations are in order for a smooth and seamless production. Even with the best planning and backup plans, there are always possibilities for delays. We are doing all we can to minimize those chances and to get the product into your hands before the holidays.We have experience. We learned from the firebiner®. We listen to our community. We made improvements, dialed it in, and are ready to deliver a great product. We are working with the same factory that produces the firebiner®, so the learning curve will be short and we can get a quality product into your hands as soon as possible.ProductionProduction is underway, making great progress and on schedule. Here are some pictures of the Fire Escape bodies after being molded and before entering the heat and pressure treating machine. Meet the TeamMichael Mojica (aka Mojica) is the founder and chief innovator. He is an accomplished engineer with lots of experience in medical and aerospace, and several patents under his belt. With his passion for the outdoors and for business, he embarked on a new adventure in life, quit his day job a couple years ago and is focusing all his attention on Outdoor Element, despite several offers to bring him back into corporate life. His wife and four girls keep him young and active. His native American name is Bodaway, which means ""fire maker"", which turns out to be pretty appropriate here.Joe is the operations chief. He has over 25 years experience successfully running operations for small consumer product companies. After the last company he was with sold, Joe was semi-retired (aka being lazy and driving his wife crazy) when a mutual friend introduced him to Michael. Joe agreed to buy dinner at their first meeting but conveniently forgot his wallet and stuck Michael with the bill. True story, and forgetting his wallet really was an accident (or so he says).This is where the logistic magic happens, in Joe's basement. Yes, our pick & staging station is really a covered pool table. The storage table in the back is the air-hockey table. And that is Michael's beautiful bride in the picture with us. It is a good thing Joe's kids are mostly out of the house, with only his daughter, his wife and him left at home, so the pool table and air-hockey only get used a couple times a year. Otherwise, this is what it basically looks like in our ""warehouse"". The commute is crazy. :)Explore with confidence.  Risks and ChallengesOur partner-factory making the Fire Escape has been great. We have worked with them for a few years now. They get us. They get the product. The learning curve will be minimal. However, we still have to wait until the body mold is finished before we can make the blade mold and the silicon cap mold, so that adds to lead time. We do plan to air-ship the initial orders to save time. This will be right before the holidays, but should be after the main rush to get product to retail. We have the current tariff wars going on which adds some cost pressure, but we have already factored that into our pricing. If the tariffs go up, then we will need to reevaluate prior to the close of the campaign.As for the product, we learned a lot with the Firebiner, having delivered tens of thousands to the marketplace already, and are incorporating those lessons into the Fire Escape.",40.0,0,"3 Campaigns

column2: >Usually, during the travelling, in addition to the travel bag, they take an extra bag for a laptop and a small bag for exploring the city (small crossbody bag).
>The idea of the transformable 3in1 bag was to get a versatile travel bag. We took care of you that one bag replaced the three most popular bags that travellers usually use.

>Three bags take up more space, carry more weight and create additional inconvenience. Thanks to the transformation mechanism, you use the bag and change its size when you need it in a variety of situations.

column1: Going on a trip, use all the advantages of the travel size.

column2: >The bag can be packed by the following items:

>When you arrive at your destination, you simply lay out things from a travel bag and, thanks to one zipper, make a laptop size from a travel size and use it. Either you fold it again and make a small bag for walking and use it.
>Access to things from two sides. You can pack your things from the side like into a suitcase with a side zipper and add things to your bag with a top zipper.

column1: The removable bottom serves to stiffen the bag, when folded it fits for the side pocket.

column2: >Divides the bag into two sections: the main and additional. In the additional section, you can put on clothes that you may urgently need on the road, such as a light jacket or pullover.

column1: Luggage strap for the travel size of the bag

column2: >If you travel with a roller suitcase you can easily fasten the Trinus bag on the handle for easy movement.
>Avoid baggage fees when you check and keep your bag with you when you explore. Trinus bag meets domestic and international carry-on standards.

>Separate pocket for the laptop diagonal up to 15 inches. Thanks to the soft pockets from the one side and a large compartment with things from the other, your laptop has additional protection against mechanical stress. When checking in at the airport you do not have to get a laptop, just open a separate pocket.

>Upon arrival, you just need to put the clothes and things out of the bag without taking out the laptop. Fold it into the laptop size and your laptop will be with you. Now you do not need to take one more bag on the road. Laptop size is great for going to work or study. But at any time and in any place, you can quickly turn it into a travel or crossbody bag.

column1: Luggage strap for the laptop size of the bag

column2: >For a laptop size, it is also possible to fasten a bag on a suitcase, which will allow you to free your hands.

>The travel bag or laptop bag can always be reduced to the size of a small handbag for walking (small cross body bag). You can always put the most necessary things like the mobile phone, passport, wallet and so on.
>Having a bag of only 1.5 liters on your shoulder, you can easily increase the volume to 38 liters in seconds.

column1: The pockets under the secure velcro flap

column2: >The pockets under the flaps is an ideal place for the most valuable things such as a wallet, phone, passport…

>Sometime we forget the keys in the apartments room or at home. We decided to take care of this and added a spring hook for keys on a harness, which is available in all sizes of the bag and always remains in your pocket. Now you will not be able to forget the keys.
>Side pockets with quick access from above, where you can store sunglasses, a compact umbrella, powerbank together with the mobile phone.
>This pocket is easily accessible to put a ticket or coins into it, whenever you use a travel size, or a laptop size, or a crossbody size.
>At any size of the bag, there is always the built-in flashlight, usually hidden under a flap that is easy to hide. Highlight your map, road, door lock.
>To free up your hands and carry a bag over your shoulder, each size of the bag has its own buckles for the spring hooks.
>Waterproof, wrinkle-resistant fabric, very soft to fold and tight enough to hold the shape of the bag. We offer three colours of the bag: slategray, cobalt and carbon.
>Fabric is from polyester with polyurethane impregnation, very soft to fold and tight enough to keep bag shape.
>The convenient toiletry bag is made from the same fabric comes with the bag for storing toiletries.

>So that the rain does not take you by surprise, we pack our bags with a super compact folding umbrella that fits even into a regular trouser pocket. Umbrella material is made of ponge fabric, the umbrella becomes dry simply by brushing drops from it. The small size of an EVA case can be confused with a case for ordinary glasses.

column1: Why Trinus 3-in-1 travel bag is the best choice?

column2: >Problem: each bag has a limited function and for different purposes you use different bags: one for traveling, the other for work, the third for studying and so on. Why take with you a few bags for different situations?
>Our solution: take with you one bag that can change its size and become both large and very small.

column3:
>

Supporters have asked for a few more pictures of the bag. Here are some additional shots.
column6:
>

Here comes a final stage in the development and testing of our transformable bag. 
We have an obligation - to deliver our product in time to all the participants of our project. We plan to begin delivery in February-March 2019. We know the whole chain of our production and supply. However, there are uncontrollable factors, such as the delay of some components, the absence of fabric. If there are any delays, we will notify you immediately and will try to solve all the problems as soon as possible. We will do everything in our power to ensure that during this period you will get your foldable ""Trinus"" 3-in-1 bag!
column9:
>

If you are not satisfied with Trinus 3-in-1 bag, we are ready to return the full cost of the bag to you (except for taxes and shipping). Just send it back to us. But we are sure that you will like Trinus 3-in-1 bag and you do not want to give up with it.
Please note that depositors are responsible for any taxes and fees according with their country.
column10:
>

There are thousands of different bags and backpacks all over the world, but we always wish to improve something in each of the bag. With time, this desire faded and both Alex and Anatoly began to pursue different career paths. Alexander worked as an architect, Anatoly as a website developer.
At the beginning of 2016, Alexander returned to the bag project and he wanted to modify several models, but there were always some difficulties. He decided to make his own bag, which will not be like any other existing bags. In the middle of 2017, Alexander presented the project of his bag, Anatoly was very impressed with the design and they started to work on the project together.
 
It took almost two years to finalize the design of the bag. We have tested different materials, zippers, types of design. There were different folding mechanisms. We have chosen the optimal size of the bag for travel and for work. We have selected the colours suitable for different situations for both guys and gals. In June 2018, we developed the first sample of the Trinus 3in1 bag.
column17: >Web","Usually, during the travelling, in addition to the travel bag, they take an extra bag for a laptop and a small bag for exploring the city (small crossbody bag).

column1: The idea of the transformable 3in1 bag was to get a versatile travel bag. We took care of you that one bag replaced the three most popular bags that travellers usually use.

Three bags take up more space, carry more weight and create additional inconvenience. Thanks to the transformation mechanism, you use the bag and change its size when you need it in a variety of situations.
Going on a trip, use all the advantages of the travel size.
The bag can be packed by the following items:

When you arrive at your destination, you simply lay out things from a travel bag and, thanks to one zipper, make a laptop size from a travel size and use it. Either you fold it again and make a small bag for walking and use it.
Access to things from two sides. You can pack your things from the side like into a suitcase with a side zipper and add things to your bag with a top zipper.
The removable bottom serves to stiffen the bag, when folded it fits for the side pocket.
Divides the bag into two sections: the main and additional. In the additional section, you can put on clothes that you may urgently need on the road, such as a light jacket or pullover.
Luggage strap for the travel size of the bag
If you travel with a roller suitcase you can easily fasten the Trinus bag on the handle for easy movement.
Avoid baggage fees when you check and keep your bag with you when you explore. Trinus bag meets domestic and international carry-on standards.

Separate pocket for the laptop diagonal up to 15 inches. Thanks to the soft pockets from the one side and a large compartment with things from the other, your laptop has additional protection against mechanical stress. When checking in at the airport you do not have to get a laptop, just open a separate pocket.

Upon arrival, you just need to put the clothes and things out of the bag without taking out the laptop. Fold it into the laptop size and your laptop will be with you. Now you do not need to take one more bag on the road. Laptop size is great for going to work or study. But at any time and in any place, you can quickly turn it into a travel or crossbody bag.
Luggage strap for the laptop size of the bag
For a laptop size, it is also possible to fasten a bag on a suitcase, which will allow you to free your hands.

The travel bag or laptop bag can always be reduced to the size of a small handbag for walking (small cross body bag). You can always put the most necessary things like the mobile phone, passport, wallet and so on.
Having a bag of only 1.5 liters on your shoulder, you can easily increase the volume to 38 liters in seconds.
The pockets under the secure velcro flap
The pockets under the flaps is an ideal place for the most valuable things such as a wallet, phone, passport…

Sometime we forget the keys in the apartments room or at home. We decided to take care of this and added a spring hook for keys on a harness, which is available in all sizes of the bag and always remains in your pocket. Now you will not be able to forget the keys.
Side pockets with quick access from above, where you can store sunglasses, a compact umbrella, powerbank together with the mobile phone.
This pocket is easily accessible to put a ticket or coins into it, whenever you use a travel size, or a laptop size, or a crossbody size.
At any size of the bag, there is always the built-in flashlight, usually hidden under a flap that is easy to hide. Highlight your map, road, door lock.
To free up your hands and carry a bag over your shoulder, each size of the bag has its own buckles for the spring hooks.
Waterproof, wrinkle-resistant fabric, very soft to fold and tight enough to hold the shape of the bag. We offer three colours of the bag: slategray, cobalt and carbon.
Fabric is from polyester with polyurethane impregnation, very soft to fold and tight enough to keep bag shape.
The convenient toiletry bag is made from the same fabric comes with the bag for storing toiletries.

So that the rain does not take you by surprise, we pack our bags with a super compact folding umbrella that fits even into a regular trouser pocket. Umbrella material is made of ponge fabric, the umbrella becomes dry simply by brushing drops from it. The small size of an EVA case can be confused with a case for ordinary glasses.
Why Trinus 3-in-1 travel bag is the best choice?

Problem: each bag has a limited function and for different purposes you use different bags: one for traveling, the other for work, the third for studying and so on. Why take with you a few bags for different situations?
Our solution: take with you one bag that can change its size and become both large and very small.

Supporters have asked for a few more pictures of the bag. Here are some additional shots.Here comes a final stage in the development and testing of our transformable bag. We have an obligation - to deliver our product in time to all the participants of our project. We plan to begin delivery in February-March 2019. We know the whole chain of our production and supply. However, there are uncontrollable factors, such as the delay of some components, the absence of fabric. If there are any delays, we will notify you immediately and will try to solve all the problems as soon as possible. We will do everything in our power to ensure that during this period you will get your foldable ""Trinus"" 3-in-1 bag!If you are not satisfied with Trinus 3-in-1 bag, we are ready to return the full cost of the bag to you (except for taxes and shipping). Just send it back to us. But we are sure that you will like Trinus 3-in-1 bag and you do not want to give up with it.Please note that depositors are responsible for any taxes and fees according with their country.There are thousands of different bags and backpacks all over the world, but we always wish to improve something in each of the bag. With time, this desire faded and both Alex and Anatoly began to pursue different career paths. Alexander worked as an architect, Anatoly as a website developer.At the beginning of 2016, Alexander returned to the bag project and he wanted to modify several models, but there were always some difficulties. He decided to make his own bag, which will not be like any other existing bags. In the middle of 2017, Alexander presented the project of his bag, Anatoly was very impressed with the design and they started to work on the project together. It took almost two years to finalize the design of the bag. We have tested different materials, zippers, types of design. There were different folding mechanisms. We have chosen the optimal size of the bag for travel and for work. We have selected the colours suitable for different situations for both guys and gals. In June 2018, we developed the first sample of the Trinus 3in1 bag.Follow usFacebookInstagramPinterestTwitterYouTubeWeb",60.0,1,"1 Campaign

BLYVE helps you go anywhere on any budget. Book flights, accommodations, or plan out full-service travels with affordable payment plans through Affirm. Cover a trip to Asia, South America, Europe and more with the same payment plan as many of your favorite online furniture stores or festivals. Earn rewards with every trip for travel gear, hotels stays, or airline tickets! Explore responsibly, book BLYVE.

Co-founders Paige Cassidy and Erica Johnson met while attending the University of Hawaii at Manoa. Being the savvy travelers that they are, they wanted to come up with a solution to the dilemma they faced: how to pursue their love of travel without emptying their struggling college bank accounts! With the merge of Erica's studies in tourism and Paige's research in communication, they created BLYVE.
Your contribution can help us fund the launch of our travel planning company!

We understand how daunting travels costs can be, but BLYVE makes travel dreams come true no matter the financial situation. Through the website, the traveler will fill out a questionnaire about their desired travel plans to help BLYVE give specialized and informed assistance to the traveler. A BLYVE agent will then be closely working with the client in order to design an adventure and create a payment plan that meets their financial needs.

BLYVE’s mission is to make travel more affordable- when you book BLVYE, you are actually saving funds and earning rewards for a future trip! With BLYVEbucks, travelers accumulate tokens that can be redeemed for flights, accommodations, or travel gear. (Are you a contributor? By donating you can actually start earning BLVYEbucks. Head over to the Perks section.)

We are seeking for $21,000 to get the company up and running. BLYVE is primarily online, therefore it is crucial to have a functional website that is professionally designed with features that are easy to use. Marketing the brand through influencers, social media, and advertising can be costly. Your contributions will help us achieve our goal to allow people to explore the world in ways they never thought possible.
If you are considering a contribution, make your way over to the perks section of this page and you can earn BLYVEbucks that are redeemable through our rewards system when our website launches.

Just because you can’t contribute by donating, doesn't mean you can’t help. Sharing this campaign on social media, or sending a link to friends and family, can help us make some noise about our campaign.
As co-founders of BLYVE, we appreciate you taking the time to discover our campaign and we can’t wait to help others discover the world.

...and here follows the German translation...

Die Idee 

Wir haben einen sehr einfachen, effizienten, stylishen und effizienten Mehrzweck-Trolley entwickelt, der einfach zu beladen, zu handhaben - und vor allem leicht und ohne Werkzeug mit einem revolutionären Schnellbefestigungssystem an jedes Fahrrad zu befestigen ist. Er ist brandneu, Du wirst kein besseres Produkt auf dem Markt finden, und das Beste: Du bekommst es für einen extrem attraktiven Preis.

 

Die wichtigsten Punkte

Bikcarry ist einzigartig: Glattes, klares Design ohne Faltenwurf, sehr einfache Fixierung an allen Sattelstützen und kompatibel mit praktisch allen aktuellen Mietfahrrädern in den Städten. 

Bikcarry ist einfach: Es ist ein werkzeugloses Konzept! Mit einer einfachen Schwenkstufe kann der Trolley in einen Fahrradanhänger umgewandelt werden. Es ist keine spezielle Schraubvorrichtung für die Montage am Fahrrad erforderlich, es ist kompatibel mit über 90% aller Fahrräder auf dem Markt und sogar zu fast 100% mit allem Zubehör. 

Bikcarry ist funktionell: ein Volumen von 65L erlaubt, Deine Einkäufe oder Wertsachen sicher auf 2 Ebenen zu verstauen. Du kannst es sogar leicht in einen großen Transportwagen umwandeln und Seitenbandschlaufen benutzen, um noch mehr Waren zu transportieren. 

Bikcarry ist smart: seitliches Magnetschließsystem im Verdeckkasten, Drehgriff, Anhängerkupplung mit werkzeuglosem Verriegelungssystem. 

Bikcarry ist robust: Strapazierfähiges Gewebe, Spritzwasserdicht, Rahmen aus strapazierfähigem, beschichtetem Stahl, herausnehmbare 8 '' - Thermoplast-Räder mit Hartplastik-Reifen. 

Bikcarry ist sauber: Der grüne und saubere Weg zum Einkaufen! 0% Schadstoffemission, fördere Deine lokalen Geschäfte (unterstütze die lokale Wirtschaft), anstatt große Einkaufszentren, keine Notwendigkeit für Plastiktüten und BIKcarry wurde nachhaltig entworfen, um recycelbar zu sein. 

Bikcarry ist auch einfach beim Auspacken: Dies ist kein Puzzle, das ist kein Zusammenbau Artikel eines Schwedischen Möbelhauses, das ist super einfach zu montieren, nur aus der Box nehmen, auffalten, 2 Schrauben für den Radschutz montieren und Du bist bereit für den Start!

 

Handlich und funktionell 

2 getrennte Ladeflächen, das obere Fach hat ein Volumen von 25l für leichte Artikel und das untere ein Volumen von 40l für schwere Güter, aber Du kannst es auch mit einer Zipöffnung in einen Trolley mit großen 65 l Volumen für lange oder sperrige Artikel verwandeln. 

Stabil und aufrecht stehend, ist es einfach zu laden und entladen, dank Magnethaltern bleiben die Türen geöffnet. 

Universelles Montagesystem passt zu allen handelsüblichen Durchmessern von Sattelstützen und 2 Zubehörteile machen es kompatibel mit praktisch 100% der Fahrräder auch mit Gepäckträger, und selbst da sind weder Schrauben noch Werkzeuge notwendig! 

Multifunktionelle Nutzung für alle Gelegenheiten, zum Einkaufen, für alle Sportarten, für die Fahrt zum Badesee oder zum Picknick, benutze es zur Arbeit oder für eine Fahrradtour, Du wirst BIKcarry einfach super einfach und funktionell finden!

 

Marktvergleich 

Wir sind stolz, Bikcarry als den einzigartigen und fortschrittlichsten, multifunktionellen Trolley und Fahrradanhänger auf dem Markt präsentieren zu können. 

Die meisten Frachtanhänger auf dem Markt sind: Aufwendig zu montieren (werden zerlegt in Einzelteilen geliefert und erfordern Werkzeuge sowohl für den Zusammenbau, wie auch die Montage am Fahrrad.) 

Nicht sehr funktionell. Die meisten Anhänger auf dem Markt haben ein Ladevolumen vergleichbar mit einem Einkaufskorb, ohne jede Unterteilung. Nicht robust oder dann zu schwer, Hoher Preis, nicht wirklich attraktives Design

 

Design &
column2:
Entwicklung 

BIKcarry wurde in mehr als 3 Jahren intensiver Arbeit entwickelt und erst nach ausführlichen, harten Feld- und Gebrauchstests auf den Markt gebracht. Unzählige Prototypen wurden getestet und verschlissen, bis wir die endgültige Ausführung freigeben konnten. Wir haben die beste Konfiguration gefunden und nun für alle Patente und Geschmacksmusterrechte angemeldet. 

Das Design ist Zeitlos, mit seiner klaren Farb- und Formansprache für jeden Geschmack und Stilrichtung passend. Der robuste Stahlrahmen wurde mittels 3D CAD Cam Systemen entwickelt und mit modernsten Testgeräten auf Langlebigkeit geprüft.

 

Technische Spezifikationen

column1: • Das obere 25L- und das untere 40L - Fach können bis auf 65L Volumen vergrössert werden

Risiko und Herausforderungen

Dies ist unser 1.Projekt, aber das Unternehmen existiert seit 2005. Im Laufe der Jahre sind wir ziemlich gut darin geworden, genaue Erwartungen zu setzen und unsere Versprechen einzuhalten. Wie Du siehst, wurden die Produktprototypen seriös entwickelt und hart getestet, so dass wir uns sehr auf die Zuverlässigkeit in der Serie verlassen.
Aber egal wie sehr wir unser Bestes geben, die Dinge können immer noch schief gehen. Wenn dies der Fall ist, versprechen wir feierlich, Dir die Probleme transparent zu machen und sie so zu lösen, dass unsere Radfahrer, Reisenden und Käufer glücklich und stolz sind, unser Unternehmen zu unterstützen.

Lieferkettenrisiko: Manchmal bricht eine Maschine oder ein Werkzeug. Manchmal verliert eine Fabrik für einen Tag die Stromversorgung. Manchmal bekommen wir die falschen Teile oder Materialien. Die Werkzeuge und die Produktion verfügen über  eine gewisse Kapazität, so dass für die Unterstützer, welche erst am Ende der Kampagne bestellen, entsprechende Wartefristen entstehen können.
Diese Dinge passieren von Zeit zu Zeit und können beeinflussen, wie lange es dauert, unsere Produkte zu bauen.

Versandrisiko: Die globale Versand- und Lagerlogistik ist umwerfend. Daher lagern wir das Zeug an Experten aus. Aber selbst die Experten sind nicht immun gegen Wetter, Hafenüberlastung und andere unkontrollierbare Faktoren.

Taten Gottes: Wir sind in der Schweiz stationiert. Das heißt, wir könnten im Winter einen Schneesturm haben und zu viele Kühe. Vielleicht könnte ein Verrückter Tu-Nicht-Gut alle Alphörner stehlen und sie benutzen, um alles wegzupusten ohne einen geplatzten Kragen. Was auch immer passiert, wir werden es gemeinsam schaffen.

Es ist keine spezielle Schraubvorrichtung für die Montage am Fahrrad erforderlich, es ist kompatibel mit über 90% aller Fahrräder auf dem Markt und sogar zu fast 100% mit allem Zubehör. Bikcarry ist funktionell: ein Volumen von 65L erlaubt, Deine Einkäufe oder Wertsachen sicher auf 2 Ebenen zu verstauen. Du kannst es sogar leicht in einen großen Transportwagen umwandeln und Seitenbandschlaufen benutzen, um noch mehr Waren zu transportieren. Bikcarry ist smart: seitliches Magnetschließsystem im Verdeckkasten, Drehgriff, Anhängerkupplung mit werkzeuglosem Verriegelungssystem. Bikcarry ist robust: Strapazierfähiges Gewebe, Spritzwasserdicht, Rahmen aus strapazierfähigem, beschichtetem Stahl, herausnehmbare 8 '' - Thermoplast-Räder mit Hartplastik-Reifen. Bikcarry ist sauber: Der grüne und saubere Weg zum Einkaufen! 0% Schadstoffemission, fördere Deine lokalen Geschäfte (unterstütze die lokale Wirtschaft), anstatt große Einkaufszentren, keine Notwendigkeit für Plastiktüten und BIKcarry wurde nachhaltig entworfen, um recycelbar zu sein. Bikcarry ist auch einfach beim Auspacken: Dies ist kein Puzzle, das ist kein Zusammenbau Artikel eines Schwedischen Möbelhauses, das ist super einfach zu montieren, nur aus der Box nehmen, auffalten, 2 Schrauben für den Radschutz montieren und Du bist bereit für den Start! Handlich und funktionell 2 getrennte Ladeflächen, das obere Fach hat ein Volumen von 25l für leichte Artikel und das untere ein Volumen von 40l für schwere Güter, aber Du kannst es auch mit einer Zipöffnung in einen Trolley mit großen 65 l Volumen für lange oder sperrige Artikel verwandeln. Stabil und aufrecht stehend, ist es einfach zu laden und entladen, dank Magnethaltern bleiben die Türen geöffnet. Universelles Montagesystem passt zu allen handelsüblichen Durchmessern von Sattelstützen und 2 Zubehörteile machen es kompatibel mit praktisch 100% der Fahrräder auch mit Gepäckträger, und selbst da sind weder Schrauben noch Werkzeuge notwendig! Multifunktionelle Nutzung für alle Gelegenheiten, zum Einkaufen, für alle Sportarten, für die Fahrt zum Badesee oder zum Picknick, benutze es zur Arbeit oder für eine Fahrradtour, Du wirst BIKcarry einfach super einfach und funktionell finden! Marktvergleich Wir sind stolz, Bikcarry als den einzigartigen und fortschrittlichsten, multifunktionellen Trolley und Fahrradanhänger auf dem Markt präsentieren zu können. Die meisten Frachtanhänger auf dem Markt sind: Aufwendig zu montieren (werden zerlegt in Einzelteilen geliefert und erfordern Werkzeuge sowohl für den Zusammenbau, wie auch die Montage am Fahrrad.) Nicht sehr funktionell. Die meisten Anhänger auf dem Markt haben ein Ladevolumen vergleichbar mit einem Einkaufskorb, ohne jede Unterteilung. Nicht robust oder dann zu schwer, Hoher Preis, nicht wirklich attraktives Design Design & Entwicklung BIKcarry wurde in mehr als 3 Jahren intensiver Arbeit entwickelt und erst nach ausführlichen, harten Feld- und Gebrauchstests auf den Markt gebracht. Unzählige Prototypen wurden getestet und verschlissen, bis wir die endgültige Ausführung freigeben konnten. Wir haben die beste Konfiguration gefunden und nun für alle Patente und Geschmacksmusterrechte angemeldet. Das Design ist Zeitlos, mit seiner klaren Farb- und Formansprache für jeden Geschmack und Stilrichtung passend. Der robuste Stahlrahmen wurde mittels 3D CAD Cam Systemen entwickelt und mit modernsten Testgeräten auf Langlebigkeit geprüft. Technische Spezifikationen
beschichtetes, spritz- und regenwasserdichtes 600D starkes Polyestergewebe.
Das obere 25L- und das untere 40L - Fach können bis auf 65L Volumen vergrössert werden

Risiko und HerausforderungenDies ist unser 1.Projekt, aber das Unternehmen existiert seit 2005. Im Laufe der Jahre sind wir ziemlich gut darin geworden, genaue Erwartungen zu setzen und unsere Versprechen einzuhalten. Wie Du siehst, wurden die Produktprototypen seriös entwickelt und hart getestet, so dass wir uns sehr auf die Zuverlässigkeit in der Serie verlassen.Aber egal wie sehr wir unser Bestes geben, die Dinge können immer noch schief gehen. Wenn dies der Fall ist, versprechen wir feierlich, Dir die Probleme transparent zu machen und sie so zu lösen, dass unsere Radfahrer, Reisenden und Käufer glücklich und stolz sind, unser Unternehmen zu unterstützen.Lieferkettenrisiko: Manchmal bricht eine Maschine oder ein Werkzeug. Manchmal verliert eine Fabrik für einen Tag die Stromversorgung. Manchmal bekommen wir die falschen Teile oder Materialien. Die Werkzeuge und die Produktion verfügen über  eine gewisse Kapazität, so dass für die Unterstützer, welche erst am Ende der Kampagne bestellen, entsprechende Wartefristen entstehen können.Diese Dinge passieren von Zeit zu Zeit und können beeinflussen, wie lange es dauert, unsere Produkte zu bauen.Versandrisiko: Die globale Versand- und Lagerlogistik ist umwerfend. Daher lagern wir das Zeug an Experten aus. Aber selbst die Experten sind nicht immun gegen Wetter, Hafenüberlastung und andere unkontrollierbare Faktoren.Taten Gottes: Wir sind in der Schweiz stationiert. Das heißt, wir könnten im Winter einen Schneesturm haben und zu viele Kühe. Vielleicht könnte ein Verrückter Tu-Nicht-Gut alle Alphörner stehlen und sie benutzen, um alles wegzupusten ohne einen geplatzten Kragen. Was auch immer passiert, wir werden es gemeinsam schaffen.",8.0,0,"1 Campaign
is a byproduct of our success both as individuals and as a team this past
year.  Collectively, our team includes members
from three of the top 4 collegiate match race teams.  The team also comprises of the core group
that was selected by ORACLE TEAM USA for the Youth America’s Cup in the summer
La Dow (San Diego, CA / St. Mary’s College)

selected in late April, we have been diligently working to fund the trip.  US Sailing has pledged us $2,000, but we, as
a team, are responsible for the remaining $14,000 in expenses – i.e. to cover
travel, housing, coaching, and food.  Any

contributions or sponsorship would be greatly appreciated. 

If you would like to help in any other way- gear, etc. please let me know as well!

The Solar Car Team of the University of Puerto Rico, known as Solar Engineering Research Racing Team (SERRT), is the only solar car team in Puerto Rico, and it is our university's project aimed at solar energy research with a focus on transportation.

The University of
Puerto Rico at Mayaguez had not taken part of a solar race since 1995,
but on August 2012, twenty-nine students accepted the challenge to
restart the project with fresh ideas to the new generation of
solar-propelled vehicles developed in the university.
This year, our solar vehicle will take part of the American Solar
Challenge. It's main event is an 8 day, 1700+ mile road course traveling
through 7 states, from Austin, TX to Minneapolis, MN. Our team will be
competing with top engineering universities from the United States and

The car is currently being tested every day while drivers get comfortable and used to it.  We have already reached speeds of 50mph!

Our current schedule:

June 1st-June 15th: Test and Strategy practice                                                              June 17th: Car gets shipped to Florida.                                                                            June 19th: Team picks up car on Florida and starts the drive to Austin, TX.          June 20th: Continue testing until race day!

Adding up transportation, vehicle rental, meals and hotel nights we got a grand total of $25,000. We can only do this with your help.
To read more about the competition, you may access the American Solar Challenge website:

Interested in sponsoring us? Send us a quick email.

The Furrion eRove™ is a high-tech solution to a problem that outdoor enthusiasts have been battling forever: keeping food and drinks fresh and safe without compromising your time on the go. Traditionally, this has meant using coolers that need new ice every other day or staying in range of a refrigerator. The Furrion eRove eliminates the need for ice and lets you disconnect your adventures from civilization while keeping everything cold for up to 5 days on a single charge.

The eRove is a sleek, high-tech portable refrigeration system. Simply charge the swappable ePod battery, stow your food and drinks, and get on the move, secure in the knowledge that everything you packed will stay cool and dry for up to 5 days.

No more ice. No more soggy sandwiches. No more lukewarm drinks. The eRove is here.

eRove can freeze your food at subzero temperatures without ice. Freeze your goods at temperatures as low as -8° F.

eRove’s innovative foam insulation technology keeps your food cold for days, and its low energy consumption and smart mode capability mean that it uses just the right amount of power, making your charge last longer.

eRove will actively cool or even freeze your food for up to 5 days with a battery. You can swap in a fresh ePod battery for an additional 5 days.

Thanks to its innovative construction, eRove can keep ice frozen for up to 10 days—and that’s without a battery. Combining the eRove’s battery power with ice will keep your food fresh for an astounding 14 days on a single charge, and the swappable battery and solar charging options mean that you can keep your eRove’s contents ready to consume for as long as you need.

Whether you’re staying close to home, heading out for a week, or planning an extended trip, the eRove has a power source to meet your needs. Whether you want to power your eRove or use your ePod Power Station to power other devices, we’ve got the solution you’re looking for.

Use the AC adapter to cool the eRove at home so you can load it into your car and go. You’ll be set for 1-2 days of superior cooling without a battery or the need for ice. Top up your chill from the car with the included DC adapter.

Charge an ePod battery for up to 5 days of worry-free food storage. If 5 days isn’t enough chill time for you, charge an extra ePod battery and store it in the eRove’s handy dry storage compartment so you can swap it into the ePod battery dock when you need it.

With the Furrion Solar Panel, you can keep going for as long as you want. Simply set it up in the sun and plug it into your eRove to get a steady charge from the sun—again and again.

With two USB 2.0 ports and one USB fast charge port, you can plug all of your accessories in with ease. Your eRove even has a 10W wireless charging pad, so no matter what high-tech gadgets you’re using, you won’t have to worry about how to keep them going.

When you put an ePod battery into the ePod Power Station, you can power your eRove, refill a spare battery, and charge up to six devices at the same time. With two AC outputs, 3 USB ports, and one USB-C port, the Power Station can charge it all. Charge a smartphone up to 30 times, a camera up to 28 times, and a drone up to 4 times. Plugging in the Furrion Solar Panel makes the Power Station a self-sufficient lithium-ion solar generator that will power your devices, improve the ePod’s battery life, and charge your eRove at the same time.

There’s nothing worse than reaching for a drink on a warm day only to find that someone’s taken the last can from the cooler. With a 50 Qt internal capacity, eRove can store up to 72 cans. eRove solves the problem by giving you space to keep everyone’s favorites cool.

Want to bring more than just drinks? eRove has room for that, too. With 6 Qt of dry storage space, eRove gives you the room you need to bring the things you want—and keeps everything fresh and cool, without worrying about it getting soggy.

With other coolers, any food left by the time you get home was probably destined for the trash: it had gotten too warm, or too wet, or smelled like the damp inside of a cooler. With the eRove, your food will stay at the right temperature without ice, so it will be as fresh on the day you get home as it was on the day you left.

It’s frustrating to need to plan a trip around where you can stop to get more ice. It makes it difficult to truly disconnect, knowing that you’ll have to trudge into town to restock. Unless you wanted a steady diet of preserved food and warm water, you didn’t have another option—until now.

The 100W Furrion Solar Panel lets you truly go off the grid for as long as you want. No more worrying about bags of ice or food spoiling—just hook up the solar panel and set it in a sunny spot, and nature will take care of the rest. We have been 4 weeks off-grid in the Australian outback using solar power to charge the ePod battery. Charging 3-4 hours a day is enough to maintain a full charge.

Regular coolers (and even most electric coolers) are a one-trick pony: they use ice to keep your contents cold for a limited time, and... that’s it. The eRove keeps your things cooler for longer while you’re on the move, but that’s not the only use it has. The eRove is great for:

Each component was chosen carefully for its unique qualities and uses, and when combined, they work together to form the best, most durable portable refrigeration and energy system on the planet. The combination of eRove’s cooling algorithm, wall thickness, and foam insulation give it best in class ice retention and battery life. What’s more, our designers have kept it looking great while ensuring first-class temperature retention.

We designed the eRove with an innovative new foam insulation technology that keeps the cold in for longer. In tests, the eRove can keep ice frozen for a full day longer than any other cooler on the market. This technology works in tandem with the swappable ePod battery to ensure that whatever you put in your eRove stays exactly as cold as you want it for up to 5 days on a full charge.

The main structure of the eRove is made of 3"" thick foam with high-quality ABS plastic, which means that the body is lightweight yet sturdy. The interior is made of aluminum to keep it strong yet lightweight.

The side panels are fashioned from high density polyethylene, making it corrosion resistant and able to withstand a rough-and-tumble life. The side skirting panels, meanwhile, are made from polypropylene, which helps eRove maintain a consistent internal temperature. The foam insulation, made of polyurethane and cyclopentane, is high-pressure injected for the best possible cooling retention. The wheels are made of rubber, not plastic, which means they have high vibration resistance and can easily navigate tough terrain.

eRove’s software makes minute adjustments based on temperature inside and outside the cooler, leading to a 40% better battery life.

Keep things chilled or keep them frozen. Easily set the temperature anywhere from -8°F to +50°F with the touch of a button.

Set your compatible device on the built-in 10W wireless charging pad and leave your extra accessories at home.

Plug in all of your accessories and charge them from the ePod battery or optional solar attachment.

Take your eRove with you on nearly any surface. The detachable rubber wheel kit is extremely durable and easy to attach.

Pull it up when you’re on the move. Stash it away when you’re in the car or at your campsite. Use it with the serving tray to serve food and drinks.

Know the exact temperature inside your eRove at a single glance.

Don’t settle for whichever drink you happen to grab from your cooler. Find exactly what you’re in the mood for the first time.

Keep your drinks safe in the two-slot cup holders. Remove it easily when on the move.

Hold your umbrella or fishing rod effortlessly with the removable holder.

Conveniently serve your favorite food on the stowaway tray.

The Bottle opener is never far away. Open you drinks with the integrated opener.

Charge it up, store it in the dry storage compartment, and easily swap it in when you need it.

Charge your ePod batteries from an outlet or from the solar panel, or use it with an ePod battery to charge your devices.

The Furrion eRove portable electric cooler Starter Package is the base component of our exclusive Indiegogo Packages. Ideal for single day use with pre-cooling to hang in the backyard, the park, the beach, and everywhere in between.

Our Adventure Package (an IndieGoGo exclusive!) includes everything you need for up to 5 days of fresh, cool food storage.

Our Off-Grid Package includes everything you need to disconnect and completely go off-the grid.

Additional accessories can take your eRove experience from standard chill to super cool.

Founded by three marine engineers with a passion for outdoors and exploration. Since 2007, Furrion has delivered 300+ products for RV, marine and automotive manufactures from all over the world and collaborated with several fortune 500 companies to co-create the future of luxury mobility and off-grid living. Over the past 10 years Furrion has been awarded 170+ patents in technology for solar energy, batteries, refrigeration, cooking appliances and electronics.

Thomas Wernisch | Technical director - Engineering
Austrian native with over 30 years’ experience working all over the world in the field of consumer electronics and R&
column2:
D. Formerly innovation engineer and quality assurance lead for Phillips, Thomas has executed numerous award winning projects from concept to mass production. As Furrion’s technical director, Thomas’s passion for technology and off-grid living has defined the performance and function of Furrion’s products by optimizing software and developing hardware to maximize energy efficiency.

Bernard Lo | VP of design
Bernard has a master’s in industrial design from the Pratt institute in New York and is the former lead designer at Samsung. At Furrion, his passion for futuristic design and mobility defines the way the product looks and feels and transforms the way we interact with technology through design.

Dan Putt | Project Engineer
With 13 years of experience working with appliance manufacturer whirlpool, Dan has proven experience in delivering quality products and provides on-the-ground customer support and ensures product performance and safety standards are exceeded.

Mike Lindgren | VP of Operations
Mike comes from an extensive background in consumer electronics with Best Buy where he led merchandising, product development and supply management. As head of operations for North America for Furrion, Mike leads supply chain management, distribution and customer experience.

Waqas Ahmed | VP, Head of Ecommerce and digital marketing 
Waqas has an engineering and law background with 7+ years of experience in scaling ecommerce businesses from the ground up and has led successful large-scale partnerships with Amazon, Google, Verizon. At Furrion, Waqas leads ecommerce operations and digital marketing teams to deliver the best online shopping experiences and on-time delivery.

As head of operations for North America for Furrion, Mike leads supply chain management, distribution and customer experience.Waqas Ahmed | VP, Head of Ecommerce and digital marketing Waqas has an engineering and law background with 7+ years of experience in scaling ecommerce businesses from the ground up and has led successful large-scale partnerships with Amazon, Google, Verizon. At Furrion, Waqas leads ecommerce operations and digital marketing teams to deliver the best online shopping experiences and on-time delivery.",106.0,1,"1 Campaign

column1: Hi, I'm Emily. I'm currently entering my senior year of college in New York City. This fall, I'm studying abroad in Florence, Italy, and wanted to create an art project about my experience. Here it is! I'm the creator of the Polaroid Project.

I was inspired to create a project where the art comes to the viewer, not the other way around as it typically is. I read about Shelley Jackson's INERADICABLE SKIN project years ago, and it is the main inspiration point for this project today. Shelley, a novelist, is tattooing one word from her 2,095-word novel on anyone willing to participate. 2095 people will be walking around touched by her work.

I wanted to create something similarly accessible. The Polaroid Project is 400 photos of my daily life in Europe for 4 months, sent out to anyone who wants one anywhere in the world. Additionally, members of the project will be invited to our Facebook group, where we can share life experiences, knowledge, travel stories, quotes, questions, and more. I'm taking 5 classes about Italian language, history, food, film, and culture, so I'm using the group to share some things I learn (and hopefully learn some things from all of you!).

*disclaimer: I WILL do this project regardless of if the goal is reached or not. I simply chose that number because 400 photos * $10 each = 4000. No matter if I reach it or not, you'll get a photo. Promise!
I wish I could do this for free, but film is really expensive. Your $10 will go toward:
• envelopes for sending the photos to you
• anything left over will allow me to travel more and make interesting content for the Facebook group
• This is where I'll be posting all of my travel diaries, videos, recipes, questions, and more.
• I want this to be somewhere where we can spread positivity, grow, and get to know each other!
<li>$10 or more - Polaroid + Facebook Group Access<ul>
• You'll receive 1 of the 400 photos in the project.
• They'll be labeled by where they were taken and what number they are in the series
• Share on social media with #emilyspolaroidproject when you receive yours!
• They will be shipping in December when I return.

By the end of December, you'll have learned a little Italian, a little bit of history, a little bit about food, and a lot about yourself (and hopefully have made some new friends!). You'll also have your own Polaroid, the only of its kind in the world. Frame it, post it, hang it up, give it to a friend, give it life!

Ideally, I wanted to send all the photos as I took them. However, I'll be sending 100 at a time to my family's house in North Carolina. This decreases the cost of postage and makes it easier to send them all out when I return in December. I'll be sure to post sneak peeks of photos as I take them.
If you can't contribute, that's totally fine! I would love if you shared with a friend or two who you think would like to partake.
Feel free to use the share tools on this page to share on social media as well!

Fonebud W lets your travels be worry-free, bringing internet data to you and up to 7 extra friends, colleagues or family members! You are assured it will last you all day, as the Wifi hotspot packs a 10,000 mAh battery and wireless charging for extra convenience.

""Fonebud W is great for me to broadcast my speech overseas on Facebook Live. The most amazing feature is that I can still use WhatsApp, Facebook and Instagram whenever I travel to China""
- Mr. Tan Lay Seong, CEO of Great Ideal Group

""It's never hard to access the internet, even when I'm in the rural areas, the connection is strong."" - Yolanda Seah, Fashion Industry

""Fonebud W worked perfectly during my 8 days family trip in Tokyo. We were able to maintain a constant connection, and it stayed on throughout the day.""
- SK Wong, Property Investor
 

 


REGIONAL, MULTI-COUNTRY DATA PACKAGES

Regional data packages allow you to hop from one country in a region to another.

Fonebud W has you covered in almost all touristic and business regions worldwide, with convenient regional data packages. We are also increasing our number of partner networks regularly, to provide better or extended coverage.

4G LTE DATA ROAMING

Fonebud W is a global data platform that creates a Wi-Fi hotspot from local networks to provide you with active data roaming in 90+ countries, so you’re always connected, no matter where you are. 

Your friends, family and team members can all stay connected
column2:
share data with up to eight devices at a time!

 

GET STARTED RIGHT AWAY!

When you purchase Fonebud W, you’ll get 2GB of international data included for free! This allows you to start using it right after you create your account, and it is valid in all our countries!

And if you can't travel now, no worries, it's valid for a full year (365 days after activation).

 

WIRELESS CHARGING

Fonebud W provides you with 10,000mAh of battery life— that means you can roam non-stop for 35 hours straight, without going back to your hotel twice a day to recharge. 

It also means your phone won't let you down when it’s time to capture that sunset photo (or call that last cab). Don’t forget Fonebud W uses Wireless Charging (you can also charge via USB cable too)!



BUY THE DATA YOU NEED, ONLY WHEN YOU NEED IT

No monthly fees! Instantly load up on data with our easy-to-navigate app. Do not fear running out of data in the middle of a jungle trek or a teleconference on the other side of the world. All you have to do is load the app, choose a package and get your data up and running in minutes!

You can see the current state of all your data plans and how much data is left, for how long and how much you spent on it!

 

RESUME YOUR DATA PACK WHERE YOU LEFT IT

With our 90 days or 365 days data plans, you can resume your plan when you come back and keep the leftover data for later! Plans change? No worries! Leave that package on hold and finish it when you return. Find promotional offers for the countries you travel to with packages adapted to your needs at great prices.

What are eSIMs? eSIMs are identifiers that are embedded in a device. They allow supporting operators all over the world to provide 3G/4G/LTE when entering their network. Having a single ID lets you keep track of your data use and transactions!

SHARE YOUR WIFI INSTANTLY

Fonebud W’s display gives you access to everything
column3:
see instantly where you're at. Press the button to check the battery, the network status, the number of devices hooked to your hotspot and how long it has been active.

Press another time to show the login and password and share them around!

 


COMPACT AND STURDY

Fonebud W may be travel-size, but it packs a punch. It is easy to grip, pack and conceal:
column5:
showinfo=0"">

 

NEED HELP? NO WORRIES!

Consult the FAQ or contact us directly, we are here to solve any issue you might be having to make things work out as they should!


 

 

PLEASE HELP US SPREAD THE WORD

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make Fonebud W a reality.

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase a Fonebud W, if you’re a supporter of Fonebud W, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!
