column1: For pre-orders, please visit www.taraand.co
Curious what products we're launching?  Learn about us in 1 minute or less.
I'm a former Facebooker, serial entrepreneur, and now the founder of Tara&
column2: Co where we re-imagine products for women on-the-go.  I lead a team of designers, mechanical engineers, and women like you who create beautiful accessories that provide both form and function for your everyday life.

Co was born out of my own need when I was running around from meeting to social event to a meeting doing business at my last company.  My shoulder hurt from carrying my laptop, and I was tipping over in my heels from the combined weight of it and all my other materials.  I thought, where are all the products for the women of today – Women who need to protect and carry their devices and have dynamic lifestyles that go from day to night?  Where are those products?

column1: I couldn't find anything in market, so I decided to change that.

The name, “Tara” is inspired and named after “Green Tara” the Buddhist mother goddess, who represents action, great strength, and the virtues of success in work and achievements.  We felt like this represented the women we were designing for.

Our first solution to  build something sleek and elegant, but also functional and useful was the Tracy 2-in-1 Bag, which we officially launched in November 2017. Made of beautiful luxurious leather, it’s a 3-way convertible bag that can hold up to a 13” laptop and has a zip-off clutch. Yes, that’s right — it turns into two bags!
The Tracy was a hit. We were covered by Fast Company, Brit + Co, LA Fashion Magazine, and more. We launched with more than $110k of pre-sales and officially sold out in just a few short months.

Since my background is in startups, I approach building a new bag like building a novel tech product.  We survey women about what they want and what they need. We test our products continuously. We continue to reiterate our design based on such feedback.

It’s not easy to make something beautiful while creating a bag that looks great in multiple forms, but we have a great team of designers, mechanical engineers, and women like you, who prototype and build on those initial design ideas. Ultimately, we’re building products to solve problems in your everyday life.

And we’re just getting started.  My goal is to keep solving problems for women on-the-go — to support them by giving them products that are realistic for their lives today. Why should we have to compromise fashion for function? We deserve both.
Now, introducing our second line of bags: The 3-in-1 Danielle Weekender — your ideal weekend travel bag
column2: The 2-in-1 Heather Work Gym Bag — perfect for the active daily commuter
column3: and The 2-in-1 Sharon Minimalist Backpack Portfolio — for the efficient professional woman.

column1: This 3-in-1 bag is the new favorite travel buddy for women on-the-go
column2: our travel bag is the ideal TSA-friendly Weekender. The perfect travel bag as a flight carry-on or your road trip buddy with a stylish silhouette and design.  The Weekender features a 13” padded pocket and places for all your devices even including a zip-out pocket  that becomes your fold-out explorer day-pack (with your choice of a fold-out backpack or tote). This 3-in-1 bag holds your weekend clothes, toiletries, jacket and of course our attachable clutch in 5 different color options.

column1: Watch this 1 minute demo for all the highlights of this 3-in-1 bag travel bag (and a catchy song)!
Our woman on-the-go likes to travel.  When we spoke to her about what she needed in travel, three specific things came up again and again:

• Her travel was dynamic, so she often felt like she didn’t have the right accessory for the right occasion. She usually traveled with a duffel for her clothes, a mid-sized bag for daytime exploring, and something small and chic to take out at night.

• She ran out of power… all the time. She ended up being one of those people you see at the airport, sitting on the floor so her device could be plugged into the wall. So many of the women we surveyed shared a similar story, explaining that they ran out of power regularly and needed to carry an additional battery with them when they traveled.

• She wanted a way to separate out things that were clean and dirty. When she was on the go, she didn’t want to have to worry about if the blouse she wanted to wear today got too close to yesterday’s well-worn outfit.
1) A larger, lightweight luxurious yet water-resistant nylon tote that can hold weekend clothes, toiletries, a jacket and more. With a 13” padded pocket, it comes with places for all your devices

2) A zip-out pouch on the larger bag becomes a fold-out explorer daypack. This daypack can fit a lightweight jacket, water bottle, book and more. Even better, there’s a choice of a fold-out backpack or tote to suit your needs.
3) A chic leather clutch comes in 5 different color options. With a removable strap and its own pocket for essentials, it’s the perfect bag to bring along to dinner or drinks.
Never worry again about getting your clothes dirty with your 3-way zip separate bottom compartment meant for shoes or soiled clothes.
Built in charger pocket to your weekender for exterior charging. *charger and cord not included.
• Versatile Wear.  2-way wear with leather handles or with a removable hands-free crossbody strap.  Additional back travel sleeve to hook onto larger luggage.
• Protects Devices.  Interior padded pocket for up to 13"" laptop and other interior pockets for your devices.
• Pockets pockets pockets.  Additional pockets for your keys, sunglasses, and more.
• Best Materials.  Made of a luxurious smooth nylon inside and out.  Handles made of genuine leather. YKK zippers.
Security and Durability.  Dual safety hook for clutch or key fob.  Bag feet on bottom.

Bag Dimensions: Height: 13.5”, Width: 17”, Depth 7"". Clutch: Height: 6.5”, Width: 11”, Removable Strap Length: 20”. Exterior made of lightweight luxurious yet water-resistant nylon. *Specs are subject to change before production to build the best product possible.  *Charger and cord not included.

This 2-in-1 bag is built for active women on-the-go. A perfect everyday work bag, with a small silhouette that fits your day-to-day commute and has a place for all your devices , gym accessories and more.  It expands when you need it to hold your gym shoes, heels, or anything else you'd need to keep separate.
We built the 2-in-1 Heather bag for women who carry devices and work out. When we started talking to this type of woman, there were two specific problems she mentioned:
• She wanted a smaller everyday bag to hold and protect her devices – something that looked cute and chic and not oversized.
• She often needed to carry a pair of extra shoes, whether to work out before or after work, or to transport with her on her daily commute.
And that's what we built.  Our Heather bag is the perfect everyday work bag with two fashionable yet functional silhouettes.

Our ""everyday"" smaller silhouette has organization to protect and hold your devices like a laptop (padded pocket for up to 13'' laptop), charger, phone and more. There's also ample space for active wear including a change of clothes, a water bottle, lock, hairbands, and more.
Zip down both sides for a 2nd silhouette which is a fully separated compartment. Use it for your gym shoes, heels, or dirty laundry. Open top allows you extra space as needed and ability to aerate.
Two bags that you can wear separately or together with our signature standalone smooth leather clutch.
• Protects Devices.  Interior padded pocket for up to 13"" laptop.
• Pockets pockets pockets.  Additional pockets for your keys, sunglasses, and more.  Fits everyday work life and gym essentials like a water bottle, lock, hairbands and more.
• Best Materials.  Made of a luxurious smooth nylon inside and out.  Handles made of genuine leather. YKK zippers.
• Versatile Use.  Smart design for flexible use of your elastic expandable shoe-holder pockets (in silhouette two) as water bottle holders (in silhouette one).
Security and Durability.  Dual safety hook for clutch or key fob.  Bag feet on bottom.

Bag Dimension: Height: 12"", Width: 15.5, Depth: 7.5"".  Top length in Silhouette 1 is 15"" in Silhouette 2 with pockets extended is 25"".  Clutch: Height: 6.5”, Width: 11”. Exterior material is a lightweight luxurious yet water-resistant nylon.  *Specs are subject to change before production to build the best product possible.

Almost 2"" wide, the thin 2-in-1 Sharon is for no-nonsense ladies with devices who love to stay organized. As a 3-way-zip portfolio-styled bag, it allows part-way access to a laptop or fully opens as a portfolio to grab your cords, headphones etc. This bag can be worn as a backpack or handheld, with or without our signature removable clutch.
This woman on-the-go for the Sharon is quite a minimalist.  She wants:
• To carry less, but still have a place for everything.
Easy access for her laptop and distributed weight.
• A more professional look when she needed it.
The Sharon has comfortable carry with 2-way wear.  You can wear it as backpack for distributed weight, or a handheld for a more professional look.

The bag also turns into two separate bags: 1) a luxurious nylon tote  2) a smooth genuine leather clutch with its own pocket and strap that you can wear together or apart.  Choice of 5 vibrant colors.
Fully open your portfolio-styled 2-in-1 Sharon which boasts a padded laptop pocket (up to 13""), 3 snaps for cords, two open pockets, one zippered pocket, 3 card slots, and a pen slot. Ooh la la.
• Outside Pockets. Two additional outside pockets.  Large pocket in front for a computer charger or other item.  Open easy access phone pocket in the back.
• Best Materials.  Made of a luxurious smooth nylon inside and out.  Handles made of genuine leather. YKK zippers.
Security and Durability.  Dual safety hook for clutch or key fob.  Bag feet on bottom.

Bag Dimensions: Height: 12”, Width: 12 3/4”, Depth: 1 3/4”.  Exterior material is a lightweight luxurious yet water-resistant nylon.  *Specs are subject to change before production to build the best product possible.

Our mission is to connect, elevate, and create products for women on-the-go so we name all of our products after women who inspire us.  Our first bag is named, “The Tracy,” was named after Tracy Chou – former Pinterest and Quora engineer and entrepreneur – for her work in diversity and inclusion in tech.  Her blog post spurred 250 tech companies to release their otherwise well guarded diversity numbers so we could have a real conversation about diversity.
This year, we took our inspiration from three more impactful women:

The 3-in-1 “Danielle” Weekender after Danielle Kayembe, the Founder and CEO of GreyFire Impact, for the work she’s done in social impact, supporting female entrepreneurs and bringing attention to the female-driven economy.
The 2-in-1 “Heather” Work Gym bag after Heather McPhie Watanabe, a 2x Olympic Mogul Skier, for being a trailblazing athlete, a mentor in skiing, and an accomplished woman in finance.

The 2-in-1 “Sharon” Minimalistic Portfolio Backpack after Sharon Tal Yguado who’s the Head of Genre Original Series at Amazon Studios, for continuing to innovate in media and rising in leadership at a Fortune 500 company.

column2: Co for being able to provide you versatility for your dynamic lifestyle.  That means that our products have a lot of features. How do you pick just one?  (PS: You can pick as many as you like).

column1: But ... if you have to choose just one, use the grid below to find your favorite features and see which Tara&
column2: Co bag is best for you.

column1: We're a team of professional women, bag designers, and mechanical engineers.  I'm a former Facebook employee and longtime female founder.  We have a collaborative building philosophy so we constantly ask professional women what they want and need and design it into our bags.
We've talked to and tested our bags with hundreds of women.  Ladies love our new line.
We like to solve problems and build the products that women of today need.   We shouldn't have to compromise fashion for function -- we deserve both.

With $20,000 you can help contribute to bring our 2nd line to life and bring more products to women on-the-go.  Over the last six months, we've designed, re-designed, tested, re-tested over 15 prototypes and now we're almost ready to move into production.  We have a few tweaks left, but we're almost there.  We think you'll love what we've built, but we need your help.
Any master piece takes time, but we're carefully refining your bags and will have them in your hands before the holidays.

I know, I know, November feels like a long way off, but crafting a great product takes time and we'd love to have you with us on the journey.  If you're in the market for a bag today, please check out our bestselling first bag, the Tracy 2-in-1 bag.  It's a stylish and convertible bag 2 in 1 bag that you can wear three ways.  It's available now on our website at www.taraand.co.

Like any startup, there are challenges and unforeseen circumstances.  However, we were able to ship the Tracy 2-in-1 bag early last year and have lots of experience bringing products to market.  We're confident that we can do it again.  Our products are close to being finalized, but we will continue to improve the bags aesthetically and functionally, so you will receive the best possible products.  That may mean tweaking, adding, or removing features to give you a better experience.

Production generally takes ~2 months of time to create, but can vary based on a number of factors including large quantity of units to create, differences in material, unclear specs etc.  Because our zippers are YKK and extremely high quality, they take over 20 days alone to order.  However, our team is experienced in design and production and we are confident that we'll get you a high quality product that you'll love.
If you’re inspired by our mission at Tara&
column2: Co and  want more products built for women on-the-go, we hope you’ll support our next line.  Any amount of contribution or sharing with friends via social media or email goes a long way.

column1: Our products would not be possible without you.  We hope you'll love our next line as much as we do.

• What does Tara mean?  The name, “Tara” is inspired and named after “Green Tara” the Buddhist mother goddess, who represents action, great strength, and the virtues of success in work and achievements.  We felt like this represented the women we were designing for.

• I'm not ready to buy a bag, but I love your mission and would love to support!  How can I help?  We'd love your help!  Please feel free to make a small donation to stay connected.  If you're not ready to buy, please help share our story with your family and friends.
<strong>Where can I learn more about Tara&amp
column2: Co?  You can learn more on our website: www.taraand.co
Co been featured?  Don't take our word for our bags being great, take a look at some of the press about us!  We've been featured in the publications below:

column1: Fast Company: These Are 8 Must-Have Pieces For Women’s Work Wardrobes.
Brit + Co: This New Convertible Bag Is a Working Woman’s Dream

column2: Co. is back with a triple play
Co brings on board advisory council

column1: San Francisco Chronicle: Shoulder season: The quest to create the perfect women’s work bag
LA Fashion Magazine: Fashion Meets Function

column2: Co Founder, Julia Lam, Combines Style and Comfort To Create the Perfect Purse

column1: • Finding Sanity in Your Crazy Life: Tara&

When will I receive my bag? We're targeting to have your bag in hand by end of November 2017, before the holidays arrive.   Although we try our best to ship on time, there are many factors that are out of our control and stated clearly in the ""Risk"" section of the campaign that may delay delivery.  We're committed to informing you of new timelines if needed.

Can I buy the pieces separately?  Yes, you have the option of buying just the core bag, or accessorizing it fully with a clutch of your choice making it a 2-in-1 (or in cases of the weekender, a 3-in-1) bag.

What is your return policy?  Products purchased through Indiegogo are part of our crowdfunding campaign and are an investment in our journey.  Contributions made here are non-refundable which is typical of crowdfunding contributions and is stated in your Indiegogo checkout.  We provide a steep discount to backers as a reward for being early on this journey with us.  We will only consider returns in case of manufacturing defects, and any acceptance of returns is up to our discretion.  Any products purchased directly through our website at www.taraand.co are subject to retail pricing and our Tara&

column5: Co a non-refundable 8% fee when you contribute to our crowdfunding campaign.  As a customer, you don't see this fee.  Between saving sales tax and this fee, you save up to an additional 16% of the retail product price.

column1: Do you have any other bags?  Yes!  If you can’t wait until November, check our Tracy 2-in-1 bag made out of a supple genuine leather at www.taraand.co that is available for delivery now.
Do you ship worldwide?  We currently only ship to the US and Canada.
How much is shipping?  Shipping costs vary depending on the package you buy.  If a package has been shipped, shipping cost is non-refundable under any circumstance.

• Is the clutch cross-compatible with the Tracy 2-in-1 bag?  Yes, it is.  If you already have a clutch from your Tracy bag, you can use it across all our bags in line 2 and vice versa.  Please see the clutch photo below for an example of what you will receive.
What are the dimensions of the bag?  Please check each bag category for the exact dimensions. *Specs are subject to change before production to build the best product possible.
Is sales tax included?  If you buy through our Indiegogo campaign, sales tax is included when we deliver the product which is up to an additional savings of 8% to you!  What a steal.

column1: Curious what products we're launching?  Learn about us in 1 minute or less.

I'm a former Facebooker, serial entrepreneur, and now the founder of Tara&Co where we re-imagine products for women on-the-go.  I lead a team of designers, mechanical engineers, and women like you who create beautiful accessories that provide both form and function for your everyday life.

Tara&Co was born out of my own need when I was running around from meeting to social event to a meeting doing business at my last company.  My shoulder hurt from carrying my laptop, and I was tipping over in my heels from the combined weight of it and all my other materials.  I thought, where are all the products for the women of today – Women who need to protect and carry their devices and have dynamic lifestyles that go from day to night?  Where are those products?
I couldn't find anything in market, so I decided to change that.

The name, “Tara” is inspired and named after “Green Tara” the Buddhist mother goddess, who represents action, great strength, and the virtues of success in work and achievements.  We felt like this represented the women we were designing for.

Our first solution to  build something sleek and elegant, but also functional and useful was the Tracy 2-in-1 Bag, which we officially launched in November 2017. Made of beautiful luxurious leather, it’s a 3-way convertible bag that can hold up to a 13” laptop and has a zip-off clutch. Yes, that’s right — it turns into two bags!
The Tracy was a hit. We were covered by Fast Company, Brit + Co, LA Fashion Magazine, and more. We launched with more than $110k of pre-sales and officially sold out in just a few short months.

Since my background is in startups, I approach building a new bag like building a novel tech product.  We survey women about what they want and what they need. We test our products continuously. We continue to reiterate our design based on such feedback.

It’s not easy to make something beautiful while creating a bag that looks great in multiple forms, but we have a great team of designers, mechanical engineers, and women like you, who prototype and build on those initial design ideas. Ultimately, we’re building products to solve problems in your everyday life.

And we’re just getting started.  My goal is to keep solving problems for women on-the-go — to support them by giving them products that are realistic for their lives today. Why should we have to compromise fashion for function? We deserve both.
Now, introducing our second line of bags: The 3-in-1 Danielle Weekender — your ideal weekend travel bag
column2: The 2-in-1 Heather Work Gym Bag — perfect for the active daily commuter
column3: and The 2-in-1 Sharon Minimalist Backpack Portfolio — for the efficient professional woman.

column1: This 3-in-1 bag is the new favorite travel buddy for women on-the-go
column2: our travel bag is the ideal TSA-friendly Weekender. The perfect travel bag as a flight carry-on or your road trip buddy with a stylish silhouette and design.  The Weekender features a 13” padded pocket and places for all your devices even including a zip-out pocket  that becomes your fold-out explorer day-pack (with your choice of a fold-out backpack or tote). This 3-in-1 bag holds your weekend clothes, toiletries, jacket and of course our attachable clutch in 5 different color options.

column1: Watch this 1 minute demo for all the highlights of this 3-in-1 bag travel bag (and a catchy song)!
Our woman on-the-go likes to travel.  When we spoke to her about what she needed in travel, three specific things came up again and again:

Her travel was dynamic, so she often felt like she didn’t have the right accessory for the right occasion. She usually traveled with a duffel for her clothes, a mid-sized bag for daytime exploring, and something small and chic to take out at night.

She ran out of power… all the time. She ended up being one of those people you see at the airport, sitting on the floor so her device could be plugged into the wall. So many of the women we surveyed shared a similar story, explaining that they ran out of power regularly and needed to carry an additional battery with them when they traveled.

She wanted a way to separate out things that were clean and dirty. When she was on the go, she didn’t want to have to worry about if the blouse she wanted to wear today got too close to yesterday’s well-worn outfit.
1) A larger, lightweight luxurious yet water-resistant nylon tote that can hold weekend clothes, toiletries, a jacket and more. With a 13” padded pocket, it comes with places for all your devices

2) A zip-out pouch on the larger bag becomes a fold-out explorer daypack. This daypack can fit a lightweight jacket, water bottle, book and more. Even better, there’s a choice of a fold-out backpack or tote to suit your needs.
3) A chic leather clutch comes in 5 different color options. With a removable strap and its own pocket for essentials, it’s the perfect bag to bring along to dinner or drinks.
Never worry again about getting your clothes dirty with your 3-way zip separate bottom compartment meant for shoes or soiled clothes.
Built in charger pocket to your weekender for exterior charging. *charger and cord not included.
Versatile Wear.  2-way wear with leather handles or with a removable hands-free crossbody strap.  Additional back travel sleeve to hook onto larger luggage.
Protects Devices.  Interior padded pocket for up to 13"" laptop and other interior pockets for your devices.
Pockets pockets pockets.  Additional pockets for your keys, sunglasses, and more.
Best Materials.  Made of a luxurious smooth nylon inside and out.  Handles made of genuine leather. YKK zippers.
Security and Durability.  Dual safety hook for clutch or key fob.  Bag feet on bottom.

Bag Dimensions: Height: 13.5”, Width: 17”, Depth 7"". Clutch: Height: 6.5”, Width: 11”, Removable Strap Length: 20”. Exterior made of lightweight luxurious yet water-resistant nylon. *Specs are subject to change before production to build the best product possible.  *Charger and cord not included.

This 2-in-1 bag is built for active women on-the-go. A perfect everyday work bag, with a small silhouette that fits your day-to-day commute and has a place for all your devices , gym accessories and more.  It expands when you need it to hold your gym shoes, heels, or anything else you'd need to keep separate.
We built the 2-in-1 Heather bag for women who carry devices and work out. When we started talking to this type of woman, there were two specific problems she mentioned:
She wanted a smaller everyday bag to hold and protect her devices – something that looked cute and chic and not oversized.
She often needed to carry a pair of extra shoes, whether to work out before or after work, or to transport with her on her daily commute.
And that's what we built.  Our Heather bag is the perfect everyday work bag with two fashionable yet functional silhouettes.

Our ""everyday"" smaller silhouette has organization to protect and hold your devices like a laptop (padded pocket for up to 13'' laptop), charger, phone and more. There's also ample space for active wear including a change of clothes, a water bottle, lock, hairbands, and more.
Zip down both sides for a 2nd silhouette which is a fully separated compartment. Use it for your gym shoes, heels, or dirty laundry. Open top allows you extra space as needed and ability to aerate.
Two bags that you can wear separately or together with our signature standalone smooth leather clutch.
Protects Devices.  Interior padded pocket for up to 13"" laptop.
Pockets pockets pockets.  Additional pockets for your keys, sunglasses, and more.  Fits everyday work life and gym essentials like a water bottle, lock, hairbands and more.
Best Materials.  Made of a luxurious smooth nylon inside and out.  Handles made of genuine leather. YKK zippers.
Versatile Use.  Smart design for flexible use of your elastic expandable shoe-holder pockets (in silhouette two) as water bottle holders (in silhouette one).
Security and Durability.  Dual safety hook for clutch or key fob.  Bag feet on bottom.

Bag Dimension: Height: 12"", Width: 15.5, Depth: 7.5"".  Top length in Silhouette 1 is 15"" in Silhouette 2 with pockets extended is 25"".  Clutch: Height: 6.5”, Width: 11”. Exterior material is a lightweight luxurious yet water-resistant nylon.  *Specs are subject to change before production to build the best product possible.

Almost 2"" wide, the thin 2-in-1 Sharon is for no-nonsense ladies with devices who love to stay organized. As a 3-way-zip portfolio-styled bag, it allows part-way access to a laptop or fully opens as a portfolio to grab your cords, headphones etc. This bag can be worn as a backpack or handheld, with or without our signature removable clutch.
This woman on-the-go for the Sharon is quite a minimalist.  She wants:
To carry less, but still have a place for everything.
Easy access for her laptop and distributed weight.
A more professional look when she needed it.
The Sharon has comfortable carry with 2-way wear.  You can wear it as backpack for distributed weight, or a handheld for a more professional look.

The bag also turns into two separate bags: 1) a luxurious nylon tote  2) a smooth genuine leather clutch with its own pocket and strap that you can wear together or apart.  Choice of 5 vibrant colors.
Fully open your portfolio-styled 2-in-1 Sharon which boasts a padded laptop pocket (up to 13""), 3 snaps for cords, two open pockets, one zippered pocket, 3 card slots, and a pen slot. Ooh la la.
Outside Pockets. Two additional outside pockets.  Large pocket in front for a computer charger or other item.  Open easy access phone pocket in the back.
Best Materials.  Made of a luxurious smooth nylon inside and out.  Handles made of genuine leather. YKK zippers.
Security and Durability.  Dual safety hook for clutch or key fob.  Bag feet on bottom.

Bag Dimensions: Height: 12”, Width: 12 3/4”, Depth: 1 3/4”.  Exterior material is a lightweight luxurious yet water-resistant nylon.  *Specs are subject to change before production to build the best product possible.

Our mission is to connect, elevate, and create products for women on-the-go so we name all of our products after women who inspire us.  Our first bag is named, “The Tracy,” was named after Tracy Chou – former Pinterest and Quora engineer and entrepreneur – for her work in diversity and inclusion in tech.  Her blog post spurred 250 tech companies to release their otherwise well guarded diversity numbers so we could have a real conversation about diversity.
This year, we took our inspiration from three more impactful women:

The 3-in-1 “Danielle” Weekender after Danielle Kayembe, the Founder and CEO of GreyFire Impact, for the work she’s done in social impact, supporting female entrepreneurs and bringing attention to the female-driven economy.
The 2-in-1 “Heather” Work Gym bag after Heather McPhie Watanabe, a 2x Olympic Mogul Skier, for being a trailblazing athlete, a mentor in skiing, and an accomplished woman in finance.

The 2-in-1 “Sharon” Minimalistic Portfolio Backpack after Sharon Tal Yguado who’s the Head of Genre Original Series at Amazon Studios, for continuing to innovate in media and rising in leadership at a Fortune 500 company.

We pride ourselves at Tara&Co for being able to provide you versatility for your dynamic lifestyle.  That means that our products have a lot of features. How do you pick just one?  (PS: You can pick as many as you like).
But ... if you have to choose just one, use the grid below to find your favorite features and see which Tara&Co bag is best for you.

We're a team of professional women, bag designers, and mechanical engineers.  I'm a former Facebook employee and longtime female founder.  We have a collaborative building philosophy so we constantly ask professional women what they want and need and design it into our bags.
We've talked to and tested our bags with hundreds of women.  Ladies love our new line.
We like to solve problems and build the products that women of today need.   We shouldn't have to compromise fashion for function -- we deserve both.

With $20,000 you can help contribute to bring our 2nd line to life and bring more products to women on-the-go.  Over the last six months, we've designed, re-designed, tested, re-tested over 15 prototypes and now we're almost ready to move into production.  We have a few tweaks left, but we're almost there.  We think you'll love what we've built, but we need your help.
Any master piece takes time, but we're carefully refining your bags and will have them in your hands before the holidays.

I know, I know, November feels like a long way off, but crafting a great product takes time and we'd love to have you with us on the journey.  If you're in the market for a bag today, please check out our bestselling first bag, the Tracy 2-in-1 bag.  It's a stylish and convertible bag 2 in 1 bag that you can wear three ways.  It's available now on our website at www.taraand.co.

Like any startup, there are challenges and unforeseen circumstances.  However, we were able to ship the Tracy 2-in-1 bag early last year and have lots of experience bringing products to market.  We're confident that we can do it again.  Our products are close to being finalized, but we will continue to improve the bags aesthetically and functionally, so you will receive the best possible products.  That may mean tweaking, adding, or removing features to give you a better experience.

Production generally takes ~2 months of time to create, but can vary based on a number of factors including large quantity of units to create, differences in material, unclear specs etc.  Because our zippers are YKK and extremely high quality, they take over 20 days alone to order.  However, our team is experienced in design and production and we are confident that we'll get you a high quality product that you'll love.

If you’re inspired by our mission at Tara&Co and  want more products built for women on-the-go, we hope you’ll support our next line.  Any amount of contribution or sharing with friends via social media or email goes a long way.
Our products would not be possible without you.  We hope you'll love our next line as much as we do.

What does Tara mean?  The name, “Tara” is inspired and named after “Green Tara” the Buddhist mother goddess, who represents action, great strength, and the virtues of success in work and achievements.  We felt like this represented the women we were designing for.

I'm not ready to buy a bag, but I love your mission and would love to support!  How can I help?  We'd love your help!  Please feel free to make a small donation to stay connected.  If you're not ready to buy, please help share our story with your family and friends.
Where can I learn more about Tara&Co?  You can learn more on our website: www.taraand.co
Where has Tara&Co been featured?  Don't take our word for our bags being great, take a look at some of the press about us!  We've been featured in the publications below:
Fast Company: These Are 8 Must-Have Pieces For Women’s Work Wardrobes.
Brit + Co: This New Convertible Bag Is a Working Woman’s Dream
SF Gate: Bag startup Tara & Co. is back with a triple play
Techcrunch: Women’s lifestyle startup Tara&Co brings on board advisory council
San Francisco Chronicle: Shoulder season: The quest to create the perfect women’s work bag
LA Fashion Magazine: Fashion Meets Function
Living Out Loud: Tara&Co Founder, Julia Lam, Combines Style and Comfort To Create the Perfect Purse
Free and For Me: Tara&Co has cool backpack purses
Finding Sanity in Your Crazy Life: Tara&Co Second Line

Geopieces is a social network based on geographical location using the google maps technology.
Geopieces allows you to publish content on the world map on the relevant geographical position.
Geopieces turns the whole world into your Message board!

You can share Ideas, Opinions and Information directly on the World map. The upcoming Geopieces App allows you to place a Pin whereever you are and let others know about it!
The Geopieces Webinterface has just launched and now we need your help to get the Apps on the market.
You can discover what is new in your region. Are there Events in your City coming up? Just check the map! You want to see what others have been up to in your region? Just check the map!
You can also meet new People in your region and around the world and see what they are up to! Geopieces enables you to put your Mark on the World!
So what is so special about Geopieces?

The upcoming Geopieces App lets you pinpoint your location with every contribution you make. Want to show were you are at? Just pin the map! Want to show where the cool spots are right now? Just pin the map! Whether you want to peddle your local offers, share reviews of special places or just document a road trip you have done, Geopieces is the right platform for you!
Get your own Place on the world map!

The whole map is split into squares 30m x 30m big, the so called Geopieces, which can be bought by the User.
Your Territory allows you to create special content on it that will be prominently displayed to any user crossing into your Geopiece and is always ranked on the top of the website´s newsfeed when users look up your region.
You can buy any Piece of the world which is owned by the System or sold by other users To claim Geopieces you can buy Geocredits and exchange them for your Piece of the world.

Findables are claimable Treasures on the map randomly assigned to Geopieces within yellow Map circles. Searching Geopieces within those yellow boundaries, or stepping on a winning Geopiece with the upcoming Geopieces App active, can net you Prices if you find one of the lucky Geopieces. The Prices are sponsored by Geopieces and its Partners.

The following is a list of the App features that are currently planned
Create your own user profile and display your information on your territories to communciate your ideas
Detailed search based on position and content
Place content wherever you are including text, links, video and pictures
A Follower system
Like and Favourite Buttons for all content
Owning and buying Geopieces on the world map
Earn Plattform currency through traffic on your territories and trade them on the market
Achievements and Treasure hunts on the map
What is project goal and who is the project for?

Generating Funds to program Apps for both iPhone and Android systems in order to allow the placement of content via Smartphone App on the Geopieces plattform and to find treasure and goodies on the map.
100% of App development costs will be covered via the project budget.
Social Gamers and Location based service enthusiasts – As a communication tool that does not comply to preset locations like exisiting services
Why should you support this project?
We let you do stuff others won´t!
Geopieces is the first Location based service that allows you to choose where to post information and create content on the world map.

• Each piece of information has their own unique map position
• Videos and pictures can be added to information
• Territories on the map can be bought by the user to add commercial or highlighted information. This featured information (local advertisement / local public relations) will be prominently displayed to regional visitors.

• Get the cheapest Geodollars to claim many cool spots on the map for yourself!
• Participate in supporter exlusive treasure hunts (Findables)
How will we use the money if the project is successfully funded?

The full sum will be invested in the creation and marketing of the Geopieces Smartphone Apps for iOs and Android systems.
Supporters will be getting Geodollars, at a better exchange rate, for their support in order to get the best spots on the world map, an exclusive offer for supporters.
Who are the people behind the project?
Erich Drazdansky (Founder), 57, 30 years experience as an investment consultant. Invests in future oriented businesses and helps them to enter the market.
Jörg Eibl (Founder), CTO, 29, 10 years experience in web design and an avid follower of internet trends. Founded his first business at 18 and has written all of the code for Geopieces.
Bernd Eibl, CMO, 27, Online Marketing Professional, managed the Online Marketing and Customer Care section for a large European Webplattform

Why we are working hard...

We are working tirelessly to help invigorate the camping industry as companies like Expedia and Priceline have done for the travel industry. We are embarking on this journey to innovate and simplify the way you search and book your camping trips and adventures online. Along the way, we hope to reunite your family, rejuvenate your spirit to travel, and discover places you haven't seen. We want to help create your journey from the beginning, and reward you when it ends, so you can begin to plan for the next one....

We are building an integrated website followed by a mobile app that will allow you to search campgrounds near your destination(s), review their amenities, facilities, attractions, photos, reviews and more. Once you find your perfect campground to stay, you can book your accommodations right through our site. In the future, we will partner with industry leaders so you can ""Add On"" camping gear and local attractions to create a One-Stop-Shop experience. After you have fun on your journey, you will receive reward points that can be accumulated and redeemed for travel or merchandise. We are also working on a tiered loyalty program that will include three levels, that would offer additional benefits for each tier you reach: Silver, Gold, and Platinum. All for simply using our site!
Start planning your adventure from our homepage. Search featured deals and download our mobile app
View the results of your search and browse through the campgrounds near your destination.
Explore the amenities, attractions, reviews and more. When you find that perfect fit...Book it!!!

We are seeking your support to help us build our platform and bring it to market. 

  • Approximately $30k will be used to develop the functionality of the site and mobile app.
column3: >The other $10k will be used to help market our site and complete our test phase to ensure our site functions as it is intended.

column1: For your contribution and support we have an array of perks that we are offering. Check out our perks along the side!

Our site will create a positive impact in the camping industry and will benefit not only campers, but campgrounds as well. There are many ""mom and pop"" campgrounds that are wonderful to stay, however they may not have the resources to market themselves. This creates challenges for independent campgrounds such as financial and operational inefficiencies. 

  • Our strategy has a proven track record in the hotel and airline industry. According to Kristi White , Director of Revenue Optimization at Travelclick, ""for some hotels, particulary in 2009, OTAs were an essential marketing channel for staying alive"". The number of reservations that flow in from OTAs like Expedia, have been increasing each year.
• According to Adobe Analytics, which obtained data between 2012 - 2014, ""OTA segment (like Expedia)has highest smartphone bookings growth at 110% since Jan 2013."" Link to report

• ""For the first six months of 2014, over 40 percent of Americans booked travel reservations — flights, hotels, cruises, for example — on mobile devices, up more than 20 percent for the same period last year, according to Criteo's new Travel Flash Report."" Link to Article

We realize that many RV parks and campgrounds are independent family businesses and the owners may not have the ability to offer online reservations. We want to change that. We want to help RV park and campground owners by making it easy for them to offer their campsites and cabins to customers online. We would like to integrate with their current reservation system, and display their available sites and cabins. If they do not have one, we would give them access to an online portal where they can manually input information to start.
We are committed to our future customers and will continue to evolve our site to ensure we continually create value and give them the tools and rewards they desire.
We are committed to our future partners and will collaborate with them to ensure all parties involved will be focused on creating added value for customers, organizations, and desired outcomes.
We are committed to our future employees to provide them with an environment that is collegiate, embraces new ideas,  with the ability to grow and make a difference.

Every new business comes with risks and challenges. We aren't exempt from that. Some of the risks and challenges include acceptance, timing, and market penetration. There may be some campgrounds that do not want to incorporate any new technology into their toolkit. Also, we may run into multiple hurdles that extends our timeline past our anticipated roll out date. The third challenge is market penetration. We realize we may encounter challenges in penetrating some markets on a timely basis for various reasons.
• We will work hard to educate campgrounds, that are shy in incorporating technology, on the financial, social, and operational benefits and guide them through the process of partnering with us.
• We will continue to work tirelessly to ensure we meet our goals, objectives, and time frame. We will continue to update how we are progressing so you will be able to follow and keep up to date.
• We will partner with industry leaders and industry associations as well as other marketing avenues to ensure we maximize our reach.
","To view the countries around the world that visited our crowdfunding campaign as of 6:30pm (CST) on December 4, 2014, click below...

Why we are working hard... We are working tirelessly to help invigorate the camping industry as companies like Expedia and Priceline have done for the travel industry. We are embarking on this journey to innovate and simplify the way you search and book your camping trips and adventures online. Along the way, we hope to reunite your family, rejuvenate your spirit to travel, and discover places you haven't seen. We want to help create your journey from the beginning, and reward you when it ends, so you can begin to plan for the next one....

We are building an integrated website followed by a mobile app that will allow you to search campgrounds near your destination(s), review their amenities, facilities, attractions, photos, reviews and more. Once you find your perfect campground to stay, you can book your accommodations right through our site. In the future, we will partner with industry leaders so you can ""Add On"" camping gear and local attractions to create a One-Stop-Shop experience. After you have fun on your journey, you will receive reward points that can be accumulated and redeemed for travel or merchandise. We are also working on a tiered loyalty program that will include three levels, that would offer additional benefits for each tier you reach: Silver, Gold, and Platinum. All for simply using our site!
Start planning your adventure from our homepage. Search featured deals and download our mobile app
View the results of your search and browse through the campgrounds near your destination.
Explore the amenities, attractions, reviews and more. When you find that perfect fit...Book it!!!
What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking your support to help us build our platform and bring it to market.   Approximately $30k will be used to develop the functionality of the site and mobile app. The other $10k will be used to help market our site and complete our test phase to ensure our site functions as it is intended.
For your contribution and support we have an array of perks that we are offering. Check out our perks along the side!

Our site will create a positive impact in the camping industry and will benefit not only campers, but campgrounds as well. There are many ""mom and pop"" campgrounds that are wonderful to stay, however they may not have the resources to market themselves. This creates challenges for independent campgrounds such as financial and operational inefficiencies.   Our strategy has a proven track record in the hotel and airline industry. According to Kristi White , Director of Revenue Optimization at Travelclick, ""for some hotels, particulary in 2009, OTAs were an essential marketing channel for staying alive"". The number of reservations that flow in from OTAs like Expedia, have been increasing each year.
According to Adobe Analytics, which obtained data between 2012 - 2014, ""OTA segment (like Expedia)has highest smartphone bookings growth at 110% since Jan 2013."" Link to report

For the first six months of 2014, over 40 percent of Americans booked travel reservations — flights, hotels, cruises, for example — on mobile devices, up more than 20 percent for the same period last year, according to Criteo's new Travel Flash Report."" Link to Article

We realize that many RV parks and campgrounds are independent family businesses and the owners may not have the ability to offer online reservations. We want to change that. We want to help RV park and campground owners by making it easy for them to offer their campsites and cabins to customers online. We would like to integrate with their current reservation system, and display their available sites and cabins. If they do not have one, we would give them access to an online portal where they can manually input information to start.

Ready For A Quality Divot Repair Tool That lasts?

To be frank, we're tired of cheap divot repair tools. They jam up when a little bit of dirt gets in them, they open in your pocket, they don't last, and you can't clip them anywhere. That's why we invented, Tanto.

column2: >Picture combining a high end knife with a divot repair tool. Sounds simple, but we guarantee you've never felt anything like it before.
column3: >What Makes It Different?
column5: >How We Did It?
column6: >Fit's Perfectly In Your Hand
column7: >Clips On Your Belt And Stays there.
column8: >And It's GREAT For Cleaning Those Grooves
column11: >Finally - A divot repair tool built to last.
column12: >
column13: >

column2:
Challenges

Tanto's product development team has years of experience creating successful products, manufacturing, and executing fulfillment on hundreds of thousands of orders internationally. We don't say that to gloat, but to give you the reassurance this isn't our first rodeo. We are incredibly confident in our ability to deliver Tanto to your mailbox, exactly as describe, by April 2020. This product is also not in the prototyping phase, so we have already handled short-run samples that we are VERY happy with. 

The main risks are with unforeseen delays. We have engaged our manufacturers during a very busy time of the year. That said, since we're air lifting the freight we won't run into any issues with customs or delay at sea port, and you should have your divot repair tool just in time for spring!

Cliffset: A case for clean eating. 

The portable, personal cutlery set that comes with its own cleaning tool.

 

Eating with flimsy, disposable plastic cutlery isn’t much fun for you—or the planet. In fact, plastic utensils are some of the most common bits of trash littering the world’s beaches, and among the biggest threats to the delicate ecosystems found in oceans, lakes, rivers, and streams.

And while Cliffset isn’t the only eco-friendly cutlery out there, just try getting dried-up guacamole off your bamboo fork without access to water, soap, and a brush.

 

 

Cliffset is different. It fits your on-the-go lifestyle with anywhere-clean eating in a compact yet durable case. 

Clean freaks, rejoice!

Our custom-contoured scraping tool works like it’s made for our cutlery—because it is. The ridges fit right between Cliffset’s fork tines to scrape off every last bit of uneaten food, while the straight and curved edges are perfect matches for Cliffset’s knife and spoon. 

 

The cleaning tool doubles as a sprayer to be refilled with your favorite no-rinse cleaning solutions. We love using pure lemon extract, a food-safe, no-rinse solution that’s perfect for on-the-go cleaning. Its ingredients: alcohol, water, and lemon oil- that’s it. While we aren't yet including it in our initial orders, pure lemon extract can be affordably purchased from most grocery stores. 

 

Let’s review.    

Want to see it in action?

 

Does the cleaning tool stay clean itself? Yup. We ruled out brushes, bristles, and textured scrubbing surfaces as they tend to entrap food particles.

Rather than the typical camping centric cutlery set, Cliffset is designed for everyday settings such as fast-casual restaurants, food trucks, and picnics where napkins are accessible.

Best practice, the cleaning tool serves as a rigid edge underneath your napkin to scrape that last bit of dried up food (which will form during engaging lunch conversations).

The tool houses a refillable sprayer for a final spritz of household, alcohol-based, no-rinse cleaning solutions (more on that below). Cliffset thus stays clean and ready for your next meal and adventure.

 

Infinitely reusable.

Made from food-grade 18/8 stainless steel with powder-coated handles, Cliffset can stand up to anything from dishwashers to petrified hummus. Durable. Sustainable. Portable. And exceptionally tasteful.

In case you forget to “Scrape - Spray - Sparkle,” Cliffset utensils are dishwasher-safe. You can even throw the case in the washing machine with your laundry.

 

Get lunch. Get clean. Get moving.

Living a fast-paced life doesn’t have to mean settling for disposables. With Cliffset, you can eat well and travel light.

 

Express yourself.

Our powder-coated stainless-steel handles come in a variety of colors, including no color at all. They’re elegant, ergonomically designed, and really, really ridiculously good-looking. Talk about the perfect dinner companion.
column2: >Ocean Beach Orange
column3: >Point Reyes Yellow
column7:
>Bolinas Black

You can choose your color(s) after completing a post-campaign survey, which you’ll receive closer to shipping day. 

 

Put it in your pocket.

Or your bag, car, or desk—without getting teriyaki sauce on everything else you own. With its custom compression-molded case, Cliffset can go anywhere, including the laundry. So you can eat. Clean. And carry on.

 

How do we measure up?

Quite well, thank you. Cliffset was engineered by an award-winning team. Forks, knives, and spoons are ergonomically designed for a comfortable hand-feel, full bites, and easy eating. The cutlery is compact, but sturdy enough for the heartiest of meals. And it all fits neatly into its custom case alongside the cleaning and scraping tool, where it stays clean and ready until your next meal.

 

Fill ’er up.

Pure lemon extract is a fantastic no-rinse/no-waste cleaner that’s affordable and available at most grocery stores. It lifts grease and evaporates quickly, leaving no residue. 

With just three ingredients: ~80% alcohol, water, and lemon oil—pure lemon extract is a simple, effective, and food-safe solution for on-the-go cleaning. Plus, it smells great and is natural enough to eat with wet utensils.

 

We recycled an old idea.

Traveling with one’s own cutlery is far from a new idea. People have been doing it for centuries—well before the first plastic spork was invented. Yet today, even given what we know about how plastic trash affects the planet and every creature on it, and even with a myriad of portable, reusable cutlery options out there, carrying one’s personal cutlery around just hasn’t quite taken off.

We wanted to find out why, so we did a little market research. 50% of our respondents told us that their cutlery was inconvenient to clean on the go, while 75% sheepishly admitted that they simply forget to bring it along. Plus, there’s a perception that disposable utensils are cleaner than reusable ones.

Oh hello, cutlery that comes with its own cleaning tool inside a custom case that’s easy to take wherever you go. Nice to see you in our purses and backpacks and glove boxes, staying all clean and shiny and ready for wherever life takes us. You wanna go out to dinner sometime?

 

Stainless steel crushes the competition.

Of course, there are other eco-friendly cutlery sets out there—like bamboo, which clings to guacamole like an unrequited high-school crush. Or edible cutlery, which is not nearly as delicious as it sounds. Or compostable cutlery. (Good luck finding a communal compost bin at your subway station, or remote parking lot, or even outside a restaurant.)

Stainless steel is sustainable, reusable, and can even be recycled when you’re done with it. (Which will probably happen like never, since stainless steel is also exceptionally durable.) 

Our goal? Zero waste.

© Zero Waste International Alliance

 

 

Who do we think we are?

I’m Cameron Drake, and before Cliffset, I learned a lot about the importance of sustainable, reusable, recyclable products that reduce waste. Partly because I lived on a boat—where I saw piles of plastic debris floating on the ocean—and partly because when I was on land, I got pretty tired of using plastic forks. 

In fact, I’m all about food and sustainability. At UC Berkeley, I wrote my thesis on the food packaging revolution that created this mess in the first place. I’m also a founding partner of San Francisco-based Good Use Juice, which makes delicious cold-pressed juices from surplus, misshapen, or oddly sized produce that would otherwise go to waste.     

 

Team Cliffset.

Cliffset simply wouldn’t be here without the help of incredibly talented, hard-working, and generous colleagues, friends, and family. 

What connects us all? Our belief in sustainability, environmental responsibility, and eating well wherever we go.

 

We’ve come a long way. 

And we’re counting on backers like you to get us over the finish line. Go, team, go!

 

We love our Mother. 

We’re a member of 1% for the Planet, a group of companies like Patagonia, Honest Tea, and OXO that are committed to positive environmental change here on Mother Earth. 

 

 

Easy to clean. Easy to carry. Easy to love.

Ready to join the movement? Back us on Kickstarter. We’re making it easy to save money—and the environment. Check out our reward tiers below.

Reducing plastic pollution is its own reward. But we think our backers deserve just a little more. The earlier you buy, the more you save. And the more you buy, the more you save. But remember, you’re not just saving money—you’re helping save the planet.

 

 

Let us reward you.

 

 

Near, far, wherever you are.

Or practically wherever you are. Maybe not Antarctica. Estimated shipping costs for one Cliffset are listed below. Actual shipping costs may vary based on timing and quantity. Shipping will be calculated and charged in the post-campaign survey. 

 

Shipping Estimates:

1x: US $7  //  International* $11

2x: US $9  //  International* $14

4x: US $11  //  International* $29

20x: US $29  //  International* $80

 

*European backers will be responsible for paying VAT.

 

Beta-testers on blast.

Here’s what people think of Cliffset.

Please go to www.cinchpopuptents.com to register your interest and purchase.

column1: Camping should be hassle-free, and give you more time to enjoy the great outdoors. That’s why we created Cinch! It’s the world’s biggest pop-up tent, and it has all the features you’d expect from a top-of-the-range dome tent – plus loads more, including solar power and heat regulation. Check out the graphic below for starters, and then read through the page for more details.
USE SOLAR POWER TO CHARGE ALL YOUR GADGETS
Keep your mobile phone, speakers and USB gadgets charged-up with our optional solar power pack.
• Solar panel fits on the roof of the tent and connects to power bank inside via weatherproof porta
• 13,000 mA-h power bank has two USB ports so you can charge two devices at the same time
• Stores enough electricity to charge an iPhone six times
• Detach pocket-sized power bank and keep your phone topped-up when on the move
• See Add-ons section below for how to order

Hot summer days are what camping’s all about, right? Except when you wake up like a sous-vide carrot. Tents have a tendency to absorb heat from the sun, which gets trapped by the insulating fabric. Great for those who like it hot – but not so much for others. Our optional heat and light regulating canopy works as a radiant barrier – reflecting heat from the sun and keeping you cool inside your tent. Made from ultra-reflective material, the canopy fits over the roof of the tent. You can attach it through the day, or overnight to prepare for a cool morning lie-in. It then folds up into a neat little bag, which you can store in the pocket inside your tent.
Cook, eat or relax outside your tent whilst still sheltering from the sun and rain, with the optional extended canopy.
• Functions as a standalone shelter, so you can take it on the move
• Folds down into small bag for storage in the tent
• See Add-ons section below for how to order

So what's a foot print? It's a separate groundsheet that's cut-to-size for each tent, that you place underneath your Cinch! to provide extra protection. It means that you can pack your tent away with out the base being dirty, and extend its lifespan. The foot print is a separate piece of material that packs into its own little bag. It's much easier to clean and less fiddly than unpacking and wiping down your tent when you get home. It's not essential by any means – but it's a great extra, and we've introduced it based on lots of requests from our backers.
Cinch! is packed with features that you’ll rarely find inside a pop-up tent:
• Groundsheet stitched to outer tent, keeping porch free of water and bugs
• Outer layer is made from 4000HH fabric – three times the industry standard for waterproofing
• Extra-thick, bathtub-style groundsheet. Nine-times industry standard for waterproofing: 12000HH

Night time is just as important as day when you’re camping, and just as fun. That’s why we’ve kitted out the Cinch! with LED tent pegs and light-reflective guylines to make your tent visible at night. This year, we’ve also added some luminous guylines which will stay visible even when no light source is shining on them. Plus you’ll get two LED torches with every tent. With a quick transformation, the torches turn into lanterns, and you can hang them from hooks on the roof.
LOADS OF SPACE YET EASY TO TRANSPORT
The Cinch! comes in 2-, 3- and 4-man sizes, and each is the biggest in its class. The 4-man is the biggest pop-up tent in the world, with 6.24 m2 living space.

Size was our first consideration when designing the range. Why should you have to compensate on space, for the convenience of a pop-up? Why not have both? Our tents have a huge internal living area, with two large porches that double up as storage areas next to each door. See the diagram below for full dimensions. The tent then packs down within a minute into a disc-shaped rucksack with all the kit, weighing just 5kg for the 2-man version.
Every Cinch! tent comes with a load of top-quality, lightweight kit – all of which packs down into one disc-shaped rucksack. Here’s what you’ll get:
Every Cinch! tent comes with three optional add-ons and two freebies:

See above for a full description of each. If you’d like to add the extended canopy and solar power pack to your order, once you’ve ordered your tent, please come back to this page, select the appropriate perk and go through checkout again.
Read what our customers have to say about Cinch:
• ""My Cinch tent is by far the best tent I have ever owned"" – Paul, UK
• ""I've gone mostly to festivals with my tent and it's always a great success because of the windows and the solar panel"" – Marco, Mexico
• ""SO EASY!! Putting it up, breaking it down!! Pure genius!! Especially with a two year-old and a four year-old running around wanting to go NOW!! A VERY quick break down!!"" – Daniele, USA
• ""Last summer I didn't stop answering questions and receiving compliments about our Cinch! We love it!"" – Kira, USA

Born in a field in 2009, Cinch! is the creation of Jake Jackson – a lifelong camper whose thwarted quests to find the right tent for festivals and weekends in the wilderness led him to his own workshop. Jake’s vision was ambitious yet simple: a tent should make camping fun, easy and cheap – not suck away your time, money and sanity.

 

Jake built the first prototype in his mum’s garage in Lancaster (there wasn’t much room in his workshop). He made it for himself – simply so he could have a reliable pop-up with a porch. Soon he was building tents for his friends, and then fellow campers, and he realised there was a blossoming business. Check out the images below to see how the Cinch! has developed since 2009.

Now Cinch! has a community of loyal customers around the world, whose support and feedback has shaped the product we have today. We ran our first crowdfunding campaign on Kickstarter in 2014, fulfilled our orders on time and went straight back to work on improving Cinch! even further.

Now we’re back with a version of Cinch! that redefines ultimate – and is ready to produce on a bigger scale than ever before. Please join us as a backer, and become part of our story. We can’t do this without you!
We want to get your Cinch! tent to you as soon as we can and here’s how we plan to do it:

We'd love to be able to cover costs for delivering the Cinch! around the world, but shipping is expensive for packages of this size and varies by location. However, we're doing our best to make shipping as cost-effective as possible for our backers.

We have offices in the UK, USA and Australia (please contact us to organise localised shipping to Australia) and have managed to get a localised shipping rates for these countries – but doing so for other countries would need a number of backers to make it feasible. Shipping costs are listed below. If we get enough orders from your country to organise localised shipping, we'll recalculate the costs and refund you the difference.

If you are from a country and would love a tent but can’t pay postage then reach out to us and if we get enough of you then we can significantly lower these costs. If your country is not listed and you think it should be, then get in touch and we can get shipping prices to you, we will ship anywhere in the world.

The Cinch! is the ultimate pop-up tent, and that’s a claim we don’t make lightly – but naturally it sets the bar very high indeed. We’ve spent years developing and refining the idea, and we’ve worked extremely hard to get the product ready for Indiegogo, so we’re not prepared to execute it poorly. We’ve run successful crowdfunding campaigns for Cinch! before, so we know exactly what we’re doing. But here are what I see as some of the risks:

MANUFACTURING: This is a process where many things can go wrong, but we already have six years’ experience in manufacturing the tent, and have robust plans in place for all eventualities. We’re confident that our manufacturer can handle the size of the production run – we’ve identified a partner with the capacity to scale-up easily – and we plan to personally oversee all the important stages of the manufacturing process.

PRODUCT ADJUSTMENTS: As we gear up the Cinch! for production, it’s likely that we’ll make some minor adjustments to improve the final product. What you see on this page is the minimum of what you’ll get – we’ve made a big claim and we won’t cut any corners to get there. Our prototype is already based on a successful market product – in our standard Cinch! tent – and most of its features have been suggested as improvements by our customers, and negotiated in detail with our experienced manufacturer. Adjustments will always be for the benefit of you, our customer, and we will let you know exactly how, when and why they are made.

FULFILMENT: Sometimes we’re faced with an unpredictable situation – e.g. a supplier misses a deadline, there’s a breakdown of machinery, or a shipment gets lost. Those things can cause a delay. However to minimise the possibility of any setbacks, we have backup factories at the ready, and I will be personally orchestrating the communication between our suppliers, all the way through to delivering your order to your door.

We are working with manufacturers who have years of experience delivering large quantities of excellent-quality products in the outdoor industry. Undoubtedly there will be some surprises along the way, but we’re confident that our knowledge, expertise and experience will deliver the highest-quality Cinch! tent to you, on-time and on-budget.

Any pledge that you’re able to make brings us one step closer to achieving our goal, and finally giving the camping community the kind of tent it deserves. Help us make the Cinch! a success by clicking the ‘Back This Project’ button at the top of the page, or by helping us spread the word by sharing our page. THANK YOU SO MUCH for your help!

","Please go to www.cinchpopuptents.com to register your interest and purchase.
MEET CINCH! – THE ULTIMATE POP-UP TENT

Camping should be hassle-free, and give you more time to enjoy the great outdoors. That’s why we created Cinch! It’s the world’s biggest pop-up tent, and it has all the features you’d expect from a top-of-the-range dome tent – plus loads more, including solar power and heat regulation. Check out the graphic below for starters, and then read through the page for more details.
USE SOLAR POWER TO CHARGE ALL YOUR GADGETS
Keep your mobile phone, speakers and USB gadgets charged-up with our optional solar power pack.
Solar panel fits on the roof of the tent and connects to power bank inside via weatherproof porta
13,000 mA-h power bank has two USB ports so you can charge two devices at the same time
Stores enough electricity to charge an iPhone six times
Detach pocket-sized power bank and keep your phone topped-up when on the move
See Add-ons section below for how to order

Hot summer days are what camping’s all about, right? Except when you wake up like a sous-vide carrot. Tents have a tendency to absorb heat from the sun, which gets trapped by the insulating fabric. Great for those who like it hot – but not so much for others. Our optional heat and light regulating canopy works as a radiant barrier – reflecting heat from the sun and keeping you cool inside your tent. Made from ultra-reflective material, the canopy fits over the roof of the tent. You can attach it through the day, or overnight to prepare for a cool morning lie-in. It then folds up into a neat little bag, which you can store in the pocket inside your tent.
Cook, eat or relax outside your tent whilst still sheltering from the sun and rain, with the optional extended canopy.
Functions as a standalone shelter, so you can take it on the move
Folds down into small bag for storage in the tent
See Add-ons section below for how to order

So what's a foot print? It's a separate groundsheet that's cut-to-size for each tent, that you place underneath your Cinch! to provide extra protection. It means that you can pack your tent away with out the base being dirty, and extend its lifespan. The foot print is a separate piece of material that packs into its own little bag. It's much easier to clean and less fiddly than unpacking and wiping down your tent when you get home. It's not essential by any means – but it's a great extra, and we've introduced it based on lots of requests from our backers.
Cinch! is packed with features that you’ll rarely find inside a pop-up tent:
Groundsheet stitched to outer tent, keeping porch free of water and bugs
Outer layer is made from 4000HH fabric – three times the industry standard for waterproofing
Extra-thick, bathtub-style groundsheet. Nine-times industry standard for waterproofing: 12000HH

Night time is just as important as day when you’re camping, and just as fun. That’s why we’ve kitted out the Cinch! with LED tent pegs and light-reflective guylines to make your tent visible at night. This year, we’ve also added some luminous guylines which will stay visible even when no light source is shining on them. Plus you’ll get two LED torches with every tent. With a quick transformation, the torches turn into lanterns, and you can hang them from hooks on the roof.
LOADS OF SPACE YET EASY TO TRANSPORT
The Cinch! comes in 2-, 3- and 4-man sizes, and each is the biggest in its class. The 4-man is the biggest pop-up tent in the world, with 6.24 m2 living space.

Size was our first consideration when designing the range. Why should you have to compensate on space, for the convenience of a pop-up? Why not have both? Our tents have a huge internal living area, with two large porches that double up as storage areas next to each door. See the diagram below for full dimensions. The tent then packs down within a minute into a disc-shaped rucksack with all the kit, weighing just 5kg for the 2-man version.
Every Cinch! tent comes with a load of top-quality, lightweight kit – all of which packs down into one disc-shaped rucksack. Here’s what you’ll get:
Every Cinch! tent comes with three optional add-ons and two freebies:

See above for a full description of each. If you’d like to add the extended canopy and solar power pack to your order, once you’ve ordered your tent, please come back to this page, select the appropriate perk and go through checkout again.
Read what our customers have to say about Cinch:
My Cinch tent is by far the best tent I have ever owned"" – Paul, UK
I've gone mostly to festivals with my tent and it's always a great success because of the windows and the solar panel"" – Marco, Mexico
SO EASY!! Putting it up, breaking it down!! Pure genius!! Especially with a two year-old and a four year-old running around wanting to go NOW!! A VERY quick break down!!"" – Daniele, USA
Last summer I didn't stop answering questions and receiving compliments about our Cinch! We love it!"" – Kira, USA

We wanted to make a travel bag that was extremely functional.  We knew it had to be high quality, durable, and versatile.  This was our idea:
We spent a year prototyping, evaluating, and testing.  Here is the final product...
Introducing the most functional travel bag you'll ever own:
It can also be a backpack (because why not?)

column2: >
column3: >Backpack straps can be hidden inside the zipper pocket when not in use
>You can also wear it as a crossbody bag

column1: We decided, why stop at just one bag? The front pockets detach and become separate bags!  Now you have a weekender, a backpack, and a sling bag!

column2: >
>
>

column1: The Travel Cord Organizer takes care of your wires. It helps you manage your earphones, chargers, hard drives, extra batteries, and anything that has a wire. It also has a small zipper pocket to store your USB flash drives.

column2: >
column3: >Example of items that can be organized in the Travel Cord Organizer

column1: The Toiletry Kit lets you compartmentalize your bathroom essentials. There are open pockets for shampoo, conditioner, body wash, shaving cream, deodorant, toothpaste, toothbrush, whatever you want. The zipper pockets can hold floss, Q-tips, razor, extra pair of contacts, medicine, and more.

column3: >Example of items that can be organized in the Toiletry Kit

column1: The JW Weekender was thoughtfully designed for the jet setting professional. There’s a pocket for everything.
The JW Weekender was thoughtfully designed for the jet setting professional. There’s a pocket for everything.

column2: >
>
>
>

column3: >The JW Weekender fits perfectly inside the overhead bin

column1:
We developed our materials with the same suppliers that high end brands do business with to help ensure its quality and integrity.  Each material was tested, evaluated, and re-valuated.  No detail is too small.       

NAVY

column2: >

column1: The casual nylon has a smaller weave than the ballistic nylon, but it is as durable and as abrasion resistant as the ballistic nylon.   We wanted a casual nylon because the fabric looks canvas-like from a distance, and it gives the JW Weekender a more carefree feel.

column2: >

column1: We have tested our bag to make sure the material and construction pass the normal wear and tear of everyday use, plus more.
45lbs of weight was placed in the bag for below tests.
Both handle straps were jerked 1250 times together, and then each handle was jerked 625 times.  Jerked a total of 2500 times.  Test results:  hardware and handle straps were ok.  No breakage.

Both backpack straps were jerked 1250 times together, and then each backpack strap was jerked 625 times. Jerked a total of 2500 times.  Test results: hardware and backpack straps were ok.  No breakage.
Top handle was jerked a total of 2500 times.  Test results: top handle and seams were ok.  No breakage.
Crossbody strap was attached to the weekender.  It was jerked a total of 2500 times. Test results: hardware and crossbody strap were ok. No breakage.
20lbs of weight was placed in the detachable backpack for below tests.
Top handle was jerked a total of 2500 times. Test results: top handle and seams were ok. No breakage.
Both backpack straps were jerked 1250 times together, and then each backpack strap was jerked 625 times. Jerked a total of 2500 times. Test results:  backpack straps and seams were ok. No breakage.

column2: >
>

We developed our materials with the same suppliers that high end brands do business with to help ensure its quality and integrity.  Each material was tested, evaluated, and re-valuated.  No detail is too small.       NAVY
Close-up of the two nylon fabrics

The casual nylon has a smaller weave than the ballistic nylon, but it is as durable and as abrasion resistant as the ballistic nylon.   We wanted a casual nylon because the fabric looks canvas-like from a distance, and it gives the JW Weekender a more carefree feel.
We have tested our bag to make sure the material and construction pass the normal wear and tear of everyday use, plus more.
45lbs of weight was placed in the bag for below tests.

20lbs of weight was placed in the detachable backpack for below tests.
Top handle was jerked a total of 2500 times. Test results: top handle and seams were ok. No breakage.
