We Are Really Accomplishing This. Thank You! Between this site, our website, checks in the mail, and a few donations of needed services, We've raised about $20,000.00. We have paid an architect to start drawings and are almost done with the full business plan. We continue forward with the various consultants for the complete integrated design and safety aspects... So lets keep trucking!

column2: >Now is your opportunity to contribute and provide you, your family, your friends, your employees and your associates YEARS of entertainment at this Rock Bottom Price opportunity. Most likely this risk will end up giving them memories that are sure to provide fantastic stories for generations to come!

column1: During a visit to Twisted Adventures, you will get to play and challenge each other and yourselves on over 500 aspects of these thrilling features:
• Aerial Ropes Challenge Courses – Largest Indoor Course in the USA covering 100,000 S/F
• Indoor Snow Park and Ice Room with Ice Climbing/Repelling Walls
• Trapeze, Cardio Track, Velcro Wall, Zorb Court
• Pet Park, Mud Challenge, Toddler, Teen and Adult Play-Place Gerbil Climbers
• Fully Sanctioned BMX Bike Stadium Course Dirt Track and Off-road Segway Racing
• Speed Climbing Course and Wipe-Out Style Foam Challenge Course
• Large Full Service Fine Dining Restaurant, Café and Sports Bar
• Indoor Large Screen Video Displays Showing Landscape and Arizona Scenery and Live-Feed of the Patrons
• Large Outdoor Special Events Area for Singular Events such as Motocross and BMX Championship Series, Concerts, Monster Truck Meets with Parking for Several Thousand Attendees.

Have kids - never fear! Twisted Adventures is designed to Thrill and Entertain All Ages from 2 - 99! And yet, this is no toddler free for all. We've conceptualized and designed it to be Individually Fun and Exciting, while Family Oriented and Challenging to All!

Still not sure? You did notice wake boarding / surfing right? How about the indoor snowpark? Ice climbing or snowboarding anyone? Maybe just a good 'ole fashioned snowball fight - in July.  Zorbs (just think human hamster balls). Not a BMX'er or a Skater? How about offroad Segway racing? You've seen Mall Cop right? We are stepping it up a notch!

Twisted Adventures was conceptualized by native Phoenicians and lifelong friends who have also done a fair amount of traveling. We have lived, raised our children and run our businesses here. We love Arizona! However, there are no amusement parks - and its the 5th largest city in the USA.

We are also huge advocates for getting out and playing - not just sitting on a couch. We have done a lot of water sports, zip lining excursions and ropes challenges. One day, the question was asked ""Why can't this be done in Phoenix?"" And so, we set to work figuring out all the ""why nots""... and Twisted Adventures was born! Because it CAN Be Done, and It Will WORK!

Our Site is a Quarter of a Million Square Foot, Air Conditioned facility, sitting on 18 acres in Central Phoenix. It is all about spending your time with friends, family and like minded people that want challenge with their fun!

We have strong interest from several investment groups for the full funding - the $12 Million part - but can't get full commitment without all of the results this next phase of due-diligence provides.
The success of this campaign will also demonstrate just how much Phoenicians and Visitors to Arizona like to get out and do stuff and will come to Twisted Adventures!

We need about a $130,000 to keep moving forward. We have a substantial amount of groundwork already completed. This includes a hold on our preferred site, zoning and city approval, preliminary engineering, and a commissioned study from ASU which validates the feasibility. So far, this has all been accomplished from our personal resources.

For any of you that know the industry, you'll be glad to hear we also have Larry Mackenzie - a highly experienced, Senior Executive from the Cedar Fair Entertainment Company (Six Flags) family of parks who built and managed amusement parks for over 35 years - ready to move to Phoenix, help us build it, run it and make it tons of fun and a huge success!

This Campaign is to get the design drafts from our architects, pay the accountants, the engineers, and the developers and consultants. All funding we receive will go immediately towards paying them. Here's the approximate breakdown:

column8: City of Phoenix - Preliminary Design Draft Review and Licenses: $5,000.00
column10: First Aid and Security Deposit for Site Specific Design: $10,000.00
column11: Information Technology Site Specific Design Drafts: $10,000.00

column1: This park is a much needed attraction for the State of Arizona. The ability to come play at this extreme amusement park will be valued by every parent, child, teenager and single adult who lives in Arizona or comes here for business or pleasure! It will be the perfect place to take a date, come skate and ride for the day (in a safe environment), take your whole family for a day or two of play.  We will be open days, nights and weekends - year round! Have a conference in Phoenix but alread know there is not enough to do here to bring the whole family? Now there will be! Meet in the evenings for a great dinner, watch the entertaining action of people out on the features - or watch a good game in the bar... the list goes on and on.

column2: >Join us now! On the right, you will find numerous Perks... These are options for how you can benefit by helping now. It’s not “one size fits all,"" so we are confident you’ll find something for you. We even have a great option for those of you that don't live in Phoenix, but want to play here more. Please take a look and contribute now.

column1: Most Perks ONLY HAVE VALUE WHEN (if)
We Open Our Doors for Business.
In addition to the Perk, as a ""Twisted Pioneer Contributor,"" You will also get:

An invitation to a Pioneers meeting - as soon as we reach our minimum we  will host an event to say thank you and share our plans as well as your ideas, suggestions, feedback, etc. Because lets face it - you are contributing to Twisted Adventures - and we know you've got great ideas too!

Invitation to Pioneers Pre Grand Opening... Yep, all of us who are ""going for it"" to get Twisted Adventures built... will also get to come to an early grand opening for a day or two and play - just us Pioneers!

15% Discount for all food / beverage / gift shop purchases (exclude alcohol).

Half Off Twisted In-House Events... Such as “Neon Zipping,” “Black Out Zipping,” “Movies in The Park,” “Bubble Runs,” etc. It does not include Seasonal Mazes, Concerts, or events NOT hosted by Twisted Adventures.

“Stay / Day Camp Adventure Passes” at 50% off for up to 3 youths per year – family or not. These will be camps geared towards life skills and play including individual empowerment and responsibility, urban survival, desert survival, self defense, swimming, education assistance, etc.

If you love the idea but can't contribute right now - You can still help! Please pass the word around and tell all your friends and associates. In Person, Through Email, Online, Through Social Media... There are all kinds of ways.
We are available any time! Please feel free to contact us.
Thank You for Your Time - and Your Contribution!

Soaclean is an innovative device that will make cleaning easier and more diverse. By combining ultrasonic vibration and dual-direction turbo washing, Soaclean redefines portable cleaning.  All you need to do is just to turn it on and put in into water, and it will automatically clean for you.

The dirt will be cleaned up in 3 minute arrangement. More efficient operation of Soaclean can save you time and money.

Soclean is compact and lightweight, it’s easy to carry for your leisure or business trip.

Soaclean uses a variety of cleaning methods, it has completely changed the washing technology. It can allow you to reach unprecedented cleanliness.

Soaclean has the function of automatic washing.For example, your clothes will take 30 minutes to complete washing. However, for fruits and vegetables it only takes 5 minutes. What you need to do is just disconnect the power plug.

Soaclean provides you with clean clothes anytime and anywhere.

 ""put in model"" design has a wider range of use. In the life there are articles that cannot be cleaned up with an ordinary washing machine or a dishwasher,Soaclean is perfect choice. With Soaclean, the ""Hand Wash Only"" label is no longer applicable.

Soaclean produces modulated ultrasound, which cleans at micro level.

Ultrasound carries the sound energy continuously into the water and detonates countless micron sized bubbles. Each bubble will cause an instantaneous high temperature of up to 1000 atmospheres, oscillation, emulsification, and stripping dirt.

Do you remember the clothes that were damaged by traditional washing machine? With the latest technology  Soaclean is gentle to clothes, but troublesome for dirt. 

There is a function of imitating hand washing, it uses a rotating turbine to bring along a gentle flow of water to clean, to simultaneously conduct positive inversion. It can be used for silk, and it does not harm clothes.

Life is quiet and beautiful, and we made its level of noise only 50DB.

Compared with ordinary washing machines, Soaclean consumes 1/10 of power, less than 2% of water, saves resources and takes care of the environment.
column13: >1.What is the ultrasonic laundry technology?
column18: >Ultrasonic technology is the result of ultrasonic waves. It is an oscillating sound pressure wave whose operating frequency is beyond the human hearing range. In the water, these powerful waves create a process called cavitation that creates bubbles for cleaning. This technology has been used in medical and industrial fields for many years, which is a powerful cleaning way.
column33: '>What is the steps for a complete washing?
column36:
>

   A. Inject a certain amount of water into a clean container
column37:
B. Put the stuff into the container.
   C. Add the laundry liquid or powder.
   D. Connect to the power supply.
   E. After 30 minutes, unplug the power.
column50: >3.What is the size of the machine?
column55: >The size of the machine is 130mm X 130mm X 53mm, so it is very portable.
column68: >4.What is the differences between the first generation product and Soaclean?
column71:
>

A. It takes less time for a complete washing, which is 30 minutes.
B. It consumes less power and its power automatically off after a 30-minute operation.
C. It is equipped with diversified modes.
column84: >5.What is the estimated delivery date?
column87:
>

It will be delivered in November. We will produce and ship the product ASAP.
column100: >6.How much laundry can I wash at one time?
column105: >We recommend that the items for washing is less than 4 pounds. Soaclean is not suitable for washing the heavy items such as jeans and bedding.
column118: >7.Can Soaclean replace my washing machine?
column123: >For people who travel a lot and small families, Soaclean is the perfect washing machine replacement. It helps you save water, space and energy - especially if you don't have a lot of clothing.
column136: >8.What should I pay attention to when using Soaclean?
column139:
>

  When the machine is working, please keep your children and pets away from it in case of stumbling.
  Do not put your hands into the water when it is working, the laundry may entangles with your hands or may contact with the rotating turbine.
  If the abnormal situation arises (like odor, smoke, abnormal noise, excessive heat), please stop operating the machine immediately.

In the life there are articles that cannot be cleaned up with an ordinary washing machine or a dishwasher,Soaclean is perfect choice. With Soaclean, the ""Hand Wash Only"" label is no longer applicable.Soaclean produces modulated ultrasound, which cleans at micro level.Ultrasound carries the sound energy continuously into the water and detonates countless micron sized bubbles. Each bubble will cause an instantaneous high temperature of up to 1000 atmospheres, oscillation, emulsification, and stripping dirt.Do you remember the clothes that were damaged by traditional washing machine? With the latest technology  Soaclean is gentle to clothes, but troublesome for dirt. There is a function of imitating hand washing, it uses a rotating turbine to bring along a gentle flow of water to clean, to simultaneously conduct positive inversion. It can be used for silk, and it does not harm clothes.Life is quiet and beautiful, and we made its level of noise only 50DB.Compared with ordinary washing machines, Soaclean consumes 1/10 of power, less than 2% of water, saves resources and takes care of the environment. 1.What is the ultrasonic laundry technology?Ultrasonic technology is the result of ultrasonic waves. It is an oscillating sound pressure wave whose operating frequency is beyond the human hearing range. In the water, these powerful waves create a process called cavitation that creates bubbles for cleaning. This technology has been used in medical and industrial fields for many years, which is a powerful cleaning way.  2.What is the steps for a complete washing?   A. Inject a certain amount of water into a clean container
column140: B. Put the stuff into the container.   C. Add the laundry liquid or powder.   D. Connect to the power supply.   E. After 30 minutes, unplug the power.  3.What is the size of the machine?The size of the machine is 130mm X 130mm X 53mm, so it is very portable.  4.What is the differences between the first generation product and Soaclean?A. It takes less time for a complete washing, which is 30 minutes.B. It consumes less power and its power automatically off after a 30-minute operation.C. It is equipped with diversified modes.  5.What is the estimated delivery date?It will be delivered in November. We will produce and ship the product ASAP.  6.How much laundry can I wash at one time?We recommend that the items for washing is less than 4 pounds. Soaclean is not suitable for washing the heavy items such as jeans and bedding.  7.Can Soaclean replace my washing machine?For people who travel a lot and small families, Soaclean is the perfect washing machine replacement. It helps you save water, space and energy - especially if you don't have a lot of clothing.  8.What should I pay attention to when using Soaclean?  When the machine is working, please keep your children and pets away from it in case of stumbling.  Do not put your hands into the water when it is working, the laundry may entangles with your hands or may contact with the rotating turbine.  If the abnormal situation arises (like odor, smoke, abnormal noise, excessive heat), please stop operating the machine immediately.",47.0,0,"1 Campaign

column4: >BEHIND THE INDIAN VEIL: A JOURNEY THROUGH WEDDINGS IN INDIA SELF-PUBLISHING HARDCOVER PRINT DRIVE

column1: The purpose of this campaign is to
raise enough funds to self-publish Behind the Indian Veil: A Journey Through Weddings in India, an extraordinary visual journey through uncharted wedding
traditions in India.
FRIENDS, FAMILY, COLLEAGUES, PEOPLE OF THE WORLD,
documentary photographer based in India since 2002 and am always involved in

column2:
>
I have published books in the past. My first book in India, Street Food of India, came out in 2010, won international acclaim and published worldwide.

column1: Now, after more than six years of work on my latest project, I am ready to publish my new book 'Behind The Indian veil
– A Journey Through Weddings in India'. Designed by award-winning
photo-book designer Tania Das Gupta, this exquisite coffee table album is filled
with breathtaking photographs of wedding rituals in India and the astonishing
stories behind them. A book I am truly proud of, and one I am certain you will appreciate

Despite all the changes of the digital age and in the publishing world, there is still no better medium for most artistic photography than a real book. I wish to take a more independent route this time, and self publish this book instead of going through a publishing house. However, independent publishing still unfortunately
depends (and in that way not so “independent” as it appears to be) on funding.
your support in the final stages of production and you have an opportunity to
be a part of a great project. If enough of us get behind it, we can make this
Even if I do not manage to raise the entire amount from this campaign your contribution will get me one step closer to the target. The book will be published but it will be easier with your support.
Your help and support means the world to me!
After six years of working on this
project, I have experienced, witnessed and documented a huge variety of Indian weddings.
Being a foreigner in India can be
quite challenging at times, but it also has enormous advantages. As I traveled
throughout India, I was invited into sacred places and intimate moments
normally inaccessible to outsiders. The incredible array of stories I was able
to capture reveals cultures, traditions, and legacies as complex and diverse as
The idea is to start a conversation.
Why? Because it’s an intriguing conversation to have. What we do is one thing.
How we do it is another. Wherever in the world we call home, we share rituals
similar in intention but unique in their expression. Behind the Indian Veil reveals the differences and similarities in Indian wedding traditions, while
seeking the common essence of this grand, colorful, fantastic celebration.
And in doing so takes us on a journey that in one way or another resonates with
us whether we’re Indian or not.
from a vast assortment of Indian communities such as Tamil Brahmin, Bengali, Sikh,
Hindu Punjabi, Hyderabadi Muslim, Rajput, Kashmiri Pandit, Ladakhi Buddhist,
Goan Catholic, Syrian Christian, Zoroastrian Parsi, Dawoodi Bhora, and Kodava
I am an established documentary and travel photographer with more than twenty-five years of experience. Before
relocating to India, I was a commercial photographer in Israel, where I
established a successful commercial photography studio and served as president
My family and I moved to India more
than twelve years ago in search of somewhere to live our lives and fulfill our
dreams. From the moment we arrived, we felt at home. So we made it ours. I have
witnessed traditions buried so deep in the subconscious of the subcontinent
that even people from India don’t necessarily know about them.
It is here in India that my body of
work expanded into the most extraordinary places. My work has won awards and I have been published in international publications,
including The New York Times, The Guardian, and Condé Nast
Traveler. My first book, Street Food of India, received international
acclaim, including the Best Cookbook Photography 2010 award in the UK, a
nomination for Best in the World at the prestigious Gourmand Awards in Paris,
and was a favorite in The New York Times top ten best cookbooks of 2010.
share traditions that may, one day, become so diluted they are lost forever.
Too many of these rituals from one of the oldest cultures in the world have
already become shortened into representations of what they used to be.
towards empowering the self-publishing community. I learned so much from my
experience of having my first book – Street Food of India – published by a
publishing house here in India. The book, which won several international
awards, taught me about the complications of relationships between publishers
and artists, and that their different agendas don’t necessarily go hand in
always been a huge concern of mine. I want to be able to circumvent the often
limiting and discouraging complexities of this relationship and demonstrate that self-publishing is a desirable and viable option for
professional artists. I want to move towards being less dependent on mainstream
publishing and more towards putting the power of the photo back into the hands
HOW MANY PAGES WILL THE BOOK BE?

The book is going to be size 10""x11"" with 144 pages and printed on high quality IRIS paper. The book itself will be available in high resolution PDF form and as high quality offset printed 10""x11"", 144 pages coffee table book.
We will also have a limited casebound special edition.
$42,000 SEEMS LIKE A LOT OF MONEY FOR PRINTING A BOOK. HOW DID YOU COME UP WITH THIS FIGURE?

Here is what I wish to accomplish from this IndieGoGo campaign: I wish to make a beautiful book you could not get any other way than making a full print run. I promise to over deliver and make a product that will make everyone really happy. I do not not have a room full of books at home after I've fulfilled all the rewards. Have enough money to overcome unexpected obstacles that will surely come up along the way.

Book printing is expensive as a lump sum. Shipping books is even more expensive. My time and the time of people who I need to hire to help me is even more expensive than that. To add to that I would really want to surprise you with little extras here and there. This is all factored into the goal and includes a small buffer to enable some level of comfort in meeting those priorities above. In those terms, the goal isn't actually that high. I think of IndieGoGo as a way to make something much better than what I'd be able to do without your support. Reaching the goal will bring me to a position to do great things and you've already proven that when people care and want it can actually happen. I am so proud and honoured to have you with me on this journey.
<li>Hire an experienced writer for the narrative sections
• Engage a key public figure to write the foreword
• Launch in New York City, London, Rome..?
essence of an Indian wedding has been collaborative from the beginning. While
shooting a wedding in Madurai, a holy city in south India, a guest approached
me and asked if I had ever experienced a Syrian Christian wedding… and would I
like to come to Coimbatore right now to do so. I hopped on board and that first 133-mile trip snowballed into countless last minute tips and just as many spur-of-the-moment
trips to get that one more shot.
been astounding – I was welcomed into spaces I never expected to see in my

life. At one point I got caught sneaking shots at a mosque during a mass wedding of 319 Dawoodi Bhora couples in Mumbai. I was brought before the Mullah but Instead of kicking me out as I expected, he welcomed
I know people feel my conviction and
the importance of this book’s cultural representation. They appreciate my
absolute dedication to capturing the essence of one of the most important days
of their lives. I feel their respect and gratitude towards me for taking
the time, as a foreigner, to learn so much about their culture and care so
with more than 50,000 photos and experiences my imagination could never have
pictured. I begin a new one by stepping into self-publishing these poignant and
provocative stories, paying tribute to the couples and their loved ones, and
enabling future generations to witness the history that brought them to this
Even if you can’t financially support the campaign
right now – no worries! You can also participate by passing along the link to anyone and everyone you know. Who knows who
they might know and where this part of the journey may lead :)
* Here are a few images of some of the previous book titles I was involved in as author, photo editor or photographer.

column4: >The “GO! Make A Difference” (Go! M.A.D) initiative is completely not-for-profit and all funds raised go towards supporting the Adivasi Munnetra Sangam (AMS). The AMS is the central peoples movement of the Adivasi tribals of the Gudular Valley in the Nilgiri Hills. This year the funds raised from the ride will contribute to the work of ACCORD, an organisation within the AMS that collaborates with Adivasi tribals to undertake community mobilisation and economic development initiatives. ACCORD has been working with the Adivasi tribals of the Gudalur Valley for nearly 30 years, supporting them to assert their rights within society, with a particular focus on land rights. Today the Adivasi communities are faced with new challenges. A changing economy puts at risk the gains achieved by the AMS in health care and education over the years. With only meager wage labour open to them, young Adivasis are forced to migrate to towns and cities. This has lead to a disintegration of their identity and culture. To counter this trend, ACCORD seeks to find new and innovative ways of combining traditional livelihoods with modern technology and access to markets.
column7:
>This year the GO! M.A.D cycling tour will ride from Bangalore to Gudalur in the Nilgiri Hills (over 300kms!). The aim is to raise funds and awareness about current issues facing the local Adivasi tribal groups. The ride is a grassroots fundraising effort organised by workers and volunteers who are passionate about involving the wider community in the work that is being done with Adivasi groups.

column1:

Joseph, the mountain guide who places his guests' safety above his own ...
It is with a heavy heart to announce that we have lost another one of our mountain guides, Joseph Selungin, age 33, in the wake of Sabah Earthquake that jolted Mt.Kinabalu.

The earthquake that rocked the mountain on the 5th of June, 7:15am triggered landslides along with rocks and boulders that tumbled down, destroying trails and sadly, taking lives. Joseph was found beneath a boulder, in the heroic act of shielding two of his guests. Unfortunately, the three of them didn’t survive.

Joseph was last seen hugging two of his guests, in an attempt to protect them, using his body as a shield, an account related by his fellow mountain guide colleague, Sharulnizam Suhaji. Sharulnizam describes Joseph as an easy-going person with a good heart, soft-spoken and always kind.

Joseph has been a member of our team for almost 2 months. He has brought nothing but good memories and experiences for our fellow climbers. A man of courage and uncompromising thoughtfulness. His good-will and high-spirits will forever be remembered by all the lives he has touched.

Joseph left behind a loving wife, a 4-year old son and a 2-year old daughter. He promised his wife that he will come back to celebrate their wedding anniversary on the 12th of June. Our heartfelt condolences goes out to his family and to those affected. 
We will miss you Joseph, you live on in the love you gave, and the laughter you shared, in our thoughts and in our memories, forever.

===========================================================

Tammie Ng, relates her story of Joseph as her guide:-
""Oh no! We are all very heartbroken to receive this very sad news. Joseph was a fantastic guide who got us all up to the summit despite our fears and aching limbs. He was very caring and had a wicked sense of humour. He really made our Mount Kinabalu experience extra special! He also had a hidden talent with our cameras. Best wishes,

column2:
/>

Joseph is seen here, photographed with his guests of 5 pax, at Laban Rata Resthouse, Mount Kinabalul.

If you've been looking for the world's most minimalist titanium wallet, then you've just found it!

Now, the truth is:

I have personally wanted an ultra-slim and ultra-minimalist wallet for a long time (many, many years if I'm honest).

I've seen hundreds of wallets (and even bought a few of them) ...but none of them were quite right. I was determined to get my ""dream wallet"" ...even if I had to make it myself.

Not only that but, I've had literally hundreds of customers asking (and even begging!) me to design and make such a wallet for them. And so, around a year ago, I finally designed and made such a wallet.

I called it the TiWallet™ ...and we sold hundreds of them.

But here's the thing:

Over the course of using the TiWallet™ for a year or so ...there were a few little things I wanted to improve on it to really make it the ""Holy Grail"" of wallets.

Long story short...

After some tweaking and prototyping the new-and-improved ""V2"" version of the TiWallet™ is ready:

 

Let's get straight into the details of what makes this wallet the ""Holy Grail"" of minimalist wallets...

 

Machined From Grade 5 Titanium

The TiWallet™ is precision machined from a solid block of Grade 5 Titanium.

There are no other materials involved ...and so there is nothing to wear-out over time. This truly is a titanium wallet that will literally last forever.

Over 90%+ of the material is machined away from each solid billet of Titanium to produce the TiWallet™.

 

4-Card, 6-Card or 9-Card Versions

There will be three different versions of the TiWallet™ - 4-card, 6-card and 9-card.

The original TiWallet™ only came in 6-Card and 9-Card versions - but this new version will also offer a slimmer 4-Card option.

The photo below is of the 4-Card with the 6-Card version:

 

Cards Held Securely

With the TiWallet™ your cards are held 100% securely. Using the highly ""elastic"" nature of Grade 5 Titanium the channels along each side ""flex"" open to accept your cards.

And, when you put your cards in, the TiWallet™ then ""clicks"" closed to firmly grab your cards on all four corners.

Even if you drop your TiWallet™ ...your cards are not going anywhere!

 

I.D. ""Window""

Because of the open style of the TiWallet™ you can put your I.D. facing the outside.

Personally, I've found this incredibly useful whenever I'm required to show I.D. (no digging around for my card - just show them the whole wallet. Oh, and I seem to get lots of comments about it being a ""cool wallet"" when I do this - which is always fun).

 

Weight and Dimensions

You've probably already figured it out but...

The TiWallet™ is ultra-light and weighs barely 21 grams (0.7 oz.) for the 6-Card version. You will barely feel this wallet in your pocket!

The sides of the wallet are only 3mm (0.12"") larger than your cards. And so the overall dimensions of the TiWallet™ is 87mm (3.4"") long and 60mm (2.3"") wide.

Here are the thickness of each of the three versions:

4-Card is 5.0mm (0.2"")

6-Card is 7.7mm (0.3"")

9-Card is 11.5mm (0.45"")

 

Famous 'Matte' Surface Finish

One of the things we're known for is the proprietary surface finish we put on the various titanium products we make.

The TiWallet™ will be getting this same one-of-a-kind finish - which results in a silky-smooth surface together with rounded corners and edges.

 

Machined Entirely In-House

From start (raw titanium sheet) to finish (packed and ready to ship) every part of the manufacturing is done in-house here where I live in New Zealand.

TheTiWallet™ will be precision CNC machined on THIS machine right here:

 

The Perks

I'm going to keep the Perks super simple and just offer one Perk for each of the wallet sizes available.

You can choose from either the 4-card, 6-card or 9-card version.

Thank you for checking out my project. If you have any questions or such, then either message me or comment.

Sincerely,

Magnus

P.S. The prices on this project are as low as they will ever be and will not be available again - this is an *IndieGoGo EXCLUSIVE* low price ...so you need to take action RIGHT NOW!

","If you've been looking for the world's most minimalist titanium wallet, then you've just found it!Now, the truth is:I have personally wanted an ultra-slim and ultra-minimalist wallet for a long time (many, many years if I'm honest).I've seen hundreds of wallets (and even bought a few of them) ...but none of them were quite right. I was determined to get my ""dream wallet"" ...even if I had to make it myself.Not only that but, I've had literally hundreds of customers asking (and even begging!) me to design and make such a wallet for them. And so, around a year ago, I finally designed and made such a wallet.I called it the TiWallet™ ...and we sold hundreds of them.But here's the thing:Over the course of using the TiWallet™ for a year or so ...there were a few little things I wanted to improve on it to really make it the ""Holy Grail"" of wallets.Long story short...After some tweaking and prototyping the new-and-improved ""V2"" version of the TiWallet™ is ready: Let's get straight into the details of what makes this wallet the ""Holy Grail"" of minimalist wallets... Machined From Grade 5 TitaniumThe TiWallet™ is precision machined from a solid block of Grade 5 Titanium.There are no other materials involved ...and so there is nothing to wear-out over time. This truly is a titanium wallet that will literally last forever.Over 90%+ of the material is machined away from each solid billet of Titanium to produce the TiWallet™. 4-Card, 6-Card or 9-Card VersionsThere will be three different versions of the TiWallet™ - 4-card, 6-card and 9-card.The original TiWallet™ only came in 6-Card and 9-Card versions - but this new version will also offer a slimmer 4-Card option.The photo below is of the 4-Card with the 6-Card version: Cards Held SecurelyWith the TiWallet™ your cards are held 100% securely. Using the highly ""elastic"" nature of Grade 5 Titanium the channels along each side ""flex"" open to accept your cards.And, when you put your cards in, the TiWallet™ then ""clicks"" closed to firmly grab your cards on all four corners.Even if you drop your TiWallet™ ...your cards are not going anywhere! I.D. ""Window""Because of the open style of the TiWallet™ you can put your I.D. facing the outside.Personally, I've found this incredibly useful whenever I'm required to show I.D. (no digging around for my card - just show them the whole wallet. Oh, and I seem to get lots of comments about it being a ""cool wallet"" when I do this - which is always fun). Weight and DimensionsYou've probably already figured it out but...The TiWallet™ is ultra-light and weighs barely 21 grams (0.7 oz.) for the 6-Card version. You will barely feel this wallet in your pocket!The sides of the wallet are only 3mm (0.12"") larger than your cards. And so the overall dimensions of the TiWallet™ is 87mm (3.4"") long and 60mm (2.3"") wide.Here are the thickness of each of the three versions:4-Card is 5.0mm (0.2"")6-Card is 7.7mm (0.3"")9-Card is 11.5mm (0.45"") Famous 'Matte' Surface FinishOne of the things we're known for is the proprietary surface finish we put on the various titanium products we make.The TiWallet™ will be getting this same one-of-a-kind finish - which results in a silky-smooth surface together with rounded corners and edges. Machined Entirely In-HouseFrom start (raw titanium sheet) to finish (packed and ready to ship) every part of the manufacturing is done in-house here where I live in New Zealand.TheTiWallet™ will be precision CNC machined on THIS machine right here: The PerksI'm going to keep the Perks super simple and just offer one Perk for each of the wallet sizes available.You can choose from either the 4-card, 6-card or 9-card version.Thank you for checking out my project. If you have any questions or such, then either message me or comment.Sincerely,MagnusP.S. The prices on this project are as low as they will ever be and will not be available again - this is an *IndieGoGo EXCLUSIVE* low price ...so you need to take action RIGHT NOW!",13.0,0,"1 Campaign

BACK ANY PERK and get notified when the creator is LIVE and ON THE AIR! Aaron Cruz will answer questions from the Indiegogo community and give an entertaining demonstration of how My Lofty Pillow works. Watch Aaron for just a few minutes and forever change your perception of flying coach! *The next livestream is tentatively scheduled for Tuesday 06.19.18.

So many features in an ALL-IN-ONE carrying pouch. See why we call it The IMPOSSIBLE Travel Pillow:

Aaron has dedicated the last TEN years, YES 10 YEARS, developing a solution to prevent what he calls Flight Neck Syndrome. 'FNS' can be quite painful and is caused by sleeping with traditional travel pillows that do little to prevent your head from falling forward or rolling sideways.

Our hero has finally approved the final retail version of My Lofty Pillow for global distribution, and mass production is officially under way. At last, what frequent fliers didn’t think was possible will soon become a reality through his unique invention!

We begin with its self-contained CARRYING POUCH. Less than 7” at its longest side, it won’t take up much space in your carry-on.*

Do you like to travel light? My Lofty Pillow SECURES your flight essentials so you can speed through checkpoint.

What makes My Lofty Pillow truly unique? It has WINGS — It literally has WINGS — to keep your head from falling side to side and your neck from straining.

My Lofty Pillow does the impossible. It unzips from a carrying pouch and CONVERTS into a comfortable travel pillow. When you're wide awake, simply ZIP it up and TUCK it away.

Designed with a WIDE INTAKE VALVE, My Lofty Pillow inflates in just TWO BREATHS. 

Chin support has velcro fasteners so you can ADJUST My Lofty Pillow to the perfect fit.

With My Lofty Pillow, you’re assured to travel in complete style and comfort, relieving stress and anxiety at the same time.

Wings create a sound barrier to MINIMIZE BACKGROUND NOISE.

My Lofty Pillow provides complete and total HEAD, NECK and adjustable CHIN SUPPORT so you can rest in the air or between flights.

PROTECTIVE FABRIC keeps your head, neck and face from unwanted germs and seat bacteria.

TWO POCKETS can hold your cell phone, charger, passport, boarding pass, and other flight essentials.

My Lofty Pillow sports a durable exterior with an ultra soft interior. Available in THREE DENIM COLORS. Choose from black, blue, and pink!
column4:
showinfo=0"">

I can really use your support to put an END to Flight Neck Syndrome. I've used my personal funds to make 4,500 units for our 1st round supporters, who recently raised enough to put another 5,000 into production. I'd love for our campaign to raise even more to order yet another 20,000 units, which would really start to make an impact in our global fight against FNS!
 

Our Indiegogo Stretch Goal of $150,000 will provide the necessary funds to stock My Lofty Pillow in airports across the USA. With your support, we can achieve what I once thought was impossible.

THANK YOU SO VERY MUCH.

         Wishing you safe and pain-free travels,


 


5000 units are already in production and will soon be delivered via ocean freight to the port of Oakland, CA. We estimate that our container will clear customs within a reasonable timeframe and arrive at our fulfillment warehouse in mid-July.

Be one of the first in the world to fly with My Lofty Pillow! Here's how to back our campaign:

SELECT THE PERK with the most attractive package based on the quantity and price you desire!

Make your contribution at checkout. To keep shipping costs as low as possible for you, we'll be shipping via USPS with delivery confirmation in the USA at a flat shipping and handling cost of $8, regardless of how many pillows we send you. What's nice about shipping our pillows? They won't brake in transit! NOTE TO INTERNATIONAL BACKERS: Please account for potential custom / tax-duty fees imposed by your country. We'll be shipping from California, USA at the value of your perk (less shipping).

Once we get closer to July, we’ll send you an EMAIL SURVEY so you can confirm your shipping address, and make any last minute changes to your order. Thanks for backing us!

We've made many improvements since the idea of My Lofty Pillow was born, but the essence of it remains the same.
column5: >Anticipated Amazon pricing is $28-30 per pillow
column6:
>

Pain free travel is just days away. Manufacturing is busy creating 5,000 units NOW, and we will begin shipping units to all backers in mid-July. Back our campaign early and our team will work non-stop to get it to you just in time for summer vacation!

My Lofty Pillow has international PATENTS PENDING. Thanks for your support!

The Voyage Sleep Mask is the 360° Adjustable Padded Sleep Mask for the perfect nap for your daily commute, a mid-day power nap, camping adventure, international flight, and anywhere in between! Become a backer today to be the first to get your hands on one. 

After selling over 25,000 of our award-winning Voyage Pillows - we went back to the drawing board with our communities most requested features to develop the most comfortable sleep mask on the market. Learning more about the Voyage Sleep Mask and become a part of the Voyage Family today! 

As an early backer, you will be the FIRST to get your hands on the Voyage Sleep Mask at our introductory pricing. Plus the Voyage Sleep Mask will be shipping before Christmas for all your holiday gift ideas! 

 

The Voyage Sleep Mask feature 360° microbead padded comfort around your entire head to allow for maximum support when it's time for you to take a nap. Find your own perfect position to rest your eyes knowing you'll find comfort and support from any angle. 

Similarly we designed the Voyage Sleep Mask with our mutli-layer support for equal distribution of padding throughout. Never worry about the microbeads falling all to one section of the Voyage Sleep Mask.  

Enjoy the perfect fit around your head with our fully adjustable velcro design. This design allows the Voyage Sleep Mask to fit almost any head shape and size while enabling the customization of pressure against your face. 

Use the velcro to loosely wear it around your neck for quick access between naps. 

Bring your Voyage Sleep Mask with you on every adventure with our included carrying case! Simply Roll the sleep mask in a compact ball before heading out. The carrying case features our signature water-resistant nylon fabric found within our Voyage Bag which features a custom two tone topographic print and a paracord closure. 

Simply roll it up into the carrying case and be on your way to your next adventure. 

 

We selected the best possible fabrics to add flexibility with a soft touch and feel against your body for amazing comfort. The exterior fabric is comprised of our flexible poly-spandex blend fabric which allows to a light stretch to move with your body just as you do. The interior plush fleece fabric will feel extremely soft again your skin allowing you to easily and comfortably fall asleep.

We know everyone has their personal style - select the colorway that best fits your life! Similar we strive to let our products speak for themselves! The Voyage Sleep Mask features extremely minimal branding to never get in the way of your next nap!

Having experience from previously launching three crowdfunding campaigns, we know how important it is to ensure that we are always 100% transparent with the campaign timeline. 

We have already taken the steps to ensure we are able to meet the below timeframe so you have your hands on the Voyage Sleep Mask for the holiday season. As always, if any delays occurring during the process we will outline them in our updates.

We strive to be one of the best crowdfunding campaigns you have ever backed!

Sondre Travel was founded here on Kickstarter! The Voyage Pillow was launched in February 2017 to offer the best possible sleep on your adventure. Our first campaign raised over $125,000 and Sondre Travel was ready for take-off. The Voyage Bag was our second campaign launched in November 2017 as the perfect carry-on bag. Then in April 2018 we introduced the best beach chair ever to hit Kickstarter, the Voyage Chair. Our goal is to create the best travel accessories possible whether it's for your daily commute, weekend getaway, or international adventure!

Are you interested in featuring Sondre Travel and the Voyage Sleep Mask? Click below for our Press Kit - e-mail any inquires or published articles to info@sondretravel.com.

Shipping Information

Our estimated shipping date is December 2018. We will require to charge a shipping rate depending on your country location and cost to ship from the United States. You will automatically see the rate per country once you make your pledge. Products will be shipped from the United States. Domestic transit will be 3-5 days with international transit time of 7-21 days depending on your location. Backers from other countries may see VAT or import charges depending on their local regulations, which is not built into the shipping costs. All tracking numbers will be sent within 24 hours of your order being sent!

Product Warranty and Returns Policy

If you are not fully satisfied with your purchase, you may return your rewards within 30 days for a full refund. Contact us directly, send the items back, and we will process the refund for you - however we know you are going to love the Voyage Chair.

If you find any product or manufacturing defects, our products come with a 1 year warranty to offer a product replacement for any issues that may arise.

Risks and challenges

Sondre Travel has been working hard over the past months to ensure this Kickstarter campaign runs smoothly. Relationships have been built with manufacturing partners to bring the Voyage Chair to life and into your hands once the campaign is complete.

However, running any business can come with unforeseen circumstances and risks. Production and logistic issues can arise during these processes, and we guarantee to remain transparent if any potential issues may affect the launch of the product.

Our pre-production samples have met our beta tester quality standards and pledge to maintain this quality for the final finished product delivered to you.

Hi everyone, Cheri here!

I have always enjoyed the beautiful wilderness spaces and am passionate about preserving undeveloped space for wildlife habitat and the mental health of humans.

Mongolia is a place I have been fascinated with for over 10 years, mostly due to it's natural and cultural beauty and purity. Over the past several months I have become involved with a campaign to help preserve one of the last, ancient largest freshwater lakes in the world called Lake Hovsgol.  The Mongolians call this body of water ""The Mother Sea"".  The Lake and the wildlife park around it are unique on this planet, and under threat from poachers and illegal developers and loggers.

The park is patrolled by rangers, mostly on horseback, on foot or decrepit old motorcycles which were never really meant for off-road use.  The rangers need better transportation to do their job catching poachers and illegal developers, and the motorcycles they have are old, tired and inadequate.  The horses are even less effective and it's not easy to cover vast expanses of wilderness on foot or catch up with poachers driving 4-wheel drive jeeps. New off-road motorcycles will greatly help them to do their jobs. And the Mongolian government has agreed to provide all maintenance, parts and fuel for the motorcycles.

I am raising funds to buy one motorcycle and safety gear to outfit a ranger.  On my own dime I am going to go to Mongolia to deliver it to the ranger in person. Entire airfare comes out of my own pocket, and I am volunteering my time both here with fundraising and coordination, and in Mongolia with coordination and delivery.

Lake Hovsgol is one of the last best places!

The Lake and surrounding wildlife area is a National Park bigger than Yellowstone and strictly protected as a transition zone between Central Asian Steppe and the Siberian Taiga.  It's one of 17 ancient lakes that are more than 2 million years old, and the water is so clean you can drink it without any treatment.  There are a number of indigenous people that live around it and depend on it for their water supply.  In fact  it contains 70% of all the surface freshwater supply for the whole country of Mongolia.  There is no body of water this clean and this large in America. None.

So what's threatening it?

Illegal poaching, including illegal drift net fishing, illegal logging: The lake has fish, including two endemic species, and since it's a lake, those fish can easily become overfished as every other fish population in the world has become.  The surrounding parklands are home to a number of really awesome animals, including ibex, argali, elk, wolf, wolverine, musk deer, brown bear, Siberian moose, and sable.

Mongolia has done a good job designating this area as a wildlife preserve to protect the survival of these animals, but enforcement is challenging.  Rangers have been stabbed and injured trying to enforce the law against poachers, who stand to make a great deal of money in the short term.

Illegal development and tourism: It shouldn't be news to Americans that people in and from outside Mongolia are eager to develop properties around the lake.  Rangers have caught individuals simply building around it without permits. Run off and pollution from illegal development and road building is certain to pollute the lake, as well as impact wildlife habitat.  Additionally outsiders have come in and started developing environmental tourism projects without necessarily caring for the habitat or obtaining permission.

But they have rangers to enforce the laws, right?

Yes, the whole park is about 4,600 square miles (1.2mm hectares) and there are 15 permanent rangers and a few seasonal ones.  Each ranger patrols over 300 square miles of park, which is about the same size as all the boroughs in New York City.  And they do it mostly on horseback.    Imagine if there was only one policeman in a space as big as the five boroughs of New York City, and he was on horseback chasing bad guys in jeeps.

The poachers and illegal users in the park tool around in jeeps, 4x4's, and other vehicles.  Did I also mention the poachers are armed?

The rangers have asked for help by in the form of offroad motorcycles, gear, and training.  With modern offroad motorcycles, they could patrol more effectively and discourage lawbreakers.

So why do I care, and how can I help?

It's true, Mongolia is halfway around the world, but I care, and here's why:
• We don't have that many wild places left in the world.
• We don't have that much wildlife left in the world.

• I love nature, I spend a lot of time in nature, and it's not often that I get to actually do hands-on volunteering to not only help protect one of the last pristine natural places in the world, but at the same time help improve the work life of an individual who is protecting this area. That's just awesome!

Even if you aren't moved by this situation, I ask that you support me in my effort to keep this wild area as pristine as possible. You can help by donating to help cover the cost of a motorcycle and equipment.

Where does the money go?

100% of the money you donate is tax-deductible, and goes to buy and ship the motorcycle and equipment. I am paying my own ticket over, and the Mongol Ecology Center is not taking any of it for administration, it all goes directly to equipment for the rangers! 

I am trying to fund one motorcycle and equipment.  Each motorcycle and equipment, along with shipping, costs $7,550.   I am trying to raise enough to outfit one ranger.  Any additional money goes to buying a second motorcycle if I exceed my fundraising goal.  

If I raise additional funds, but not enough for an entire motorcycle and gear, the Mongol Ecology Center has agreed to pool it with the funds raised by other volunteers to fund another complete motorcycle.

How you can help

Donate, and donate big to get the very best benefit premiums!  Please share this with everyone you know as well.

necessarily caring for the habitat or obtaining permission.But they have rangers to enforce the laws, right?Yes, the whole park is about 4,600 square miles (1.2mm hectares) and there are 15 permanent rangers and a few seasonal ones.  Each ranger patrols over 300 square miles of park, which is about the same size as all the boroughs in New York City.  And they do it mostly on horseback.    Imagine if there was only one policeman in a space as big as the five boroughs of New York City, and he was on horseback chasing bad guys in jeeps.The poachers and illegal users in the park tool around in jeeps, 4x4's, and other vehicles.  Did I also mention the poachers are armed?The rangers have asked for help by in the form of offroad motorcycles, gear, and training.  With modern offroad motorcycles, they could patrol more effectively and discourage lawbreakers.So why do I care, and how can I help?It's true, Mongolia is halfway around the world, but I care, and here's why:
We don't have that many wild places left in the world.
We don't have that much wildlife left in the world.

I love nature, I spend a lot of time in nature, and it's not often that I get to actually do hands-on volunteering to not only help protect one of the last pristine natural places in the world, but at the same time help improve the work life of an individual who is protecting this area. That's just awesome!

Even if you aren't moved by this situation, I ask that you support me in my effort to keep this wild area as pristine as possible. You can help by donating to help cover the cost of a motorcycle and equipment.Where does the money go?100% of the money you donate is tax-deductible, and goes to buy and ship the motorcycle and equipment. I am paying my own ticket over, and the Mongol Ecology Center is not taking any of it for administration, it all goes directly to equipment for the rangers! I am trying to fund one motorcycle and equipment.  Each motorcycle and equipment, along with shipping, costs $7,550.   I am trying to raise enough to outfit one ranger.  Any additional money goes to buying a second motorcycle if I exceed my fundraising goal.  If I raise additional funds, but not enough for an entire motorcycle and gear, the Mongol Ecology Center has agreed to pool it with the funds raised by other volunteers to fund another complete motorcycle.How you can helpDonate, and donate big to get the very best benefit premiums!  Please share this with everyone you know as well.",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

Help me go to a Worldcup competition on the 29th of november!

Two days ago I got the email I have been waiting for the whole year: to get invited as one of 12 girls in the world to the KSP - Kite Surf Pro World Tour on Maui, Hawaii. Because we dont have a national team in Sweden, it is up to every rider to find sponsors and funding to travel to competitions. So to be able to go I thought I would start a fundraiser! I need to raise $4500 to participate in this competition.

If any of you would like to contribute toward making this dream come true - every dollar counts! If any compeny would like to sponsor me, you can get advertising on my homepage / board in return, get in touch with me at windwatersnow@hotmail.com

I promise to give back through competing at the highest level and inviting you to join me on this adventure on my blog and on Facebook as one of the few girls in the world top of this male-dominated extreme sport

http://www.kspworldtour.com/

Video from a KSP event I was competing at last year

We are the big fans of man vs wild. We always imagine what we should do it outdoor helpless situation. That why we always carry around many tools. However most of them is heavy weight and large in size, not easy for us to carry all around, an always seem like miss something. After years of searching we finally come up with this everyday carry survival kit. There are 15 handy tools in this collection. Each of them is small in size that you can carry everyday.  Let start to show you one by one.

This is our favorite one. It is alway cool to start a fire using flint. Metal case Flint is a extremely sturdy and reliable fire starting tool with a threaded aluminum case to protect the ferro rod. No worries about breaking the rod in your pocket with this setup. With a
built in striker inside that will not cut your pocket. (We think it is dangerous to put a saw around you neck).The aluminum case can be a good self defense kubotan. Easy for self defense and break glass. In addition a small compass is attached to end of the case.

This can turn any key into multi-tool. At less than a tenth-of-an-inch thick, the multi-tool key holder is the most unobtrusive bottle opener we've ever seen. The multi-functional tool is like a glove that fits around a standard house key and features, in addition to the useful bottle opener, three sizes of screwdriver, a nail file, a cutter, and tweezers. The stainless steel multi-tool key holder will hardly be noticeable in your pocket, but will inevitably come to your aid countless times for life's little emergencies. It is also help you easier to find your door key or any key with the holder on it.
This tiny but powerful survival tool is no bigger than a credit card and fits right in your wallet, so you'll always have it on you. Here is what the tool includes:Can Opener, Knife EdgeSlotted,
Flathead Screwdriver, Ruler, Bottle Cap Opener, 4 Position Wrench,
Wingnut Wrench, Saw Blade, Direction Ancillary Indicator, 2 Position

This compact flashlight can be charged easily and quickly and operate continuously for many hours on a full charge. It's a darn handy gadget to carry on your key ring and the
three LEDs are nice and bright.
Size: 60 mm x 35mm x 10mm / 2.36"" x 1.37"" x 0.39""

In the survival kit, one thing we make sure we have plenty of is alcohol prep pad. Besides the obvious antiseptic uses, they make a great fire starter as well. Making fire sometime is not easy for everyone. With the use of alcohol will be much easy.

When faced with an emergency situation, this ingenious paracord bracelet is an
invaluable tool that can serve many practical functions. While small enough to
fit around your wrist comfortably, the bracelet packs in 12-1/2' of parachute cord rope for tying, securing, repairing, and other critical tasks. The tiny built-in buckle whistle serves as a handy alert signal.

This waterproof pill box made of high quality aluminum. This can has anodic oxidation surface, waterproof wear-resisting and air tight. Cover can screw up, sealing and waterproofing, inside very clean, can pack emergency pills, Commonly used tablets and matches.

This carabiner is a great way to carry your tools and your keys, or you could strap a water bottle to your backpack for easy access! It also doubles as a bottle opener and features a hex driver in the upper corner. This is simple and light weight but useful.

Telescopic cup are useful, companionable things to have. Especially for the
lover of the great outdoors. A useful mate to a water even whisky.  Just pull the cup taught and it's watertight or whisky tight, as you please. Fits neatly into the pocket or bag for use outdoors when conventional cups are too bulky, heavy or fragile.
Size: 55mm x 50mm (folding size: 20mm x 50mm) / 2.16"" x 1.96"" (folding size: 0.78"" x 1.96"")
Emergency Whistle with waterproof capsule with high decibel whistle enables
the sound to transmit far away, Storage capsule enables you to keep
small stuff, such as pills, needle, string and so on. Portable design
for ease of carrying while taking outdoor activities. We also have one around our neck, great for carry important pill as backup.
This Emergency Blanket is a must for every survival kit. It's manufactured from extremely lightweight, flexible, space-age material, and made Of Metalized Polyester and reflects 90% Of Body Heat.

Sometimes carrying a bulky reusable water bottle can become a bit of a hardship, so wouldn’t it be nice if you could fold that eco-friendly container flat up once you’ve consumed its contents? This colorful, flexible, and reusable water bottle designed for easy and convenient on-the-go use anywhere. Unlike traditional bottles, this is flexible, which means it can stand upright when full and it can be rolled, folded, or flattened when empty, easily fitting into pockets, purses and packs.

This wire saw is strong and effective. Can cuts through wood, plastic, bone and even soft metals. Easily extended with ropes tied to the rings or converted to bow saw
with a bended branch

This super mini spy size telescope(2.5x17.5), made of light metal material(Weight only 30g with carry pouch), very convenient to bring with you, Ideal for for Hiking, Camping, Sport, Hunting, travel etc.

The final one is Sport Belt Bag. You may put any extra tools in it. This  can be use as Portable Chest Bag, Running Jogging Belt Waist Pack, Waist Pouch Bag, Outdoor
Waist Bag..etc which is perfect for outdoor activities. Nice ornament and good organized assistant for your daily use. The elastic bag, can hold lots of things even smartphone.
Thanks for you time and support What will you get

Please support us and you can get all this handy tools. We hope this kits can fit your need. Please feel free to contact us for any question.

column1: At LGBT Outdoors, we believe that nature is for everyone.  The peace, the exploration, the adventure - is available to anyone and everyone.  We want to smash the stereotypes that a) the great outdoors are only for the rugged... and b) that our LGBT Outdoors family is more than capable of conquering the wilderness in all its beautiful forms.
• We're creating a 4-part video series showcasing 4 different outdoor activities
• Each film will feature the story of an outdoorsperson who is active with the featured activity
• We aim to give you enough info in each episode so that you can go out and try it!

Whether you're into kayaking, rock climbing, cycling, fishing or any of the multitude of jaw-dropping outdoor experiences nature offers, we want to continue to grow to be a resource for the LGBTQ+ community to get out of the clubs - and get outdoors.
We're looking to raise $16,000 for these 4 videos.
First - and importantly - our core team is volunteering their time and expertise for this passion project under this $16,000 for 4 videos goal.

When you watch high-quality video, most viewers never consider the herculean effort (and price tag), and large number of creative professionals it takes to make things happen.   Below is a list of our projected expenses:
• Professional camera gear (and additional rentals when needed)
• Travel \ transport \ lodging when necessary (though we're trying to keep at least 2 films local)
Justin Yoder, founder of LGBT Outdoors and lifelong outdoorsman is heading up this project as producer.  He's an award-winning photographer and is ridiculously passionate about creating these films.
Frank Darko is our director.  He's a top-notch filmmaker with a heavy background in art.  He brings with him years of documentary, corporate, and short-form filmmaking.

Patrick Thompson (husband of Justin Yoder) is LGBT Outdoors' Creative Director and resident film score composer.   With a masters certification from Berklee College of Music, his music has been on over 300 TV episodes of various shows.

Many LGBTQ+ people have spent time ""in the closet""... unsure of things, if not downright afraid. We're going to show that LGBTQ+ people are strong enough - and resilient enough to fearlessly explore the outdoors... to ride that intimidating trail... to literally climb that mountain.
• We're going to show the immense strength of LGBTQ+ participants in hopes of inspiring others.
• We'll encourage ALL people to get outside and marvel in the natural world.
• Without being preachy, we will urge all outdoorspeople to responsibly and ethically enjoy nature's resources.

As with any creative venture, the ""stars"" need to align to a degree in order for things to work. We anticipate scheduling and timing to be one of our larger challenges - especially when nature is involved.  We can have all the gear and creative team lined up, but if weather is off... or the fish aren't biting... or the lake is too choppy... we can run into problems.
• Our production team is made up of creative professionals - problem solving is usually about 75% of what they do
• Even if Mother Nature throws a curve ball, we'll still do everything we can to safely and effectively tell the story we're trying to tell.
LGBT Outdoors is a community-based project.  We'll need the full, fantastic support of our entire community to make this a reality.
• Please go NUTS sharing this campaign page on on your social media.
• Use the Indiegogo share tools to get more eyes on this project!

ORDERING NOW AVAILABLE ON KANGAROOZIE WEBSITE - ORDER HERE: www.Kangaroozie.com
A can cooler with a waterproof pouch?

Currently a student at Rhodes College, I've been working passionately on the Kangaroozie for the last year and a half. I initially funded the Kangaroozie through the money and services won through the Rhodes College Business Plan Competition (article link). From there, the product has been designed, prototyped, marketed, filed for a patent, and beginning manufacturing.
As the product developed, I competed in more competitions and the Kangaroozie won first place in the EO's GSEA Nashville competition (article link).

At the end of my senior year of high school in 2013, I was diagnosed with Hodgkin's Lymphoma (article link). This inspired me to begin a T-shirt company called Fight On, which was focused on creating support for cancer patients. While that business was short-lived, it inspired me to be a business owner one day. I've been dedicated to creating and developing the Kangaroozie and bringing it to market!

High-Quality Foam that is waterproof, non-absorbent, ultra light-weight, scuff/tear resistant, buoyant and anti-microbial. It is strong and durable to endure all the challenges of nature, including fresh, salt, and chlorinated water, as well as mud, dirt, and sand.
Latch to ensure water-tight closure and security.
Pocket to keep items in place while the door is open or closed.

Collapsible D-Ring that allows you to attach the Kangaroozie to a lanyard or carabineer for easy and secure carrying - attach it to a beach bag, backpack, or wrist lanyard. The D-Ring comfortable folds into the Kangaroozie when not in use to keep its sleek design.

The Kangaroozie was designed to be taken anywhere! Using high-quality materials and having a waterproof compartment, it is perfect for all drinking conditions. No need to worry about dragging along your purse or wallet with you - the Kangaroozie will store your most important belongings and keep them safe.
The Kangaroozie is in the final stages of production and will be shipped to customers in April 2018!
The Kangaroozie was designed to be made out of materials of the highest quality. The raw material supply was selected to ensure that the Kangaroozie will be made to excellence.

is no better way to thank God for your sight than by giving a helping hand to
someone in the dark."" Helen Keller
Everest Base Camp, December 2014. To raise funding for Barbara Burrell Home for the Blind in Bulawayo, Zimbabwe.
Getting older...I don’t know about you, but when I think of growing old I
have hopeful visions of independent living, good health and mobility. Being
Unfortunately, as we all know life doesn’t always go to
plan and curve balls will happen. In the case of losing your sight in your later years (suddenly or gradually) it is something of a life changing event
- requiring a complete lifestyle overhaul. There

are so many new challenges to be met with and adaptations required in everyday living. And so becoming a time when an ongoing abundance of love, trust, guidance and patience become paramount to getting to grips with the situation.
Specialist facilities are generally pretty poor here in Zim and

in many areas, non-existent. Barbara Burrell Home for the Blind is a small home coordinated by ordinary folk with the joint goal of caring for and making a difference in the lives of their residents. It serves to provide
comfort, recreation and rehabilitation for the elderly blind. This is where my beloved grandmother, Marj Muir, spent the last of her
Gran was rendered almost completely blind after a botched laser treatment. And her blindness was shortly followed by the greatest loss of all
column2: the passing of her lifelong love - her husband, Jack. After that her health deteriorated rapidly and by the time she was admitted to Barbara Burrell a couple of years later, she was

column1: also sadly in the deeper stages of Alzheimer’s and Dementia.

column2: with one of the most generous hearts

column1: I’ve ever had the privilege of knowing. Her love, light and wit shone

through right to the very end. However, her circumstances and the psychologies that came with them, meant she was no easy customer. In Barbara Burrell we found a group of people who truly loved and cared for her
right to the finish line regardless of the difficulties that lay within her
condition. My family and I have so much to thank them for.
In this light, on the 28th December I am headed to Nepal to take up the
challenge of  trekking from Lukla to Everest Base Camp. My aim is to
raise as much as I can to go toward the general upkeep and facilities of
the Home. 'Times is tough' and every little helps. So if you're willing and able, please support me in my
mission - the love would be so gratefully received, both by myself and
the good folk of the Barbara Burrell Home. All donationations will be handed over directly to the home upon completion
If you live locally, feel free to get in touch with the home with any further fundraising ideas you may have. And if you're keen to follow my journey, share in some of

the craziness that happens along the way or just to send me some happy vibes as I go, please connect with me on my facebook page. Otherwise, your support and pennies on my Everest Base Camp Trek would be gratefully received!
With a mountain of love from me...

I am trekking for 'Barbs Burrell' in loving memory of our adoring Granny Marj. And in honour / dedication of the treasured friend and shiny soul that was my brother, John  - gone from us in August 2014.

With love and gratitude, Lana
is no better way to thank God for your sight than by giving a helping hand to
someone in the dark."" Helen Keller
Everest Base Camp, December 2014. To raise funding for Barbara Burrell Home for the Blind in Bulawayo, Zimbabwe.
Getting older...I don’t know about you, but when I think of growing old I
have hopeful visions of independent living, good health and mobility. Being
Unfortunately, as we all know life doesn’t always go to
plan and curve balls will happen. In the case of losing your sight in your later years (suddenly or gradually) it is something of a life changing event
- requiring a complete lifestyle overhaul. There

are so many new challenges to be met with and adaptations required in everyday living. And so becoming a time when an ongoing abundance of love, trust, guidance and patience become paramount to getting to grips with the situation.
Barbara Burrell Home for the Blind...
Specialist facilities are generally pretty poor here in Zim and

in many areas, non-existent. Barbara Burrell Home for the Blind is a small home coordinated by ordinary folk with the joint goal of caring for and making a difference in the lives of their residents. It serves to provide
comfort, recreation and rehabilitation for the elderly blind. This is where my beloved grandmother, Marj Muir, spent the last of her
Gran was rendered almost completely blind after a botched laser treatment. And her blindness was shortly followed by the greatest loss of all
column2: the passing of her lifelong love - her husband, Jack. After that her health deteriorated rapidly and by the time she was admitted to Barbara Burrell a couple of years later, she was

column1: also sadly in the deeper stages of Alzheimer’s and Dementia.

column2: with one of the most generous hearts

The aim of the raising of funds  is to get our dream back that we so devastatingly lost around 2 weeks ago to a fire that ripped through our house and our business.

We would  love to have your support or to have you on-board. 

Or business supported young people in the community into work and also feeding programs and educational programs for kids we gave a lot to local charity but now everything is gone.

The business was for us to take to the next level in due course and buy or lease our dream resort having spent 20 years in the hotel industry it was always a dream for us to have our very own Eco resort.

We moved from the UK to the Philippines  3 years ago with our now 5 year old son with the dream of owning our dream resort 1 day which is now destroyed and with myself now returned to the UK with my 5 year and having to leave my wife back in the Philippines our whole world has been turned upside down in the matter of a few hours.

We are now challenging ourselves to try and raise as much funds as possible to get our dream back on track with our dream resort and you can be part of it all and support us through these times.

 The Resort

We have identified the blue palm resort which we can turn into Eco resort. The resort would consist of natural spring water throughout including the swimming pool we would also like to include solar panels for generating our own electricity for the resort. We can build an entire new resort but it would be better to adapt an already existing resort were most of the ground work is already been done.

Having locally sourced food &
column2:
beverages to support the local businesses we would also be employing local people and run apprenticeships to help job growth within the community.

The resort to take over should be complete within a 2 month time frame pending on the contracts or any maintenance that has been raised by us.

if we are to lease the property again this should take around the same amount of time it could take a little longer if there is some issues raised. 

the resort we have looked at just now have a peak occupancy rate between 65% to 90% off peak rates are around 45% to 60% i know with my knowledge of the business my contacts throughout the world we can really push these percentages up.

The 1 thing that the Philippines has is the all your round weather this has to be used to our advantage and promoting the resort in the right way with either direct bookings or through an OTA like booking.com or Expedia but lets not forget about the social media and how this can promote the resort also in the right ways.

column5:
>Budget 

Having spent most of my life in the hotel industry i am qualified to make good judgments on this resort the lease of the resort would be 1 of long term. Having worked on many hotel budgets in countries like Dubai,Abu dhabi ,turkey,UK Spain,France and Philippines.
column11:
>will still be able to take over the resort lease even if we don't make our required target.

I will also be funding the project from my own pocket as expected but most of the pledges will be for the lease of the property and working capital during the coming months.
column20:
>   

With the local environment of the resort and the natural source of fruit and vegetables in abundance we will use and much as we can of these wonderful sources like the coconut , mango ,papaya and many others to our advantage and integrate this into the resort in so many ways to our food menus drinks menu and to the spa. 

We will also look at solar powering the resort with so much natural light this will be the best factor for long term sustainability of the resort and making sure that we are using the renewable energy the best way we can.

all water is spring water throughout the resort i have seen how easy this can be done so i am not foreseeing in problems within this department.  

Community

We will always support the local community in anyway possible as we have been doing for 3 years now with food programs cleaning programs and children's educational programs.

We will also be running apprenticeships for young people for them to  gain experience in a serious work place to develop.

Family

We are a family the resort will be run like a family gaining all my 20 years of hotel &
column21:
resort experience to make the resort better year on year building a future for our son and a legacy for our family and you can be part of that family by supporting us. 

At the moment our family are 6000 miles apart due to the circumstances that unfolded with this project and your support all of as can be reunited again my son can be with his mother and the project can be kick started and put in place.

Thank you for your contribution and god bless your family. 

Other ways to donate.

You can also follow us on our social media pages for more information.

https://www.facebook.com/Fundourdream2015

https://twitter.com/Fund_our_dream 

Please like and share our pages any questions you may have will be answered.
column25:
>FAQ

Could we have Skype communication with you during and after the project.

Yes we can share Skype id and we would be more than happy to chat with you.

When will my perks be ready.

Most perks will be ready for September but for any reason we are running late we will keep everyone informed on our social media pages or we can get in touch direct with you or on our indigogo page.

Will we be refunded if the target is not met.

Unfortunately not as we are on a flexi Plan and every little bit help to get or dream back on track and our family back together.

how can i receive updates.  

Once you have made your pledge we will have your email address we can either send you updates direct or you can check on our social media pages or if you want to have a chat we will be available for this also via Skype.
