Short Summary

Let me summarize it for you:
column14:
bvm=bv.80185997,d.eXY"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">Groupon Founder's Next Big Plan: Audio Walking Tours , Well I have been developing this for more than year and Its 100% finish and live.

Iphone app download here

Android app download here

Hello, My name is Arturo Gentili, I am an entrepreneur and dreamer who loves to travel. My last trip to Europe I couldn’t find a self guided tour app to see  most of the cities I was going to.  Most free apps are just Wikipedia information, the few apps with good information (human made) and geolocation features are paid ones where the developer is the only one who can create the tour guides. So I had this idea to create a platform, where people can share experience/knowledge about places creating audio tour guides to be used by others and these others can help to improve the tour guides. Like Wikipedia but about tours, that is where the name Wikitour comes from.

I have invested to develop Wikitour to be totally free and an easy to use platform. It’s already 100% working and live (website&
column16:
ios). It allows you to create audio tour guides through our website very easy and quickly to be available for download at any phone instantly. You can go to www.mywikitour.com and check everything by yourself.

Our Platform has 2 users: Website users who create audio tour guides and phone users who use the tour guides.

Who are website users?

column1: • Any business or organization who needs virtual audio tour guide for their customers, example: museums, universities, art galleries, travel agencies, bike rentals, etc.
• Any business, organization or person who wants to promote a place. example: City Mayor´s office, ONGs, local business that work with tourism, etc.
• Any person who is traveling can create his/her own audio guide tour, example: school teacher for their students in a field trip, Sales Manager for his vendors, group traveling, etc.
• Any person who wants to share his/her experience/knowledge with the world.

column6:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

In no more than a few minutes, you create the audio tour guide online, no special skill is needed, just add photos, audio, video and text and your tour guide is available for everyone with a mobile phone.
column11:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

CHECK IT YOURSELF, create audio guide tour here , download Wikitour app here for android  and here for iphone .  Check out website for app only www.wikitourapp.com

column1: We are 100% free,free to create audio tour guide, free to download audio tour guide, free to use offline with google maps and geolocation features.
Very easy to create tour, just need to add information and the tour with all feautres are created instantly and automatically to be used.
Its WIKI, means its a collaborative platform where the audio tour guides are created by 1 person but updated by anybody who is willing to upload video,photo,audio and/or text.

Its a win - win situation for both users: Web users have a free method to expand the reach of their knowledge, adding new product and/or reaching new customers (phone users) for their business/organization
column2: Phone users have free access to unlimited amount of information, making tourism efficient, safe and more pleasurable.

column1: Earn extra income for free, anybody , with no initial fee, can create tour, set a price and start making money from it. We will only get a % of sales when sales are made.

Why We Need Funding

I have spent all my money to develop what you see today. I need funding to:
Make 50 professional audio tour guides (hire pro voice over Jamie Buck http://www.jamiebuckvoiceovers.com, example audio Paris tour click here) about the most important sightseeings in the world.
Improve interface to be more user-friendly in website/app. I focus all my investment on functionality of the platform rather than design,
Online advertising for everyone to know this tool is available for free.

Finish to develop a pay system so that, anybody , with no initial fee, can a create tour, set a price and start making money from it. We will only get % of sales when sales are made. (FINISH AND LIVE)
• Collaborate to improve the audio tour guides already created.
• Share in your social network the tours available.
• Share the website to anybody you think can use this amazing tool.
• Make voice over for us for free.
• Be beta tester, use Wikitour app, so any bug will be automatically reported.

Wikitour Making Tourism Easier.

Facebook Page

Twitter account

and I'm living in Norway.


Let me tell you a story.
friend Edi saw the series “Long Way Round” starring Ewan
McGregor and Charlie Boorman traveling around the world on
motorcycles. After seeing all the episodes of the show, we quickly
ended up asking ourselves the question: “Why can't we do a
and then that we would plan and have an adventure on motorcycles on a

17000 kilometer trip, with a maximum period of 6 weeks.

We
first thought we would go Scandinavia round and then decided on
Iceland round, but found that those trips might not give us the

specific adventure we're looking for.

One day my friend Edi
asked me, “How about the Black Sea? We start in Norway, drive
through Denmark, Germany, Zcech Republic, Slovakia, Hungary, Romania,
down to Bulgaria, on to Turkey and through the whole country and then
up to Georgia driving through the whole country again and spend some
time on the mountains there before we go to Russia and to Chechnya to
visit our friend Husein, further we go to Sochi and up through Russia
to Estonia and take a Ferry to Stockholm in Sweden to drive the last

750 kilometers back to Kristiansand! Boom!”

I loved the idea and the planning

began!


My friend had alot of the important stuff ready, like

the motorcycle license and the motorcycle.
Mind you everything is
For myself, the plan seemed much more
far fetched. I first had to complete the car license, then the
motorcycle license and THEN buy a motorcycle. That again, cost me
tens of thousands of kroner here in Norway.
It took me one year and I pulled
through, getting all licences I needed and a motorcycle. At that
point the adventure got more feasible to me and I continued to work
for having the money necessary for fuel, food, housing, all the gear

for the trip and necessary mods for my bike.

It is now the 19th of May
and we have manually drawn in all the roads we are going to travel in
Google Earth and then we export it to Garmin Basecamp and on to the
GPS devices. We have routed 12500 kilometers and only have Russia
left to route. Our Adventure starts on 28<sup>th</sup> of June and we

are planning to be back on 10th of August.

On
the trip itself we are going to film everything with two GoPro Hero 3

cameras and take a lot of pictures and film with two DSLR cameras.
I
personally have experience in photography and video editing, so the
plan here is to make either a documentary of the adventure and/or a
mini series, we will definitely produce some type of video material

for everybody to see.

All is well and dandy, and we are soon

on the road!



But....

Between the 16th of May
and the 17<sup>th</sup> which is the Norwegian national day, my
motorcycle got stolen from the garage it was locked in at the school

where I work.

I went to work today on 19th of May

and saw that the bike was gone. This didn't exactly make my day.
The
police got noticed and I called the insurance company, and found out
that I hadn't applied for theft insurance so they couldn't help me.
The Police can't do more than keep
an eye out, but since there were a lot of thefts in general between
this 16<sup>th</sup> and 17<sup>th</sup> of May it is highly unlikely
that this done by locals, and is possibly shipped out of town

already.

I am now in a Catch 22 situation where either choice
I could make would exclude me from participating on the trip. If I
were to buy a new bike with the means I have saved for the trip, I
wont have the means to complete it, also, it goes without saying that
without the bike I can't go on this journey, a not so convenient
Needless to say I was pretty down and after work I went to a
café to meet my good friend Kristoffer Liland. He pretty quickly

came up with a possible solution:
Crowd funding!

This is
the one chance I have to be able to undertake this trip. I need a new

Iron Horse!

This was actually never supposed to be a crowd
funding project but it seems I have no choice, so I would like to ask
anybody who is willing to give a helping hand to donate any amount
possible through “Indiegogo” in hopes of being able to reach at
least 15000 Norwegian Krones to be able to afford this crucial tool

needed for this adventure, a Suzuki DRZ400.

If everybody and
anybody could help with just a little, there is a possibility for me
to go on this adventure together with my good friend, Edi.
PS. If the motorcycle is by any chance
returned to me, I will stop the funding, and return all money. If I
have bought the new bike, I will do my very best to refund everyone

by selling the bike.

UPDATE!
ALL IS WELL CHECK ON TOP!
UPDATE!

Peace, Rando

have bought the new bike, I will do my very best to refund everyone
by selling the bike.UPDATE!ALL IS WELL CHECK ON TOP! UPDATE!Peace, Rando",4.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: These are the components for our next project, the Cynaps Assist Next Generation Headset. It is already fully tested and working, both for exceptional clarity and feedback elimination. Both sides are charged and operate independently, and the headset will be reversible, meaning if you only want to use one side, you can, and you'll double the battery life. For example, if you only want to use the right side always, once the battery is depleted, you can switch sides so the second (full) module is placed on the right side and continue using it twice as long. The average battery life is about 4-6 hours depending on the noise level, meaning both sides used individually can easily last a full day.

Both the Cable Connected Headset and the Assist Next Generation Headset are 90% complete (the boards have been populated, tested and now being actively produced), and the only thing we lack at this point for both products to be finished are the housing, packaging and instructions. Since we're in the home stretch, there's a chance we may finish these in December, but we're committing to end of January to be safe.

The full value of everything together is well over $500, but this campaign will give us a chance to put the final touches on these last two devices. You guys are basically making this happen faster and better by participating in this campaign, so we need to give you an awesome deal in return :)

6. Christmas Delivery:  $199 First Responders will receive the first 3 perks in the list above by Christmas. We'll ship US orders before Dec 18th by USPS Priority Mail and international orders using Singapore Post by Dec 15th. While we can guarantee Christmas delivery for US backers backing this perk, we can't guarantee it for international backers, although we will ship them to you by the 15th, and many of you should receive them in time.
In summary, you get all 6 perks above for $199 - with free worldwide shipping. But there are only 100 available.

","Cynaps Assist is a new breed of assistive listening headgear, to enhance hearing for faint, far away sounds using vibration.
It uses bone conduction to direct the amplified sound into the inner ear using vibration. Use it for hearing sounds that cannot normally be heard without assistance.
It's rugged and can be used during sports, such as biking, running or soccer, and the disconnectable modules can be easily replaced if lost or damaged.
Here are the available styles, with Cynaps Assist integrated(let us know your choice in the comments section after you pledge!)

It's super adjustable and will fit most children from 0-12 years old.Kid's helmet in blue and pink. Size is also adjustable from 52-56cm (20.5 - 22 inches head circumference) and will fit most children from 0-12 years old. The module is integrated into the helmet and includes a special cover to protect from the rain.Adult caps in white, grey and black. Sweat absorbing and designed for heavy activity.Adult helmet in grey. All four adjust from 56 to 62 cm (20 - 24.5 inches) and are made to fit all adults and most children 12 or over. The module is integrated into the helmet and includes a special cover to protect from the rain.

2. The Cynaps Bluetooth Bone Conduction Headset

This will let you connect by Bluetooth to any phone or PC make calls and listen to audio via bone conduction. Anything from phone conversations to watching Netflix on your PC is possible! The module clips onto your shirt or bag for easy access.

Listen to your favorite tunes via bone conduction with this standalone music player. Store 1600 songs on the included 8GB card! The module also clips onto your shirt or bag for easy access.Both of these devices can be used in combination with the Cynaps Assist headgear and be heard simultaneously via bone conduction, meaning you can take a call while talking with a friend face to face, and the sound from both devices will be directed to the inner ear using bone conduction.
.....and now for the really interesting bit :)
In January, we will send you two MORE very awesome devices as part of this perk level:4. Cable Connected Bone Conduction Headset with Siri / Iris capability

This is a bone conduction headset that can connect to any mobile phone and can be used for calls and music, as well as Siri & Iris voice commands. We will also include a small Y cable that will let you connect to a PC (mic and audio jacks) for stuff like Skype calls, movies, etc and a micro B usb cable for charging and constant connected power when using a PC.

These are the components for our next project, the Cynaps Assist Next Generation Headset. It is already fully tested and working, both for exceptional clarity and feedback elimination. Both sides are charged and operate independently, and the headset will be reversible, meaning if you only want to use one side, you can, and you'll double the battery life. For example, if you only want to use the right side always, once the battery is depleted, you can switch sides so the second (full) module is placed on the right side and continue using it twice as long. The average battery life is about 4-6 hours depending on the noise level, meaning both sides used individually can easily last a full day.

Both the Cable Connected Headset and the Assist Next Generation Headset are 90% complete (the boards have been populated, tested and now being actively produced), and the only thing we lack at this point for both products to be finished are the housing, packaging and instructions. Since we're in the home stretch, there's a chance we may finish these in December, but we're committing to end of January to be safe.

The full value of everything together is well over $500, but this campaign will give us a chance to put the final touches on these last two devices. You guys are basically making this happen faster and better by participating in this campaign, so we need to give you an awesome deal in return :)

Tracing Nepal is a sixteen day experience which will bring eight non-resident Nepali youths together and take them on a journey to explore and experience Nepal like never before. During the journey, the young individuals will be visiting Maya Universe Academy in Tanahun where they will be roughing it up in village home-stays and be involved in teaching, construction and farmwork. The second phase of the experience will take these youths to Taplejung, Eastern region of Nepal where they will live it up locally in Sablakhu village. Activities range from ""dhan ropain"" (rice plantation) to assisting at the heavily populated local government school Singhadebi Madhyamik Vidhyalaya. The final part of the experience consists of downtime at Nepal's famed The Last Resort.

Tracing Nepal aims to uncover the real Nepal for these youths who have spent majority of their years living outside of Nepal. Through this experience, I hope they too will foster a deeper relationship with Nepal and play an active role in the future of our country.

We have twenty-one days to reach the £500 goal! Reaching the goal would mean we would be able to buy school equipments for the children at Maya Universe Academy, support the school for its upcoming hostel building that is currently under construction and gift each of the two-hundred students of Singhadebi Madhyamik Vidhyalaya (Sablakhu) with copies, pencil, erasers and school bags.
In addition to that, we would also be able to provide support materials for the staff of both of the schools.

£500 will go a long way as this money will also be spent on filming the sixteen day Tracing Nepal experience. The journey which will be filmed from Day 1 to Day 16 will follow the volunteers as they immerse themselves in the local way of life and deal with the challenges and surprises along the way! Tracing Nepal will arrive on YouTube by the end of this year.
• Students of Maya Universe Academy will receive new a set of school equipments.
• Nepals first free private school Maya Universe Academy - Tanahun will receive support for its upcoming hostel building that is currently under construction.
• Two-hundred students of Singhadebi Madhyamik Vidhyalaya will receive new set of school equipments.

• Singhadebi School will receive stationery supplies, geometry boxes, globe, maps, basketball, football, badminton rackets and more.
  • Tracing Nepal will be filmed with your support - we hope this journey that we capture on film and eventually share on YouTube will motivate more youths to take on a journey to the unknown!
  • Your support for Tracing Nepal will automatically mean you are part of the Tracing Nepal family! You will receive Tracing Nepal goodies!

column4: >To encourage the exchange of skills between Nepalis living at home and abroad

column1:
The Perks

We want you to know that we value your support! By supporting us and becoming a Tracing Nepal family, we also have a little something to share with you:

• £5 - Personalized Thank You note from students.
  • £10 - Personalized Thank You note from students and a Tracing Nepal pen.
  • £25 - Personalized Thank You note from students, Tracing Nepal pen, Tracing Nepal poster and a Tracing Nepal tote bag.
• £50 - Peronalized Thank You note from students, Tracing Nepal pen, Tracing Nepal poster, Tracing Nepal tote bag and a Tracing Nepal T-Shirt.
• £75 - Personalized Thank You note from students, Tracing Nepal pen, Tracing Nepal poster, Tracing Nepal tote bag, Tracing Nepal T-Shirt and a desk calendar.

Thank you very much for taking your time and viewing the Tracing Nepal page. The areas of main focus from your support with Tracing Nepal will be to provide assistance to the Singhadebi Madhyamik Vidhyalaya and Maya Universe Academy. Your contribution will not only support the children and the existing schools in Nepal but it will also go a long way to support the very first group of Nepali volunteers from the UK as they undertake the first Tracing Nepal journey. We hope to inspire and encourage more Nepalis and non-Nepalis in the future to discover Nepal through Tracing Nepal.

Please do not forget to visit Tracing Nepal on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter!

Thank you for your interest about Corky.
If someone who do not receive the Corky even ordered before, then please give us the email. We will send it as soon as possible.
Email address exists bottom of this page.

Q: How are shipments made?

A: Worldwide shipment will be available via air transport from Korea. Shipping charges may vary depending on destination. You can check the fee on the shipping cost chart.

*We offer free shipping to Korea, Republic of!  

Q: When will shipments start?

A: Shipments will start in May 2017. Shipments will be sent in the order listed. We will provide you with the shipping notification and tracking code through your email address immediately after shipment.

Q: Please describe the “Distributor” option.

A: If you choose the “Distributor” option, you will receive 100 CORKYs plus 3 CORKYs in limited edition colors at an exceptional price. You can become a CORKY distributor in your purchase area, enjoying a 55% discount from regular retail prices. Please check import tariff policies which may vary depending on your country!

Q: Can I choose a color?

A: Yes. You can choose the color you want when choosing CORKY.

Q: Is it a set of two pieces?

A: Yes. CORKY is supplied in a set of two pieces for both end caps.

Q: Can I order different colors for one set?

A: No. CORKY is supplied as a set of two pieces of the same color.

Q: Is it possible to order personal colors or engraved products?

A: No. CORKY is mass-produced. Personal customization may be available in the future. but there are no plans to make it available for now.

Q: Can CORKY be used for all types of bikes?

A: No. CORKY is optimized for road bikes and can be used for all types of road bikes.

 

                                 Contact us: eugene@thebeamkorea.com

100% Genuine, Vegetable Tanned Leather. As you use your wallet the leather will look better with age. It is more durable than oil waxed leather. It doesn't crack or get brittle.
RFID Blocking. This will keep those pesky thieves from scanning your important card information.
Easy Access Pull-Tab. With the pull-tab feature, you can quickly and effortlessly get to your cards.
Ultra Thin. Comfortably holds 8-10 cards and is still as thin as your smart phone.

RFID Blocking. This will keep those pesky thieves from scanning your important card information.
Easy Access Pull-Tab. With the pull-tab feature, you can quickly and effortlessly get to your cards.

We have formed a strategic partnership with the Anxiety and Depression Association of America (ADAA). You can visit their site here and learn more about what they do.
5% of proceeds from all purchases will go towards initiatives such as:
• Funding research on better alternatives for treating mental disorders.
• Supporting those diagnosed with a mental disorder for therapy or medication.
• Educating and increasing awareness about the reality of these diseases and the opportunities that are available for those who suffer.
We are passionate about this topic and it is a large part of who we are. We know that with our influence and brand we can make a difference.
We believe that products should be made with the highest of quality and standards. We stand by our products and their quality and durability. There is a 1 year warranty on all Dulo products.
• Any damage on any part of the wallet resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, accidents.

We want to have a full line of the Nash Wallet, expanding into different styles and colors. We have plans to create other wallet designs and expand into other accessory categories if we are funded. We want to evolve into a well known lifestyle brand for the everyday adventurer while being able to make a difference in the world.

Pledge Amount. Our pledge amount is $10,000. Manufacturers are only able to produce items with a bulk order. This allows them to keep costs lower and make money. Ordering in mass amounts requires capital. That is why we need the $10,000. These funds will allow us to order in bulk quantities and begin to properly develop Dulo Supply Co. and our business model.

All-or-Nothing. We have elected to go with the ""all-or-nothing"" strategy. This means that if we don't raise our $10,000 goal we get NO MONEY! If we raise $9,999 we will receive no funds and all backers will not be charged for their payments. We chose this strategy over the ""flexible"" funding strategy because it ensures that you:
1. Get your wallet if we reach our goal.
2. Won't be charged for your purchase and will not receive the product if we don't reach our goal.

This leaves very little risk to the buyer, if any at all. We want to make sure that our buyers have confidence that they will only be charged  and receive their product if we reach our funding goal. Our relationship with you is EVERYTHING. Without you, this could not be possible.
Because you are taking a chance on us, we want to reward those who are the first to support us! The first 200 wallets purchased will be 33% off the retail pricing:
• 100 buyers for the Nash Solo Wallet
• 100 buyers for the Nash Trio Wallet
After the first 200 wallets are sold, the discount for the remaining wallets will reduce to 16% for the remainder of the campaign.
In addition to discounted pricing, we have decided to offer bundle packages to our buyers. This will enable customers to get an exclusive deal while purchasing multiple wallets.
We are looking to work with businesses or organizations that are interested in purchasing our wallets in bulk for clients or employees.
200 wallets is the minimum quantity required in order to add customization to our wallet designs.

Customization will include the business or organization logo of choice located on the wallet in the desired location. If this perk is selected, the buyer will be contacted upon completion of the campaign to discuss details of the order.

A year and a half ago, I had an experience that changed my life forever. I always knew that depression ran in my family, but I never thought that it would affect me personally. I thought that I was ""strong"" enough and could get over a down day or two. However, little by little my life began to lose purpose and the things that normally brought me joy did not.
After suffering through this for some time, I came to the conclusion that the best solution to my problem was to take my life. So, that's what I attempted to do.
Fortunately, my attempt failed and I am still here today.

I do not tell this story to receive pity, but rather to inform on the reality of depression, anxiety, and other mental disorders. I wanted to turn a difficult experience into a positive result. I wanted to make a difference and integrate things I was passionate about. Those things were mental disorder awareness, entrepreneurship, and minimalistic style. With that, Dulo Supply Co. was born.

The term ""Dulo"" comes from the Tagalog language of the Philippines meaning, ""end."" The social cause of Dulo Supply Co. is to create change, support initiatives for depression, anxiety, and other mental disorders, and ultimately ""end"" the lack of understanding about mental disorders.

We developed the idea of Dulo Supply Co. with the desire to make a difference in the world while providing customers with high-quality products that are minimalistic in design, but innovative in features. We are a lifestyle brand for your everyday adventures.
After almost a year of research, development, and preparation, we are ready to launch and make Dulo Supply Co. a reality.

Dulo Supply Co. was started by a young entrepreneur, Mitch Casey, who wanted to create a brand that would be known for making a difference. Mitch is passionate about Dulo Supply Co.'s cause as well as entrepreneurship and business. Mitch has experience with start-ups, supply chain operations, and is graduating with a business degree this coming April.

Mitch has sought out direction and guidance from multiple advisors who are helping him every step of the way. Each advisor has had success in various business realms. (The advisors will not be stated for privacy issues.)
Mitch's experience coupled with guidance from tenured business owners will ensure that your orders will be successfully fulfilled.

We are excited to see where our project can go with your help! We know that this would not be possible without you! We hope that we can successfully finish this campaign with funding, greater awareness, and the beginnings of a brand that can CREATE CHANGE.

Lifestyle Shots: Samuel Elkins, Gavin Johnson, and Macie Davies

We want to have a full line of the Nash Wallet, expanding into different styles and colors. We have plans to create other wallet designs and expand into other accessory categories if we are funded. We want to evolve into a well known lifestyle brand for the everyday adventurer while being able to make a difference in the world.

Pledge Amount. Our pledge amount is $10,000. Manufacturers are only able to produce items with a bulk order. This allows them to keep costs lower and make money. Ordering in mass amounts requires capital. That is why we need the $10,000. These funds will allow us to order in bulk quantities and begin to properly develop Dulo Supply Co. and our business model.

All-or-Nothing. We have elected to go with the ""all-or-nothing"" strategy. This means that if we don't raise our $10,000 goal we get NO MONEY! If we raise $9,999 we will receive no funds and all backers will not be charged for their payments. We chose this strategy over the ""flexible"" funding strategy because it ensures that you:
1. Get your wallet if we reach our goal.
2. Won't be charged for your purchase and will not receive the product if we don't reach our goal.

This leaves very little risk to the buyer, if any at all. We want to make sure that our buyers have confidence that they will only be charged  and receive their product if we reach our funding goal. Our relationship with you is EVERYTHING. Without you, this could not be possible.
Because you are taking a chance on us, we want to reward those who are the first to support us! The first 200 wallets purchased will be 33% off the retail pricing:
100 buyers for the Nash Solo Wallet
100 buyers for the Nash Trio Wallet
After the first 200 wallets are sold, the discount for the remaining wallets will reduce to 16% for the remainder of the campaign.
In addition to discounted pricing, we have decided to offer bundle packages to our buyers. This will enable customers to get an exclusive deal while purchasing multiple wallets.
We are looking to work with businesses or organizations that are interested in purchasing our wallets in bulk for clients or employees.
200 wallets is the minimum quantity required in order to add customization to our wallet designs.

Customization will include the business or organization logo of choice located on the wallet in the desired location. If this perk is selected, the buyer will be contacted upon completion of the campaign to discuss details of the order.

A year and a half ago, I had an experience that changed my life forever. I always knew that depression ran in my family, but I never thought that it would affect me personally. I thought that I was ""strong"" enough and could get over a down day or two. However, little by little my life began to lose purpose and the things that normally brought me joy did not.
After suffering through this for some time, I came to the conclusion that the best solution to my problem was to take my life. So, that's what I attempted to do.
Fortunately, my attempt failed and I am still here today.

I do not tell this story to receive pity, but rather to inform on the reality of depression, anxiety, and other mental disorders. I wanted to turn a difficult experience into a positive result. I wanted to make a difference and integrate things I was passionate about. Those things were mental disorder awareness, entrepreneurship, and minimalistic style. With that, Dulo Supply Co. was born.

The term ""Dulo"" comes from the Tagalog language of the Philippines meaning, ""end."" The social cause of Dulo Supply Co. is to create change, support initiatives for depression, anxiety, and other mental disorders, and ultimately ""end"" the lack of understanding about mental disorders.

We developed the idea of Dulo Supply Co. with the desire to make a difference in the world while providing customers with high-quality products that are minimalistic in design, but innovative in features. We are a lifestyle brand for your everyday adventures.
After almost a year of research, development, and preparation, we are ready to launch and make Dulo Supply Co. a reality.

Dulo Supply Co. was started by a young entrepreneur, Mitch Casey, who wanted to create a brand that would be known for making a difference. Mitch is passionate about Dulo Supply Co.'s cause as well as entrepreneurship and business. Mitch has experience with start-ups, supply chain operations, and is graduating with a business degree this coming April.

Mitch has sought out direction and guidance from multiple advisors who are helping him every step of the way. Each advisor has had success in various business realms. (The advisors will not be stated for privacy issues.)
Mitch's experience coupled with guidance from tenured business owners will ensure that your orders will be successfully fulfilled.

We are excited to see where our project can go with your help! We know that this would not be possible without you! We hope that we can successfully finish this campaign with funding, greater awareness, and the beginnings of a brand that can CREATE CHANGE.
Video Models: Marshall Ward, Courtney Wood, Ashton Burrows, and Kenna Pliler
Lifestyle Shots: Samuel Elkins, Gavin Johnson, and Macie Davies
Lifestyle models: Dallin Jolley, Dani Ward, and Shaye Edwards",36.0,0,"3 Campaigns

Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks &
column3:
Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

The extremely efficient, heavy duty stainless steel burner provides instant heat and gets your Firepod ready for cooking quickly. The twin stones have an air gap between them to stop direct heat going through and cooking the pizza base too fast. The stainless steel reflector above the stones directs heat back down to cook the toppings. With the door closed, the vent at the top allows just the right airflow for the heat to circulate and create uniform cooking throughout.

The griddle simply fits in place of the pizza stones. Ridged BBQ side or flat skillet side up depending on your menu. Light with the auto-ignition and you're ready for a BBQ in minutes. The built in trough catches grease for easy cleanup and the stainless steel handles make for easy transition from grill to skillet and back.

The lava stone is a slab of specially cut basalt rock from an old volcano. Heat it in your Firepod for about half an hour and using the special gloves supplied, lift it out and place it on the board. A quick wipe with olive oil and you're ready to start cooking. Prawns and strips of meat cook in seconds and everyone can cook their food as they like it.  The stone will fast-cook for about 30 minutes and then stay hot enough for slower cooking for a further 20 minutes, although you can always pop it back in your Firepod to heat it up. 

 

Savoury Pizza

The really great thing about pizza is that we can all have them exactly how we like them. Thin and crispy, deep base, 00 flour, gluten-free or sourdough
column2: pesto, passata, bechamel or marinara sauce
column3:
vegetarian, seafood or meaty toppings. With The Firepod you can cook at a steady 620ºF (320ºC) allowing your dough to rise as it cooks. In less than four minutes you will have a delicious pizza with a light, crispy base, and perfectly cooked toppings. It honestly couldn't be easier to cook perfect pizza - as you can see above, our customers confirm this.

Sweet Pizza

Sweet pizza is coming back into fashion and is a fun snack or dessert to share with family and friends. Here we used a normal 00 base with Nutella, very ripe pear, California strawberries and a few chocolates for luck. Honey, fruit jam and yoghurt can work well with fruits too.

BBQ Grill

Juicy marinated steaks, locally farmed sausages and all of your BBQ favorites are easy to cook on the ridged side of the griddle. We've included a trough to catch excess fat while cooking and the stainless steel handles mean you can lift the griddle off and take it to your table, still sizzling. Now you can really show off at your next tailgate party.

Skillet

For a really fun breakfast, turn the griddle over and cook pancakes, bacon and eggs on the flat skillet side. This is great for cooking seafood too. Cooking something that you need your own pan for? The skillet side is perfect for frying a few onions, heating up soups and stews or heating up a kettle of water. You can even get fancy with more exquisite dishes like risottos, curries and paellas. 

Hot Rock Cooking

Cooking on a slab of hot lava stone is a fun and healthy way to cook. Simply heat the volcanic stone in the Firepod, place onto the special board and take to your table, indoors or out for cooking. Seafood, meats and vegetables all cook very quickly, sealing in flavor exquisitely. You can cook whole steaks or cut them into strips and they cook in seconds. Everyone can cook their own food exactly how they like it, so you'll be a popular host.

 

We've been manufacturing for over a year a now and we are busy selling to the UK and Europe. Our first Firepod left our warehouse here in the UK on 4th May 2017.

Can I use a Firepod on my balcony?

The Firepod is perfect for balconies but please check with your local town office or Fire Dept. for the proper use of gas appliances in multi-family dwellings.

What gas can it use?

The Firepod is designed to run on propane gas (LPG)

How much gas does it use?

Difficult to say for sure as it depends on what you are cooking but the Firepod is very efficient and will run for many Hrs on even a single camping container

What can I cook on the Lava Stones?

Small pieces of meat, fish and vegetables are best as they cook to perfection in seconds. Everyone can cook to their own liking.

What is included with The Firepod?

Please see each perk to see what is included. All Firepods include our special heat-resistant gloves.

What if I change my mind about a color?

If you change your mind about the color you have selected, let us know before the end of the campaign and we can change it for you. (Excludes Fast-track perks)

What is it made of?

The body is 2mm thick mild steel with a high temperature enamel coating. The Firepod wood is Malaysian Oak and the tools are bamboo
column4:
both extremely eco-friendly materials.

What is the burner made of?

The gas burner is made from top quality heavy duty stainless steel.

How heavy is it?

The Firepod – 24lbs (11.2kg)

Pizza stone – 5lbs (2.25kg)

Griddle set – 17lbs (7.7kg)

Lava Stone Set – 25lbs (11.3kg)

How do I get spares?

We stock all replacement parts which can be ordered from our website.

How long does it take to heat up/cook?

It will be ready for your first pizza in about 8 minutes
column5:
a thin crust pizza takes under 4 minutes to cook.

Is it easy to clean?

The top lifts off so you can easily get to all parts. As a pizza oven, The Firepod gets so hot that little cleaning is needed.

Can I heat the lava stone in my own oven at home?

Domestic ovens do not get hot enough for heating lava stones.

Can I cook a frozen pizza on the Firepod?

Yes, it cooks frozen pizzas perfectly, but keep the temperature at the lower end of the cooking zone.

Is the outside of the Firepod hot to touch when cooking?

Yes, like most pizza ovens and BBQs, the outside of The Firepod gets hot when in use. Always use the heat resistant gloves provided Firepod and keep children and animals well away. Please read the instructions before use.

Can I leave it outside?

The Firepod is fine left undercover and with our cover on to keep it dry.

GRIDDLE

Does it come with tools?

The griddle set includes a set of Tongs
column8:
Wire Brush, all in a beautiful aluminium case.

How long does it take to get hot?

The griddle is ready for cooking in just a few minutes.

HOT ROCK

How long will it keep cooking food for?

After 20 – 30 mins of heating, it will stay sizzling hot for 30 minutes and then cook slowly for another 20 minutes. Food cooks so fast this is plenty of time, however you can keep the stone on The Firepod to cook for a longer period, if you like.

column1: We designed a tent that adapts to you, whether you’re alone, with a friend, or camping with a party of four. Think of it as three unique tents in one.
Our system consists of a two-person, standalone tent, its rainfly, and a snap-in “alcove” that seamlessly integrates with the tent—doubling the sleeping and storage space.
Now you don’t have to own more than one tent just because the size of your group and sleeping scenarios change from one outdoor adventure to the next.

We’re committed to creating a positive social impact through our health, education, and livelihoods initiatives. Each year, we designate 10% of our profits to provide targeted grants to nonprofits and partners that have demonstrated outstanding impact, agility, and persistence. Learn more about our giving initiatives at cotopaxi.com/impact
All our products are Guaranteed For Good. Your product is guaranteed to last 61 years, the average lifespan of a person living in the developing world.

If your product does not meet your expectations in any way, we’ll work with you to resolve the issue, whether that means returning the item for repair, replacing or exchanging it, or refunding your purchase.
At Cotopaxi, we create innovative outdoor products and experiences that help alleviate poverty, move people to do good, and inspire adventure.

Davis Smith is a member of the UN Foundation’s Global Entrepreneurs Council. He was previously the Co-CEO of Baby.com.br, Brazil's startup of the year in 2012. He is a graduate of Brigham Young University (BA), the University of Pennsylvania's Lauder Institute (MA) and Wharton School (MBA). Davis is a lover of the outdoors and recently lead a team on the first successful crossing from Cuba to Florida via kayak.

CJ Whittaker (Co-Founder and VP of Product) -
CJ is an award-winning gear designer and is a 10+ year veteran of the outdoor industry. His previous work has been with companies such as Black Diamond Equipment and Gregory Mountain Products. Today, you can regularly find him in the backcountry, climbing, trail running, on the slopes, or traveling the world. CJ holds a BFA in Industrial Design from Brigham Young University.
The final step in our journey of getting the first batch of Inti 2 Tent Systems produced and out to market involves you!
You can help us by funding the campaign in whatever way you can. You'll get your Inti 2 in time to enjoy the summer and fall camping season.
•  Spread the word! Make sure to let others know about our campaign!
Thanks again for your support of everything we're doing at Cotopaxi.

column1: Is the Inti 2 treated with flame retardant?
column3: >Yes. The Inti 2 meets the flammability requirements of CPAI-84. However, you should keep all flame and heat sources away from the tent fabric, and should not operate any device which burns fuel inside the tent.

column2: >Allowing 20 days to receive the funds we raise, we can expect to have your gear delivered to you within two months after the end of the campaign. We’ll make sure to get items sent out to you as soon as possible and will get you your gear with enough time to still enjoy the summer camping and backpacking season.
>What if I don't like my product?

>Cotopaxi products are guaranteed to last 61 years, the average lifespan of a person living in the developing world. If there’s a problem with your product, we’ll gladly exchange it, get you a replacement, or repair the item in-house.
column3: >If you are unhappy with your purchase please reach out to us at llamas@cotopaxi.com and see our return and exchange policy below.

column2: >We accept returns on orders shipped within the US within 90 days of purchase, no questions asked. Please ensure that items are unworn, unwashed, and undamaged.

column1: Returns are always free and refunds are issued in the original form of payment for all purchases. Please note that all international sales are final, i.e., we cannot accept returns. Please do not hesitate to contact us at llamas@cotopaxi.com if anything seems amiss.

column2: >We want you to love your Cotopaxi gear as much as we love making it. If for any reason you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, we gladly accept exchanges on orders shipped within the U.S. within 90 days of purchase. Exchanges are not guaranteed because our stock is limited.

column1: We will cover the costs of shipping any new item(s) for all exchanges. (Please note that all international sales are final, i.e., we cannot accept exchanges.)
If you would like to exchange for a different item then we will treat it like a return, and you can place a new order for your new awesome item!
View our exchange and return policy here.

column2: >What does your “Gear For Good” slogan mean?
>Good question. We’ll let our CEO, Davis Smith, tell you:

column1: Where does the name Cotopaxi come from?
Cotopaxi is named after a volcano near Quito, Ecuador.

For more Frequently Asked Questions, visit http://help.cotopaxi.com/.

How do I choose my sizes and colors for my T-shirt, backpack, sleeping bag, mug, or water bottle?
At the end of the campaign, we will send you a link to a page with a form to fill out. There, you can choose your sizes, colors, and styles if applicable.
What sizes and colors do T-shirts come in?
Do Good T-shirts come in the following sizes and colors:
Women’s - S, M, L, XL, XXL
Women’s Colors - Grey, Red, Teal, Green
Men’s - S, M, L, XL, XXL
Men’s Colors - Grey, Red, Blue, Green
What colors of Luzon 18L Daypacks will I be able to choose from?

Bounty Hunter, Lado Oscuro, Palace Band, Space Port, & Shopping Maul. Others colors may be available. If things change, we will update them here. You can view more information on the Luzon 18L Daypack here.
What colors will be available for the Peak Mug?
Black or Banana. Check out the colors and more info on the Peak Mug here.
What colors will be available for the Sueño Sleeping Bag?
Red/Blue, Black, or Green/Orange. View the colors and more information on the Sueño here.
What happens when the Early-Bird slots for tents are gone?
Good question! We will add the normal perks and open up more options for more backers.

Is the Inti 2 treated with flame retardant?Yes. The Inti 2 meets the flammability requirements of CPAI-84. However, you should keep all flame and heat sources away from the tent fabric, and should not operate any device which burns fuel inside the tent.When do I get my gear?

Allowing 20 days to receive the funds we raise, we can expect to have your gear delivered to you within two months after the end of the campaign. We’ll make sure to get items sent out to you as soon as possible and will get you your gear with enough time to still enjoy the summer camping and backpacking season.
What if I don't like my product?

Cotopaxi products are guaranteed to last 61 years, the average lifespan of a person living in the developing world. If there’s a problem with your product, we’ll gladly exchange it, get you a replacement, or repair the item in-house. If you are unhappy with your purchase please reach out to us at llamas@cotopaxi.com and see our return and exchange policy below.
We accept returns on orders shipped within the US within 90 days of purchase, no questions asked. Please ensure that items are unworn, unwashed, and undamaged.

Returns are always free and refunds are issued in the original form of payment for all purchases.  Please note that all international sales are final, i.e., we cannot accept returns. Please do not hesitate to contact us at llamas@cotopaxi.com if anything seems amiss.

We want you to love your Cotopaxi gear as much as we love making it. If for any reason you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, we gladly accept exchanges on orders shipped within the U.S. within 90 days of purchase. Exchanges are not guaranteed because our stock is limited.
We will cover the costs of shipping any new item(s) for all exchanges. (Please note that all international sales are final, i.e., we cannot accept exchanges.)
If you would like to exchange for a different item then we will treat it like a return, and you can place a new order for your new awesome item!
View our exchange and return policy here.
What does your “Gear For Good” slogan mean?
Good question. We’ll let our CEO, Davis Smith, tell you:
Where does the name Cotopaxi come from?
Cotopaxi is named after a volcano near Quito, Ecuador.
For more Frequently Asked Questions, visit http://help.cotopaxi.com/.",35.0,1,"4 Campaigns

column2:
>

 

We’re Kammok. Since our launch on Kickstarter in 2011, packs have been requested by our community. So we made a line of adventure grade, better made packs to elevate your time outside.

We’re proud to introduce the Burro Packs: Burro Zip 18, Burro Roll 26, and Burro Duffel 30.

>


Designed for the micro-adventure, the Burro Zip 18 provides easy access to your essentials. Water-resistant YKK zippers and durable, waterproof seam sealed fabric protects against unexpected weather. From your daily bike commute to the best views in Yosemite, the Burro Zip 18 is equipped for the trek from sunrise to summit. 
 

The lightweight warrior
column5: >
column6: >

column1:
The Burro Zip 18 is your go-to daypack, whether commuting in the city or exploring the trails. Waterproof fabric, seam sealed construction, and water-resistant zippers protect your laptop, gear, and other valuables from unexpected downpours.

Every Burro Zip 18 comes with a removable back pad and waist belt, and is backed by the Kammok Adventure Grade Lifetime Warranty.

column3:
/>


Built for the wilderness, but not a stranger to the city, the Burro Roll 26 is an incredibly adaptable pack. A spacious main compartment provides ample storage on-the-go, from overnight hikes to weekend travels. Waterproof fabric and a roll-top design keep the elements out and your gear desert dry. Lightweight and packed with innovative, modular features, the Burro Roll 26 equips all-day carrying comfort with the performance for you to cover more ground.
 

For a Weekend or a Week

column6:
>
 

The Burro Roll 26 is a lightweight pack with ample storage for overnight hikes to weekend travels. A weathertight roll-top closure protects gear from the elements and quickly adjusts when you need a little more storage. The large side zipper allows you to grab gear from the main compartment without unrolling the pack. Every Burro Roll 26 comes with a removable back pad, waist belt, two utility pockets, and is backed by the Kammok Adventure Grade Lifetime Warranty.

column3:
/>
 

Designed for extended trips and time on the road, the Burro Duffel 30 is the bag that gets you to your destination. A spacious, weathertight (non-submersible) main compartment provides ample carrying capacity without compromising on weight and easily stows away as a carry-on. In your hand, slung over a shoulder, or on your back, customizable straps ease the trek from terminal to off-road terrain. Whether you’re stranded on the tarmac or find yourself in an unexpected setting, the Burro Duffel 30 is your reliable pack for the journey.
 

For a Week or More

column5: >
column6:
> 

The Burro Duffel 30 is a modular travel pack for longer trips away from home. Ready for the journey, the duffel quickly converts to backpack carry with stowable shoulder straps. The duffel provides ample carrying capacity without compromising on weight and easily stows away as a carry-on. Every Burro Duffel 30 comes with a removable back pad, waist belt, and dopp kit and is backed by the Kammok Adventure Grade Lifetime Warranty.
column8:
>

 

What's included with every pack

The Burro Packs are designed to elevate your time outside. True to our design principles, they are lightweight, versatile and modular - customizable for every adventure. Made with durable, lightweight fabrics, the Burro Packs stuff into a Hip Pack or Dopp Kit when not in use. All Burro Packs come with a modular back pad and waist belt so you can customize the pack to your comfort preferences. From the Ember Orange interior for high visibility into the pack, to the thoughtfully placed gear loops and compression straps, every detail was obsessed.

 

Back Pad

The Burro Zip 18, Burro Roll 26, and Burro Duffel 30, come with a padded, removable back pad that adds:

column1: • Comfort and support for the long haul
• A laptop sleeve to protect your tech

Burro Hip Pack

It’s your fanny pack, sling bag, toiletry bag, and more. The Burro Hip Pack is available now with your purchase of the Burro Zip 18 or Burro Roll 26 for hands-free carry. Duffel's come with a Dopp Kit instead of the Hip Pack. Duffels come with a Dopp Kit instead of the Hip Pack.

Waist Belt (Roll 26 also has Utility Pockets)

Keep your pack close when moving quickly on the trail. A removable waist belt is included with each pack in the Burro Line: Zip, Roll, Duffel and Hip Pack. For extra organization on extended hikes, the Burro Roll 26 comes with two modular utility pockets that easily attach to the waist belt or on your shoulder straps. The removable waist belt and utility pockets are adaptable to work on any Burro pack.

Adamas™ Fabric: Built for Adventure

The Burro Pack Line features our newest technical fabric Adamas™, a waterproof and abrasion-resistant material built to withstand travel on and off trail. Engineered from our Lunarwave™ 70D diamond ripstop nylon, Adamas™ has a bonded laminate core and double-sided PU coating for a waterproof finish. With laser cut and seam sealed construction, the Burro Packs create a watertight barrier, keeping your gear dry and protected from the elements.
column2:
>
 

Durable, waterproof fabrics and water-resistant zippers, the Burro Packs keep your gear dry in inclement weather, but are not submersible.
column3:
>

 

The Nitty Gritty

column1:
Time for the good stuff

Every reward perk is laid out below in detail. Note that every Burro Pack comes with a removable back pad within the pack. Included accessories hip packs and utility pockets will match the pack color selected
column2: so an Ember Orange pack will get an Ember Orange hip pack.
column5:
>

 

Behind the Design of our Burro Pack Line

We heard from our community of campers of a need for storage and organization, especially for existing gear, so we challenged ourselves to design a pack that would carry their time outside even further, no matter how big or small the adventure. After the idea was planted in 2012, we conceptualized a versatile pack designed to adapt to the everyday -- packs that reflected the core features across our product line: lightweight, modular, and versatile. Through countless iterations and hours spent on the production floor of our factories in Vietnam, our vision of a pack started to take form with our product designer Henry leading the way. We product tested prototypes from city to trail, ventured into unforgiving weather, and we’re excited to finally bring you the Burro Pack Line.

column6:
>
 

Adventure Grade Guarantee

Simply put, we’ve got your back. We are 100% certain you’ll enjoy our gear in the great outdoors for years to come. If your product does not perform as promised, we will make it right. Our guarantee is for life and all our products are backed with a Lifetime Warranty.

We’re committed to minimizing our footprint. When possible we make an effort to repair damage due to wear and tear. We evaluate warranty claims on a case-by-case basis with the ultimate objective of equipping you with safe, functioning gear ready for adventure.
column7:
>
 

Meet the Team
column8:
>

Based in Austin, Texas, Kammok designs technical, high-performing gear to elevate your time outside. We’re a motley crew of designers, wordsmiths, number ninjas, and pickleball champs. In all we do, we seek to fulfill our core values of adventure, community and love. Learn more about adventure and giving time outside from our nonprofit partner, Explore Austin.

This season, we’re elevating time outside with the Burro Pack Line. Designed for traveling, hiking and life in between, they’re sized for the way you spend time outside, whether micro-adventures or weeks away from home. The Burro Pack line, like all other Kammok gear, is backed by our lifetime warranty. Our gear performs how we say it will, without fault, or your money back. That’s our promise.

Have a question about Kammok or just want to say hello? Don’t hesitate to send us a message on Indiegogo or email hello@kammok.com.

column1: • 5 red lenses that can snap on over the LEDs.
• MagBak - aligns with the magnets on Ra to attach it to clothing.
• D-Ring Strap - straps onto Ra to provide additional mounting and use options using the D-Rings.
• Velcro roll to support additional mounting options.

As with any product development, unforeseen challenges are possible. The good news is that this team of professional industrial designers, engineers, programmers, sales, and marketing experts have brought hundreds of consumer products from concept to market over the last 30+ years, so we have a pretty good idea of what lies ahead and we're well equipped to deal with whatever comes our way.
That said, there are common obstacles that sometimes come up, which include:
• Design changes or minor adjustments to improve the final product causing delay
• Manufacturing, component, and material shortages from outside suppliers
• Shipments that are lost or damaged
• Fulfillment: Delivery delays due to weather, strikes, inaccurate address information, doorstep package theft, etc.
• Unforeseen international delivery issues (such as Antarctica).

As always, we are dedicated to making sure you know what is happening every step of the way. We'll be updating all of you ""Adventurers"" regularly and letting you know exactly what's going on as Ra development progresses.

Help us make the world's first strap light by selecting and clicking a ""GET THIS PERK"" button, and by helping us spread the word through sharing this IndieGoGo page and linking over to our Facebook and Zyntony.com web pages. This networking will help us to reach our funding goal.

After all, we're doing this together! 
We thank you for your faith in us!
