column4:
>

Poor mobile network coverage in secluded and remote areas, high costs of communication when traveling, breakdowns of the existing mobile networks in the cases of manmade or natural disasters
column5:
these are just a few of the challenges that conventional mobile networks face all the time. In such situations the communication is crucial but impossible.

Our personal experience with this problem drove us to develop our:

GOTOKY - World’s most advanced secure 100% off-grid communication device that enables smartphones, iOS and Android, to operate and create Mesh Network in areas where service is either nonexistent, unstable or excessively expensive.
column6:
>Gotoky's Features

When Gotoky is paired with a smartphone you can securely Talk (1-to-1 and group), send Texts (1-to-1 and group), activate the “Emergency” Location Beacon if in distress, use Navigation, Direction and distance to other Gotoky(s), share GPS locations with other Gotoky users on the detailed off-line topographic maps, as well use Real time Tracking, Route recording, creating events, Location Pinging etc. With Gotoky you can also create your own off-grid network.

 

The custom-designed mobile application for smartphone wraps up all the complexity Gotoky offers in an simple, easy-to-use and beautiful to look user experience. All data transfer is highly end-to end encrypted.
column7:
>Chats -Voice communication and Text Messaging combined in a feature Chats

By using the Chats mobile application, you can send or receive Voice recordings, Text messages and you can even send Event locations with Points of Interest. 

All Voice recordings are immediately streamed. In the case that your Voice recording has been missed your Voice message can be played again as many times as you like.

In some cases when the frequency band is too congested our smart protocols wait for a free window and send Voice messages with hardly any noticeable delay. This is not an issue with Text messages and location data, as these are much smaller packages of data.

column1: With Gotoky you can have private 1-to-1 or Group Chats with anyone from your Gotoky’s app Contact list. For Group Chats just create a Group and add people contacts  to the Group. You can even start communication from the navigation screen.
All chats and data transfers are private and secured, meaning whatever you say or send can be heard or read only by your selected counterpart.
column5:
showinfo=0"">
 

Gotoky enables up to 40 private 1-to-1 Voice Chats and more than 300 private Text Chats at the same time.
column6:
>""Emergency""Location Beacon Feature

The “Emergency” Location Beacon is a “just-in-case” feature - when activated your call for help is being automatically and repeatedly broadcasted and relayed over the Gotoky network - so each Gotoky, including those beyond your range, will receive your distress call.
column8: showinfo=0"">
column9:
>User with activated ""Emergency"" Location Beacon visible on the map, with all his data

When other Gotokys receive the “Emergency” Location Beacon a big full-screen orange alert window appears to notify Gotoky users that someone is in distress. By clicking on the distressed person's information Gotoky users can easily check the location of the person or even start a conversation.

This particular feature can be activated by Gotoky itself- if the smartphone’s battery is being empty or even when the smartphone is broken - more on this in the section below “Gotoky can work without smartphone”.
column10:
>Navigation Feature

The Gotoky mobile app provides very easy to use and informative Navigation. Each Gotoky around you regularly sends its own GPS location to other Gotokys, so all Gotokys in the area know of each other even if you don’t know them personally.  GPS location broadcasting can be also manually turned off, if the user doesn't want to be visible or tracked.

You can view all Gotokys around you on the FREE off-line preloaded maps. When you are somewhere off-grid in the wild it is good to know that somebody is nearby even if you can’t see them.
column13:
>Route recording: start and end points, naming the route, adding points of interest

The Gotoky Navigation app also comes also with a Route recording feature. You can easily record all your movements from start to finish. And it’s easy to add some notes to the route as well.
column14: >Gotoky acts as an autonomous relay device

column1: Used as an autonomous relay device: Create your own mesh network or double your communication range.

Activation of “Emergency” Location Beacon: Just press the button, even in the case that your phone is out of the battery. The device stores the last GPS location received from your smartphone (the device itself doesn't have a dedicated GPS module).
• It can autonomously receive and store up to 1000 text messages without being connected to your smartphone.

With the Gotoky Relay function you can create a Mesh Network and double the range of your communication: Gotoky automatically and securely relays your Text Messages over other Gotokys in your area - your range can be extended beyond point-to-point, and you can make your own network.
column3:
showinfo=0"">

To ensure that your message really gets to your friends who are usually moving we have developed very smart protocol with intelligent algorithms which double-check network delivering potential. 

We are also working hard to provide this feature for Voice Chats. 

 

Gotoky connects to your iOS or Android Smartphone wirelessly via Bluetooth-LE (Low Energy, 4.2). The device must be within an 8m or 25ft range of the smartphone. When connected, use the installed mobile app to communicate with other Gotoky users.
column5:
showinfo=0"">

Gotoky works over a licence-free standard UHF frequency band and the range is limited by the law of the country you are operating in.

It is a dual band device meaning that it works in the EU regulated frequency band of 868 MHz and on US regulated frequency band 915 MHz.

The range really depends on number of obstacles around you - the more the obstacles - less of the range. The device will auto-tune itself to the appropriate frequency band and power output based on location where it’s being used.

All data is end-to-end encrypted and its technology patent pending. 

Our solution is CE certified, in accordance with European legislation
column6:
FCC certification is in process.

 

 

NATURAL DISASTER

Gotoky is a perfect “just in case device” if /when natural disaster strikes, which can often leave cell services crippled and unreliable for days, weeks.

 

OUTDOOR ADVENTURES

Skiers, campers, trekkers, climbers, hikers and other nature enthusiasts are now able to connect and feel safe in places where they used to be completely isolated.

 

TRAVELERS

Gotoky can be extremely useful for travelers - being abroad and wanting to communicate for free rather than paying exorbitant roaming charges.

 

FUNCTIONAL BUSINESS TOOL

Gotoky is also useful as a functional business tool for certain occupations where workers need to stay in constant group communication in remote working environments.
column8: It is powered by long lasting battery of 72 hours of usage, charged over micro USB port

column1: INTERNAL MEMORY - Gotoky can store up to 1000 messages without being connected to your smartphone
BLUETOOTH LE 4.2 - Gotoky connects to your smartphone over Low Energy Bluetooth
WATER AND DUST RESISTANCE - Gotoky is built with IP56 water and dust resistance
DUAL BAND Gotoky works on both 868 MHz and 915 MHz frequencies
INTEGRATED ANTENNA - The antenna is integrated into the Gotoky, Break-proof design
MICRO-USB CONNECTOR - Charge Gotoky over the most popular USB connector
HIGH VOLUME BATTERY - Rechargeable 2500 mAh battery. Charged over micro-USB. Battery can last up to 72 hours
DOUBLE YOUR RANGE - Gotoky can work autonomously to double your communication range
SILICONE STRAP in 3 different colours: Red, Turquoise and Lime

The design concept is based on the idea of a wave (radio) captured by a product Gotoky. 

The front surface represents the wave as a communication element - it is a shining surface
column2:
a clear, pure drop of a wave which creates more waves gathered around one circled form (the button), symbolising the touch of a human finger as the touch of communication.

The matte vessel of the surrounding and back surface of Gotoky signifies the strong base of the product: its quality, stability and perfection
column3:
its strength as a tool for off-grid communication.

 

Gotoky is a pocket-sized device, both waterproof and dust-resistant.
column4: >IP56 water and dust resistance​
column5:
>Silicone strap comes in three colours: Red, Turquoise and Lime.

It has a special loop so that it can be hung from a belt, a bag or even somewhere on a tree or other object in order to get a better signal.
column8: >It comes in a box of 2 Gotokys (Red and Turquoise strap ) and in a box of 1 (Lime strap)
column10:
>The box

 

MEDIA MARKT INNOVATIE LAB

Gotoky was presented for showcasing this September in Media Markt (Europe’s largest retailer for consumer electronics) store in Eindhoven, Netherlands and in October in Wilrijk, Belgium within their Innovative Lab.

 

 

 

Our story begins with total-mountain-lover Denis’s personal experience (Denis - CEO) of getting hurt while hiking one winter day in the Alps. Although he was of course carrying his smartphone – compulsory equipment when up in the mountains - he suddenly found himself in serious trouble when he realized that his smartphone had no signal, and he couldn’t call or reach anyone. Ultimately, the story has a doubly happy ending: Denis was eventually rescued by random passers-by, and a great idea was born.

Soon after Katja (CMO and Sales) and Bostjan (Main Hardware Engineer) joined and created Gotoky.

Over the past two years our team of excellent engineers, designers and marketing experts has been working nonstop to develop revolutionary technology which will improve communication capabilities. 

Our work has been focused on the HW and SW upgrades needed for a stable, robust, digital, mesh-capable device
column11: on network capacity with encrypted communication
column12:
and making the most of the available radio frequency spectrum. 

Our mission doesn't stop with this device: we would love to in a huge range of real-life scenarios where constant communication is an essential or even life- saving feature create even more improved systems independent from existing large ones and it is affordable for anyone.

We are truly a kick-ass team, with international team, based in two countries Netherlands and Slovenia. In 2015 we were selected to be in the elite hardware accelerator HighTech XL in Eindhoven Netherlands, where we were recognised as the most promising startup of a generation. We were Finalists of the Central European Startup award 2016 and a year later recognised as one of the top 100 startups of Central Europe.

 

Risks and challenges

Hardware is hard. We are aware that there are inherent risks related to the production of any hardware so we decided to offer Gotoky to Kickstarter a year later than originally planned. We are in the pre-production stage with a fully-functional certified prototype (CE certification) and an established production line. We are working closely with our manufacturing partners – respected players with 70 years of experience based in Europe. No long-distance relationships, no partners we cannot trust.

We also have our logistics partners in line with our campaign goal: fast and efficient shipping of Gotoky devices as soon as possible. Unfortunately some countries are more expensive to ship to than others. We sincerely want to ship Gotokys for reasonable prices and we will do our best to do so. The prices for your country will be displayed as soon as you pick your reward.

Our established team has been working together for a few years now so we are already long past rocky starts and team changes. We are committed to offering a quality off-grid device with the utmost care for UX experience. We have expected the unexpected but we also know that sometimes things happen, plans change and delays occur. If that happens we will ensure that quality is not compromised and that you are informed about every move and decision we make.

 

----- For International Backers -----

If you can’t find your country in the drop-down menu when you input your shipping address, please contact us and we will try to help you in the best way we can to ship the Gotoky straight to you.

 

 

","Gotoky in The News Poor mobile network coverage in secluded and remote areas, high costs of communication when traveling, breakdowns of the existing mobile networks in the cases of manmade or natural disasters
column13: these are just a few of the challenges that conventional mobile networks face all the time. In such situations the communication is crucial but impossible.Our personal experience with this problem drove us to develop our:GOTOKY - World’s most advanced secure 100% off-grid communication device that enables smartphones, iOS and Android, to operate and create Mesh Network in areas where service is either nonexistent, unstable or excessively expensive. Gotoky's FeaturesWhen Gotoky is paired with a smartphone you can securely Talk (1-to-1 and group), send Texts (1-to-1 and group), activate the “Emergency” Location Beacon if in distress, use Navigation, Direction and distance to other Gotoky(s), share GPS locations with other Gotoky users on the detailed off-line topographic maps, as well use Real time Tracking, Route recording, creating events, Location Pinging etc. With Gotoky you can also create your own off-grid network. The custom-designed mobile application for smartphone wraps up all the complexity Gotoky offers in an simple, easy-to-use and beautiful to look user experience. All data transfer is highly end-to end encrypted.Chats -Voice communication and Text Messaging combined in a feature ChatsBy using the Chats mobile application, you can send or receive Voice recordings, Text messages and you can even send Event locations with Points of Interest. All Voice recordings are immediately streamed. In the case that your Voice recording has been missed your Voice message can be played again as many times as you like.In some cases when the frequency band is too congested our smart protocols wait for a free window and send Voice messages with hardly any noticeable delay. This is not an issue with Text messages and location data, as these are much smaller packages of data.

column1: With Gotoky you can have private 1-to-1 or Group Chats with anyone from your Gotoky’s app Contact list. For Group Chats just create a Group and add people contacts  to the Group. You can even start communication from the navigation screen.

All chats and data transfers are private and secured, meaning whatever you say or send can be heard or read only by your selected counterpart. Gotoky enables up to 40 private 1-to-1 Voice Chats and more than 300 private Text Chats at the same time.""Emergency""Location Beacon FeatureThe “Emergency” Location Beacon is a “just-in-case” feature - when activated your call for help is being automatically and repeatedly broadcasted and relayed over the Gotoky network - so each Gotoky, including those beyond your range, will receive your distress call.  User with activated ""Emergency"" Location Beacon visible on the map, with all his dataWhen other Gotokys receive the “Emergency” Location Beacon a big full-screen orange alert window appears to notify Gotoky users that someone is in distress. By clicking on the distressed person's information Gotoky users can easily check the location of the person or even start a conversation.This particular feature can be activated by Gotoky itself- if the smartphone’s battery is being empty or even when the smartphone is broken - more on this in the section below “Gotoky can work without smartphone”.Navigation FeatureThe Gotoky mobile app provides very easy to use and informative Navigation. Each Gotoky around you regularly sends its own GPS location to other Gotokys, so all Gotokys in the area know of each other even if you don’t know them personally.  GPS location broadcasting can be also manually turned off, if the user doesn't want to be visible or tracked.You can view all Gotokys around you on the FREE off-line preloaded maps. When you are somewhere off-grid in the wild it is good to know that somebody is nearby even if you can’t see them.Route recording: start and end points, naming the route, adding points of interestThe Gotoky Navigation app also comes also with a Route recording feature. You can easily record all your movements from start to finish. And it’s easy to add some notes to the route as well.  Gotoky acts as an autonomous relay device
Used as an autonomous relay device: Create your own mesh network or double your communication range.

Activation of “Emergency” Location Beacon: Just press the button, even in the case that your phone is out of the battery. The device stores the last GPS location received from your smartphone (the device itself doesn't have a dedicated GPS module).
It can autonomously receive and store up to 1000 text messages without being connected to your smartphone.

With the Gotoky Relay function you can create a Mesh Network and double the range of your communication: Gotoky automatically and securely relays your Text Messages over other Gotokys in your area - your range can be extended beyond point-to-point, and you can make your own network.To ensure that your message really gets to your friends who are usually moving we have developed very smart protocol with intelligent algorithms which double-check network delivering potential. We are also working hard to provide this feature for Voice Chats.  Gotoky connects to your iOS or Android Smartphone wirelessly via Bluetooth-LE (Low Energy, 4.2). The device must be within an 8m or 25ft range of the smartphone. When connected, use the installed mobile app to communicate with other Gotoky users.Gotoky works over a licence-free standard UHF frequency band and the range is limited by the law of the country you are operating in.It is a dual band device meaning that it works in the EU regulated frequency band of 868 MHz and on US regulated frequency band 915 MHz.The range really depends on number of obstacles around you - the more the obstacles - less of the range. The device will auto-tune itself to the appropriate frequency band and power output based on location where it’s being used.All data is end-to-end encrypted and its technology patent pending. Our solution is CE certified, in accordance with European legislation
column2: FCC certification is in process.  NATURAL DISASTERGotoky is a perfect “just in case device” if /when natural disaster strikes, which can often leave cell services crippled and unreliable for days, weeks. OUTDOOR ADVENTURESSkiers, campers, trekkers, climbers, hikers and other nature enthusiasts are now able to connect and feel safe in places where they used to be completely isolated. TRAVELERSGotoky can be extremely useful for travelers - being abroad and wanting to communicate for free rather than paying exorbitant roaming charges. FUNCTIONAL BUSINESS TOOLGotoky is also useful as a functional business tool for certain occupations where workers need to stay in constant group communication in remote working environments. Gotoky is a dual band device
column3: It is powered by long lasting battery of 72 hours of usage, charged over micro USB port

column1: INTERNAL MEMORY - Gotoky can store up to 1000 messages without being connected to your smartphone
BLUETOOTH LE 4.2 - Gotoky connects to your smartphone over Low Energy Bluetooth
COMPATIBLE with iOS and Android devices
LED LIGHT RING as an indicator
WATER AND DUST RESISTANCE - Gotoky is built with IP56 water and dust resistance
SAFE COMMUNICATION - Gotoky has end-to-end encryption
DUAL BAND Gotoky works on both 868 MHz and 915 MHz frequencies
INTEGRATED ANTENNA - The antenna is integrated into the Gotoky, Break-proof design
MICRO-USB CONNECTOR - Charge Gotoky over the most popular USB connector
HIGH VOLUME BATTERY - Rechargeable 2500 mAh battery. Charged over micro-USB. Battery can last up to 72 hours
DOUBLE YOUR RANGE - Gotoky can work autonomously to double your communication range
SILICONE STRAP in 3 different colours: Red, Turquoise and Lime
The design concept is based on the idea of a wave (radio) captured by a product Gotoky. The front surface represents the wave as a communication element - it is a shining surface
column2: a clear, pure drop of a wave which creates more waves gathered around one circled form (the button), symbolising the touch of a human finger as the touch of communication.The matte vessel of the surrounding and back surface of Gotoky signifies the strong base of the product: its quality, stability and perfection
column3: its strength as a tool for off-grid communication. Gotoky is a pocket-sized device, both waterproof and dust-resistant.IP56 water and dust resistance​ Silicone strap comes in three colours: Red, Turquoise and Lime.It has a special loop so that it can be hung from a belt, a bag or even somewhere on a tree or other object in order to get a better signal.It can be hungIt comes in a box of 2 Gotokys (Red and Turquoise strap ) and in a box of 1 (Lime strap)The box MEDIA MARKT INNOVATIE LABGotoky was presented for showcasing this September in Media Markt (Europe’s largest retailer for consumer electronics) store in Eindhoven, Netherlands and in October in Wilrijk, Belgium within their Innovative Lab.   Our story begins with total-mountain-lover Denis’s personal experience (Denis - CEO) of getting hurt while hiking one winter day in the Alps. Although he was of course carrying his smartphone – compulsory equipment when up in the mountains - he suddenly found himself in serious trouble when he realized that his smartphone had no signal, and he couldn’t call or reach anyone. Ultimately, the story has a doubly happy ending: Denis was eventually rescued by random passers-by, and a great idea was born.Soon after Katja (CMO and Sales) and Bostjan (Main Hardware Engineer) joined and created Gotoky.Over the past two years our team of excellent engineers, designers and marketing experts has been working nonstop to develop revolutionary technology which will improve communication capabilities. Our work has been focused on the HW and SW upgrades needed for a stable, robust, digital, mesh-capable device
column4: on network capacity with encrypted communication

column1: As of 5 August 2019, production is practically complete and almost all of the items have now been delivered to the packing and distribution warehouse.
Each part is at the following stage of completion and warehousing:
• The regulators have been manufactured and delivered to the warehouse
• The cylinders have been manufactured and delivered to the warehouse
• The retractors have been manufactured and delivered to the warehouse
• The scuba tank and compressor refill adapters have been manufactured and delivered to the warehouse
• The hand pump air filters have been manufactured and delivered to the warehouse
• The packaging has been manufactured and delivered to the warehouse
• The user manuals have been printed and delivered to the warehouse
• The hand pump filter housing and high-pressure hose have been manufactured and delivered to the warehouse
• The hand pumps have been manufactured and are currently in transit, arriving in the warehouse mid-August
• The waterproof cases are scheduled to be manufactured by mid-August and arrive in the warehouse mid-August
• The hand pump air filter bag had been manufactured and delivered to the warehouse but unfortunately were defective. A new, non-defective batch will arrive mid-August
This first production run is made up of:
• 5 ton of Refill Adapters, Filter Housings, High Pressure Hoses (16,000 units)
• 1 ton of Air Filters, Retractors, User Manuals (13,000 units)
(* “ton” used here to represent metric tonne = 1,000 kilograms = 2,200 pounds)
USING THE SCORKL WITH AND WITHOUT SCUBA TRAINING

The Scorkl is safe, easy and for everyone. However, if you are not a trained scuba diver there are restrictions on use and risks to be aware of. Misuse of the Scorkl can be dangerous. Whilst decompression sickness (more commonly known as “the bends”) isn't much of a risk because of the depth and time restrictions of such a small cylinder, pulmonary damage (lung expansion injury) is nevertheless a risk if a user holds their breath during ascent or ascends too quickly.

Non-scuba trained users should not use the Scorkl below 3m depth or more than five times in one day. Staying above 3m dramatically reduces this risk of pulmonary damage (although does not eliminate it entirely). Each purchaser will be provided with an information kit informing them of this (and other) risks of using the Scorkl as well as strategies to avoid them. These strategies will include, but not be limited to, staying above 3m in depth and not holding one's breath and/or exhaling during ascent, and not ascending too quickly.
Scuba-trained users will be able to use the Scorkl below 3m at their discretion but they too will be warned of the same risks.
The Scorkl is only intended for shallow water use. We recommend that scuba-trained users not use the Scorkl below 10m and that non-scuba-trained users stay above 3m in depth as mentioned above.
Each Scorkl comes fitted with a pressure gauge so that the user can know how much air remains in the cylinder at any time.

The Scorkl can be filled either directly from a scuba tank or from our high-pressure hand pump. If filled from a scuba tank that itself has been filled by a commercial compressed air supplier, the air can be assured to be of good quality because of industry supplier standards. These standards are concerned mainly with carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, oil and water levels. Since the Scorkl hand pump doesn't have as many working parts as a mechanical dive compressor, and is muscle-powered rather than petrol powered, the risk of contamination from latent carbon monoxide and carbon dioxide is dramatically reduced. This is the same for oil contaminants. Notwithstanding this, each Scorkl pump comes fitted with an air filter which is comprised of the same materials, and performs the same function, as a filter fitted to a mechanical dive compressor. The Scorkl filter should be replaced after fifty refills and extras will be available for purchase after the conclusion of the Kickstarter campaign.

The Scorkl cylinder and regulator are made to the same international specifications and standards as normal scuba cylinders and regulators and need to be visually inspected and/or tested as regularly as the guidelines in your country require (some are different). This may be as regularly as every year or every one hundred dives.

The information kit provided to each purchaser will include information regarding recommended best practice methods for care and maintenance of each of the Scorkl components (cylinder, regulator, filter, hand pump, case).

EverLights have a sleek, permanent, and weather-resistant design that you can install once and enjoy for years to come. Nearly-invisible, keep them off or light up a custom show for any special event, including birthdays, showers, or game day. 

Be the first on the block to have Christmas lights up and running. Only takes a simple touch of a button. 

Mobile Control - Discover Smart Convenience  

With a simple touch to your mobile phone or tablet, you can customize each light to any color and add your own color sequence. That's pretty snazzy. Your home is about to get a lot smart

With the EverLights app, you can design custom patterns for your house with over 16 million colors available. Don't just use any blue on your house to celebrate the KC Royals World Series victory, use Royals blue by entering the RGB values of 018, 055, 143 into the app. Then set a light sequence of blue, blue, white, add a twinkle effect and save the pattern. The options are endless.

Shouldn't Christmas lights just happen with a simple touch of a button? We have good news. Now they can!

Permanent:

The compact design of EverLights allows for a one time install and year round use, all without anybody noticing the lights are even there. In most cases, you can do all this without needing to add anything but the lights to your house. The existing gutters and flashing both hold the lights and conceal the wires. It's a perfect pairing.

Nearly invisible in the day. Radiant at night. EverLights are both discreet and bold... but only when you need them to be.

 Uses

As icing on the cake, EverLights can be used for birthdays, weddings, etc… 

Install 

Easy to set up so you have more time for what matters most. Our patent-pending technology makes a permanent, smart and affordable home lighting solution a reality. EverLights was designed so that anybody with any DIY ambition could install it themselves. Our convenient layout tape shows you exactly where each light goes.

Simply drill at the marked locations with the included bit, insert the lighting assembly through the backside of the hole, and twist on the cap. It really is that simple.
column6:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

Features: 

Many Features. Many Uses. EverLights aren't just safer, less work, and a more affordable solution for Christmas lights. There's so much more you can do.


Wi-fi Control– Wondering what makes the whole system work? This beautiful box in your garage. The EverLights box projects its own Wi-Fi network which you can control from up to 300 feet away. Oh, and it backlights with whatever pattern is currently displayed on your house. Who says hardware needs to be an eye-sore?

column1: Customized For Your Home - EverLights are designed to be custom cut and fit to any home. This means no more extra lights dangling from the edge of your gutters. EverLights can be cut at any point in the string of lights and any leftover lights can be used somewhere else on your home. Need to jump to the second story or to the next roof line? Unlit jumper cables can also be cut to custom lengths and hidden out of sight. Everything you need is included in your kit.

IP68 Waterproof – EverLights are manufactured to the highest standard of liquid protection for electronics. IP68 means your EverLights can be continuously immersed in over 1 meter of water. Do your gutters hold that much water? Yeah, neither do mine.

Weather-proof Design - with a working temperature range of -40 through 176 degrees Fahrenheit, EverLights are designed for whatever climate you happen to live in, even if you go through dozens of freeze/thaw cycles each year.
A frozen solid section of gutter demonstrating the abuse EverLights can take.

UV Resistant Poly-carbonate Caps - The caps that secure EverLights in place are made with the highest degree of UV resistant poly-carbonate plastic on the market. This is the same material your headlights are made of. Meanwhile, all the wires are safe from the sun and out of sight.

Water-tight installation – Worried about punching holes in your gutters? Don’t be. For years gutters were installed with gutter nails much larger than the ¼” hole needed for EverLights. Not only will EverLights not affect the structural integrity of your gutters, but they also will not allow any water to get out. A tiny O-ring on each light ensures a water-tight seal at every light location.

Safety – EverLights are powered by an incredibly low 5 volts, which is well below the standard for low voltage according to the National Electrical Code. This means there is never any danger to you or your family. In fact, you can touch the wires when they’re powered and not feel a thing.

Commercial Applications – We’ve been saying “house” this entire time, but replace that word with “business” and it works just as well. EverLights are the perfect way to bring a little extra attention or class to your commercial establishment.
Brightness comparison: EverLights vs LED C9 traditional Christmas lights - all white
Not sure how many lights you need? Use this as a point of reference to make an educated guess, or go take a tape measure outside to get real accurate.

Customized For Your Home - EverLights are designed to be custom cut and fit to any home. This means no more extra lights dangling from the edge of your gutters. EverLights can be cut at any point in the string of lights and any leftover lights can be used somewhere else on your home. Need to jump to the second story or to the next roof line? Unlit jumper cables can also be cut to custom lengths and hidden out of sight. Everything you need is included in your kit.

IP68 Waterproof – EverLights are manufactured to the highest standard of liquid protection for electronics. IP68 means your EverLights can be continuously immersed in over 1 meter of water. Do your gutters hold that much water? Yeah, neither do mine.

Weather-proof Design - with a working temperature range of -40 through 176 degrees Fahrenheit, EverLights are designed for whatever climate you happen to live in, even if you go through dozens of freeze/thaw cycles each year.
A frozen solid section of gutter demonstrating the abuse EverLights can take.

UV Resistant Poly-carbonate Caps - The caps that secure EverLights in place are made with the highest degree of UV resistant poly-carbonate plastic on the market. This is the same material your headlights are made of. Meanwhile, all the wires are safe from the sun and out of sight.

Water-tight installation – Worried about punching holes in your gutters? Don’t be. For years gutters were installed with gutter nails much larger than the ¼” hole needed for EverLights. Not only will EverLights not affect the structural integrity of your gutters, but they also will not allow any water to get out. A tiny O-ring on each light ensures a water-tight seal at every light location.

Safety – EverLights are powered by an incredibly low 5 volts, which is well below the standard for low voltage according to the National Electrical Code. This means there is never any danger to you or your family. In fact, you can touch the wires when they’re powered and not feel a thing.

Commercial Applications – We’ve been saying “house” this entire time, but replace that word with “business” and it works just as well. EverLights are the perfect way to bring a little extra attention or class to your commercial establishment.
Brightness comparison: EverLights vs LED C9 traditional Christmas lights - all white
Not sure how many lights you need? Use this as a point of reference to make an educated guess, or go take a tape measure outside to get real accurate.",18.0,1,"1 Campaign

column1: We are two mechanical engineers. We like to dream about finding solutions, but our real joy comes from really solving the problem. As we are from the Netherlands we naturally have a passion for bicycles. We complement each other with different skill sets, making us a good team. However, our company couldn’t be a success without the help of our partners and of course all of our BluLocks friends.

When one of us had his sixth bike stolen in less than a year, we decided it was time for a change. Bike theft is huge problem In Holland. We did some research and found some shocking statistics. Each year about 900 thousand bikes get stolen. That is 90% of the 1 million bikes that are sold. But the problem isn’t limited to The Netherlands. Worldwide 15 million bicycles are stolen each year.

We also took a closer look at bike locks, and found that they had hardly changed over the past 50 years. All locks on the market are bulky, ugly and inconvenient and most of all, not secure. They can all be cut with simple bolt cutters or a grinder. Even a hacksaw will do the trick.

That’s why we wanted to create something different. We wanted to create a lock that would make bike theft as unrewarding as possible. We thought about many different ways to do this. Ranging from frame tubes that could be used as chain locks, to entire foldable frames. After months of hard work and multiple prototypes, we finally had what we wanted. A slim lock that is integrated within the bicycle frame.

We partnered up with CEAD, a prototyping company, to help us create the lock we want. Together we’re testing and finalizing the final product. We used the latest technology, including laser cutting and 3D printing to make sure we can start producing as soon as possible. We also started working with Birota, an experienced bike manufacturer, to guarantee a high quality bike with premium components. With the help of YES!Delft, the largest tech incubator from Europe, we made sure we can realize our product.

The BluLocks bike is a light, agile city bike which can be configured as single-speed or fixed gear. The simplistic and clean look make you stand out of any crowd. A fast Dutch no nonsense bike with a lock integrated in the seat tube, making it beautiful, easy to lock and especially secure. With the plug in chain you can easily lock your bike to anything you want. The steel frame is decked out in top quality components. A great bike, you’ll never have to worry about.
How does the thief know the bicycle is locked?

Because the bicycle is locked to a pole, or a tree with the plug-in chain lock. The thief can't take the bicycle without inspecting it first. Thieves specialize in a single type of lock, for instance a chain or U-lock. Our lock is new and unusual, so a thief will always choose an easier target.
Will I be able to build this lock inside the bicycle I currently own?
Unfortunately this is not possible at the moment. A few adjustments have to be made to the frame in order to make the lock as secure as possible. But no need to worry, we are full of surprises.
What happens if I lose my keys?

If you claim a BluLocks frame or complete bike, we will register the keys as soon they arrive in our assembly line in the Netherlands. If you happen to lose all of your keys you will be able to request a new set of keys online. On request we can send you as much spare keys if you want, but we will have to charge you for the extra production and shipping costs.
What happens if the lock would fail?

Our biggest priority is making the lock highly reliable. However, every product is prone to failure. We designed the system to make it replaceable, but only if you have possession of the keys. So no worries, the bike won't be useless in the highly unlikely event of failure.
Is the lock resilient against dust and moisture?

Because the lock is placed rather low, it is prone to dirt and water. We are aware of this problem and are therefore only working with materials that can withstand more extreme environments. But like any bike or lock it is not immune to wear. It's always a wise idea to take good care of your bike and it's lock.
Can I lock the pedals in more than one position?
The lock is designed in such a way you can lock the pedals in almost any position. You don't have to struggle to get your pedals in a certain position when locking your bike.
We offer you two main different perks. You can choose between receiving just the BluLocks frame and the frame with all the extra parts. The frame is available in two colour options
column3: white. The sets with parts are available in the options anodized red &amp
column4: blue. When you select the full bicycle you will be able to make all 4 colour combinations
column5: white/red, white/blue, black/red, black/blue. The price is not affected by the colours you choose.

column1:
What frame sizes are available? 
The frames come in the sizes 57 cm and 60 cm. When you submit your colour preference you can also submit  your frame size.
When can I expect my BluLocks bike?

Our plan is to start production in January. Of course we are not immune to set backs, but we’ve put a lot of effort in our planning and expect no major delays. Depending on your location you will receive your perk in February. As soon as we are ready to ship we can deliver orders from the Netherlands within a week. The Benelux and other adjacent countries will take a maximum of two weeks. The rest of Europe and the world can be subject to customs and different shipping companies. Therefore shipping can take up to a month.

The shipping costs depend on your location. If you live in the Netherlands or Belgium the shipping costs are included. Every other locations outside the Netherlands are specified for each perk. The costs cover the shipping costs only. Any other tax, import or custom costs are not covered. Those depend heavily on your location and can't be taken account of by us. Make sure you are up to date with your countries custom rules before ordering a perk!
I've claimed a discount coupon, how do I receive my discount?

If you've claimed your discount coupon you received a verification email from us. If you didn't please contact us, so we can make sure you don't miss out on your discount. You might also qualify for the discounted bike if you're a member of a certain community. To claim your discount you have to select the 359$ 'discounted bike' perk. If you want the deluxe discounted bike add 30$ to your contribution manually (making 389$). The discount is only applicable to the regular and the deluxe BluLocks bike and is not usable for the 'double the fun' or the 'collectors package'. If there is any misunderstanding about your qualification of the discount of other issues, please contact us. We're happy to help!

Our current plan is not to do any retail selling. The BluLocks bike can solely be claimed during the Indiegogo campaign. After that we might remain In-demand, but only for a certain period of time. We want to focus on continuous development of the product, so we can make our lock available for all kinds of different frame types. We can also maintain a full focus on the customer care of all our backers.
We are excited to launch our first ever crowdfunding campaign to introduce a secure, fun and beautiful bike with an innovative locking technology.

BluLocks has developed an innovative product and fully functioning prototype with technology that's unique in the bicycle market. We’re confident that BluLocks will be produced with the highest quality materials and manufacturing available.
We are committed to keeping our campaign transparent and will openly communicate with our supporters on our project, as well as any obstacles that might arise.

We are preparing for future challenges that could impact our planned production timeline, including  adjustments that might be made during production to improve the final product. We will prepare for any delays this may cause in order to deliver the best quality product with a timely delivery for your benefit.
Our priority is to deliver a product that will exceed your expectations . We’re grateful for all your support and promise to provide you with the best version of our product.

column8:
>

See the Infuze Fully functional prototype

column1: take your hydration pack through the wilderness, you want to drink something
that tastes good, replenishes the electrolytes you’ve lost, and has some
vitamins for good measure. For the first time ever, you can do that without
damaging your reservoir. And it’s easy.
attaches to the end of your hydration pack's hose and flavor is picked up by the water you
are already drinking. There’s no back flow and no risk of staining your
reservoir with flavors and colors—the only thing touching your reservoir lining
is the pure water you fill it with.

column3:
>

Grow Utah Concept-2-Company Competition-  Grand Prize Winner

column1: SharkTank at USU - Grand Prize and Crowd Favorite
Opportunity Quest at USU - Second Place Winner
Get Seeded Program University of Utah - Winner of two rounds of funding
second, if you wanted to drink flavored water from your hydration pack you’d
need to dump flavored powders, syrups, or tablets directly into your reservoir.
The reservoir lining can absorb the flavors, colors, and sugars staining your reservoir even after you’ve spent a solid hour scrubbing
it out. Infuze is here to make all of our lives easier.
Infuze keeps your reservoir pure and ready to go by keeping your flavor
contained and portable and your reservoir safe and sanitary.

On extended backpacking trips, your pack's weight is crucial-- that's why Infuze is small less than 5 ounces 2 of those ounces being the Infuze Flavor Cartridge. You'll never have to pack extra bottles or sports drink again.

It's pretty simple really. Infuze is designed to use the natural suction when you drink from your hydration pack to infuse your water with flavor, electrolytes, vitamins, and energy. It attaches directly to the end of your hydration pack's hose, you can drink plain water as if nothing was there, then when you want simply turn the flavor dial to the perfect flavor intensity for you and the concentrated syrup is picked up and mixed with your water right before it reaches your mouth. All back flow is prevented, so your reservoir is kept clean and pure. You can switch off the flavor at any time using the Flavor Dial to go back to drinking that clean and pure water and switch it back on when you need some flavor infusion. Cartridges are all interchangeable, and you don't need to wait until they're empty to swap 'em out for a new flavor. If you find yourself out of flavor cartridges, you can leave your Infuze attached. It is designed to live on your pack, with or without a flavor cartridge. You can keep drinking water through it, just be sure to flip the Flavor Dial to 'off' before.
The Infuze easily attaches to any hydration pack and gives you easy access to the Infuze Flavor Dial to adjust the water to your perfect flavor. Flavor and Water on demand.

column2: >Our patent pending check valve to makes sure flavor only goes to your mouth, not the reservoir.

column1: The Cartridges are interchangeable so if you get tired of our Raspberry Lemonade, you simply pull the cartridge out and slip in another.

We wanted the flavor cartridges to be as versatile as possible. Now you have flavor on demand: The Flavor Dial lets you choose flavor when you want it, and water when you don't. Simply turn the dial to let the flavor flow as you drink, or turn it off to go back to drinking water.

column7: >The flavor cartridges are interchangeable. If you've been taking in raspberry lemonade flavored fuel for 25 miles (40.2 km.) and you need to switch to a mixed berry, it's as easy as swapping out cartridges. Just pop outs old and slip in whatever flavor your heart desires.

column2: >Your health is important to us, and we wanted you to have the freedom to choose the ingredients you prefer.
column3: >The Infuze Natural Line is made of all natural ingredients, no artificial food dyes, and no chemical sweeteners. The Infuze Performance Line includes all of the electrolytes and energy supplements that you need to be able to keep going strong during your adventures. Infuze comes in Five flavors Raspberry
column4: >Lemonade, Lemon Lime, Mixed Berry, Kiwi Strawberry, and Pomegranate Mango. The
column5: >Infuze gives you what you want when you want it.

column1: Infuze lifestyle began in the Silicon Slope's shadow: in Utah’s High
Uintas near King’s Peak. Danny Noall was hiking with his father on their annual
backpacking trip. The excursion covered 36 miles (58 km.) in 36 hours, and they refilled
their reservoirs with any water they could find. During that expedition, Danny
had plenty of time to contemplate his hydration experience. Anyone who’s taken
their hydration packs on an extended trip outdoors will know exactly what Danny
was thinking, “You can filter out the dirt, but you can’t filter out the
wilderness and 12 liters of water later, Danny had an idea. He wanted to Infuze his water as he was drinking.

column4: >Later while in the MBA Program at Utah State University, Danny started working more on this idea. He wanted to know if it was actually possible and worth his time. He entered Infuze in 5 business competitions: the concept took 1st place in 4 of them and took second place in the 5th by only one half of a point. Danny conducted over 250 personal interviews with outdoor enthusiasts and spoke with industry experts. He had a conversation with his beautiful wife, Britt Grace, to see if they were alright with the risk of investing their life savings and potentially having 10,000 of the Infuze systems sitting in there garage. He decided to give it everything he had.

column1: Danny recruited his friends Ryan Weese to help in the sales and operations, and Zach Lloyd to help in the social media and marketing. And Danny was incredibly lucky to be mentored by some of Utah's top businessmen: Mike Glauser, Paul Woodland, and Phillip Chipping
column2: >. With the added help of an ingenious engineer Danny has been able to develop a product that will revolutionize the industry and build a brand that is making an impact with its consumers, before the product has even gone to market.

column1: In the first 7 months of Instagram activity, Infuze has gained over 23.3k followers, received over 2900 posts of people using their hashtag #infuzeyourlife, and has used this social media feedback to bring this product to you today.
Q: How many flavors does Infuze have?
A: We have five flavors: Raspberry Lemonade, Kiwi Stawberry, Mixed
Berry, Lemon, Lime, and Pomegranate Mango. All of these flavors are available
in both the Performance Line and the Natural Line.
The Infuze Natural Line has vegetable food coloring, natural fruit
flavors, and is Stevia sweetened. There is nothing artificial about it!
The Infuze Performance Line has the same simple flavoring with added
The Performance Plus has the same simple flavoring, electrolytes,
Q: Can we use any flavor cartridge or do we need the Infuze cartridge?
A: Infuze cartridges are specially designed to stay put in the
Infuze and stay sealed while in use. The cartridges are recyclable and can be
used to flavor water bottles by squirting them in the same way you would any
other water enhancer (i.e. MIO, Arizona Tea, Powerade, etc.)
Q: How much flavored water can you get from one cartridge?
A: You can flavor at least 100 oz. of flavored water.
A: Yes, a lifetime warranty! If anything breaks because of a
manufacturing flaw, just let us know and we will send you a new one ASAP. If it
breaks because one of your adventures got a little too intense, don't worry! We
will send you a new Infuze if you pay the cost of shipping.
Q: Will you be getting more flavors soon?
A: We only have our five flavors for now, but we will be adding
more to the lineup! We just aren't sure when that will be.
Q: Do I have to take the Infuze System off my pack if I run out of
A: Nope! The Infuze System is designed to live on your hydration
pack with or without a flavor cartridge. Switch the Flavor Dial to OFF and the
flow of water will be uninterrupted.
Q: Does the Infuze come in different colors?
A: Yes! There will be some different color options. We will know the
exact colors once we are ready for mass production.
Q: Can I adjust the intensity of the flavor?
A: Yes, you can choose the flavor intensity using the Flavor
Dial. You can have a hint of Lemon Lime or full power Mixed Berry!
Q: Can the flavors be used for anything else?
A: Yes!You can use Infuze Flavor Cartridges the same way
you would use any water enhancer-- just squeeze and squirt the flavor into a
glass of water or your favorite water bottle.
Q: Can the Infuze leak when it's on my pack?
A: We have designed the system to be as fail proof as possible.
As long as you aren't falling down a mountain, you should be good to go. (But
let's face it, if you're falling down a mountain, the last thing on your mind
Q: What is the impact rating for Infuze?
A: We will know as soon as we go into manufacturing. Our goal as
a company is rugged, reliable, and simple. It will be made so that you don't
have to worry about a thing.
Q: Can the Infuze attach to any hydration pack?
A: The Infuze is designed to attach to any 1/4 inch tubing which
is the industry standard (literally 99%) for hydration packs.
Q: When can I expect my Infuze?
A: We are hoping to be faster, but you should expect to see your Infuze
Q: What takes so long on the development?
A: Our biggest time constraint is the injection mold. These are
extremely expensive (over $100k), and they take a few months to get dialed in
exactly where we need them to be. This is why we need your help on
crowdfunding: to build the mold and get it to you as quickly as we can!

To launch this product we need to have as much publicity as possible. The key to this product's success is getting it in front of people. We've found that once people see it, they want it. You can help us by sharing our information on social media or with the friendly hikers you meet on the mountain. We'd love your help getting the word out!
We are going up against large scale companies that have deep pockets and we need to be able to bring the best possible product to market in the best possible way.
We are working with top notch engineers to bring you a
flawless product that delivers the perfect flavor experience, and we are pretty sure we’ve thought
of every single worst case scenario. But Infuze is still brand new, and we may
not know of a flaw that needs fixing until it happens to us. By investing in our
product, you’re joining the Infuze Team on the trail to perfect
functionality. If you think something could be better or look different, just let us know! We want to reach perfection, or at least come close.
","INFUZE: Outdoor Hydration RevolutionizedSee the Infuze Fully functional prototypeWhen you
take your hydration pack through the wilderness, you want to drink something
that tastes good, replenishes the electrolytes you’ve lost, and has some
vitamins for good measure. For the first time ever, you can do that without
damaging your reservoir. And it’s easy.
attaches to the end of your hydration pack's hose and flavor is picked up by the water you
are already drinking. There’s no back flow and no risk of staining your
reservoir with flavors and colors—the only thing touching your reservoir lining
is the pure water you fill it with.
Grow Utah Concept-2-Company Competition-  Grand Prize Winner
SharkTank at USU - Grand Prize and Crowd Favorite
Opportunity Quest at USU - Second Place Winner
Get Seeded Program University of Utah - Winner of two rounds of funding
second, if you wanted to drink flavored water from your hydration pack you’d
need to dump flavored powders, syrups, or tablets directly into your reservoir.
The reservoir lining can absorb the flavors, colors, and sugars staining your reservoir even after you’ve spent a solid hour scrubbing
it out. Infuze is here to make all of our lives easier.
Infuze keeps your reservoir pure and ready to go by keeping your flavor
contained and portable and your reservoir safe and sanitary.

On extended backpacking trips, your pack's weight is crucial-- that's why Infuze is small less than 5 ounces 2 of those ounces being the Infuze Flavor Cartridge. You'll never have to pack extra bottles or sports drink again.

It's pretty simple really. Infuze is designed to use the natural suction when you drink from your hydration pack to infuse your water with flavor, electrolytes, vitamins, and energy. It attaches directly to the end of your hydration pack's hose, you can drink plain water as if nothing was there, then when you want simply turn the flavor dial to the perfect flavor intensity for you and the concentrated syrup is picked up and mixed with your water right before it reaches your mouth. All back flow is prevented, so your reservoir is kept clean and pure. You can switch off the flavor at any time using the Flavor Dial to go back to drinking that clean and pure water and switch it back on when you need some flavor infusion. Cartridges are all interchangeable, and you don't need to wait until they're empty to swap 'em out for a new flavor. If you find yourself out of flavor cartridges, you can leave your Infuze attached. It is designed to live on your pack, with or without a flavor cartridge. You can keep drinking water through it, just be sure to flip the Flavor Dial to 'off' before.
The Infuze easily attaches to any hydration pack and gives you easy access to the Infuze Flavor Dial to adjust the water to your perfect flavor. Flavor and Water on demand.
Our patent pending check valve to makes sure flavor only goes to your mouth, not the reservoir.
The Cartridges are interchangeable so if you get tired of our Raspberry Lemonade, you simply pull the cartridge out and slip in another.

We wanted the flavor cartridges to be as versatile as possible. Now you have flavor on demand: The Flavor Dial lets you choose flavor when you want it, and water when you don't. Simply turn the dial to let the flavor flow as you drink, or turn it off to go back to drinking water.

The flavor cartridges are interchangeable. If you've been taking in raspberry lemonade flavored fuel for 25 miles (40.2 km.) and you need to switch to a mixed berry, it's as easy as swapping out cartridges. Just pop outs old and slip in whatever flavor your heart desires.

Your health is important to us, and we wanted you to have the freedom to choose the ingredients you prefer. The Infuze Natural Line is made of all natural ingredients, no artificial food dyes, and no chemical sweeteners. The Infuze Performance Line includes all of the electrolytes and energy supplements that you need to be able to keep going strong during your adventures. Infuze comes in Five flavors Raspberry Lemonade, Lemon Lime, Mixed Berry, Kiwi Strawberry, and Pomegranate Mango. The Infuze gives you what you want when you want it.
Infuze lifestyle began in the Silicon Slope's shadow: in Utah’s High
Uintas near King’s Peak. Danny Noall was hiking with his father on their annual
backpacking trip. The excursion covered 36 miles (58 km.) in 36 hours, and they refilled
their reservoirs with any water they could find. During that expedition, Danny
had plenty of time to contemplate his hydration experience. Anyone who’s taken
their hydration packs on an extended trip outdoors will know exactly what Danny
was thinking, “You can filter out the dirt, but you can’t filter out the
wilderness and 12 liters of water later, Danny had an idea. He wanted to Infuze his water as he was drinking.

Later while in the MBA Program at Utah State University, Danny started working more on this idea. He wanted to know if it was actually possible and worth his time. He entered Infuze in 5 business competitions: the concept took 1st place in 4 of them and took second place in the 5th by only one half of a point. Danny conducted over 250 personal interviews with outdoor enthusiasts and spoke with industry experts. He had a conversation with his beautiful wife, Britt Grace, to see if they were alright with the risk of investing their life savings and potentially having 10,000 of the Infuze systems sitting in there garage. He decided to give it everything he had.

Danny recruited his friends Ryan Weese to help in the sales and operations, and Zach Lloyd to help in the social media and marketing. And Danny was incredibly lucky to be mentored by some of Utah's top businessmen: Mike Glauser, Paul Woodland, and Phillip Chipping. With the added help of an ingenious engineer Danny has been able to develop a product that will revolutionize the industry and build a brand that is making an impact with its consumers, before the product has even gone to market.

In the first 7 months of Instagram activity, Infuze has gained over 23.3k followers, received over 2900 posts of people using their hashtag #infuzeyourlife, and has used this social media feedback to bring this product to you today.
Q: How many flavors does Infuze have?
A: We have five flavors: Raspberry Lemonade, Kiwi Stawberry, Mixed
Berry, Lemon, Lime, and Pomegranate Mango. All of these flavors are available
in both the Performance Line and the Natural Line.
The Infuze Natural Line has vegetable food coloring, natural fruit
flavors, and is Stevia sweetened. There is nothing artificial about it!
The Infuze Performance Line has the same simple flavoring with added
The Performance Plus has the same simple flavoring, electrolytes,
Q: Can we use any flavor cartridge or do we need the Infuze cartridge?
A: Infuze cartridges are specially designed to stay put in the
Infuze and stay sealed while in use. The cartridges are recyclable and can be
used to flavor water bottles by squirting them in the same way you would any
other water enhancer (i.e. MIO, Arizona Tea, Powerade, etc.)
Q: How much flavored water can you get from one cartridge?
A: You can flavor at least 100 oz. of flavored water.
Q: Is My Infuze under warranty?
A: Yes, a lifetime warranty! If anything breaks because of a
manufacturing flaw, just let us know and we will send you a new one ASAP. If it
breaks because one of your adventures got a little too intense, don't worry! We
will send you a new Infuze if you pay the cost of shipping.
Q: Will you be getting more flavors soon?
A: We only have our five flavors for now, but we will be adding
more to the lineup! We just aren't sure when that will be.
Q: Do I have to take the Infuze System off my pack if I run out of
A: Nope! The Infuze System is designed to live on your hydration
pack with or without a flavor cartridge. Switch the Flavor Dial to OFF and the
flow of water will be uninterrupted.
Q: Does the Infuze come in different colors?
A: Yes! There will be some different color options. We will know the
exact colors once we are ready for mass production.
Q: Can I adjust the intensity of the flavor?
A: Yes, you can choose the flavor intensity using the Flavor
Dial. You can have a hint of Lemon Lime or full power Mixed Berry!
Q: Can the flavors be used for anything else?
A: Yes!You can use Infuze Flavor Cartridges the same way
you would use any water enhancer-- just squeeze and squirt the flavor into a
glass of water or your favorite water bottle.
Q: Can the Infuze leak when it's on my pack?
A: We have designed the system to be as fail proof as possible.
As long as you aren't falling down a mountain, you should be good to go. (But
let's face it, if you're falling down a mountain, the last thing on your mind
Q: What is the impact rating for Infuze?
A: We will know as soon as we go into manufacturing. Our goal as
a company is rugged, reliable, and simple. It will be made so that you don't
have to worry about a thing.
Q: Can the Infuze attach to any hydration pack?
A: The Infuze is designed to attach to any 1/4 inch tubing which
is the industry standard (literally 99%) for hydration packs.
Q: When can I expect my Infuze?
A: We are hoping to be faster, but you should expect to see your Infuze
Q: What takes so long on the development?
A: Our biggest time constraint is the injection mold. These are
extremely expensive (over $100k), and they take a few months to get dialed in
exactly where we need them to be. This is why we need your help on
crowdfunding: to build the mold and get it to you as quickly as we can!

We are working with top notch engineers to bring you a
flawless product that delivers the perfect flavor experience, and we are pretty sure we’ve thought
of every single worst case scenario. But Infuze is still brand new, and we may
not know of a flaw that needs fixing until it happens to us. By investing in our
product, you’re joining the Infuze Team on the trail to perfect
functionality. If you think something could be better or look different, just let us know! We want to reach perfection, or at least come close.

My Campaign Goal is to raise funds for Pollinate Energy. Their mission is to improve the lives of India’s urban poor by giving them access to sustainable life-changing products.

MY MISSION
I’ve decided to go volunteer for the next 12 months in India for a
Not-For-Profit Social Business – Pollinate Energy – that brings solar powered lights
and other life changing products to India’s urban poor communities that have no
access to electricity and clean water.
My assignment is to help Pollinate Energy expand and scale up their
operations to other major cities in India.
This is an incredible opportunity to take my experience and put it to
the contribution of a small yet fast growing social enterprise pursuing a
social mission as well as environmental one, baked up by the United-Nations.

Your donations will directly help improve the lives of India's poorest people and also contribute to climate change efforts by supporting clean energies.


 SUPPORT ME - HELP ME RAISE £3,200
Before I leave for India on 3
the objective of fundraising £3,200 pounds. These funds will go directly to
Pollinate Energy’s Programs to reach out to new communities and equip them with
these sustainable and life changing products.
Pollinate Energy is currently operating in Bangalore, however with
390 millions people in India without access to electricity there is an urgent need
to reach out to other major Indian cities which have a high concentration of
Urban poor communities. These funds will directly help a small team of
volunteer, which I will be part of, to set up operations in another city in
These funds will also contribute to on the ground research in the
communities to better understand their needs and therefore help define the most
suited distribution strategy and develop new products to help improve the lives

and health of India’s urban poor.

I’ll be covering my flight to India, so all funds raised are going directly to powering the work on the ground, straight to the cause.


THE IMPACT
Millions of Indians live without electricity, many of them in urban
slums. The polluting and toxic fumes from the kerosene lamps many families
depend on are the second cause of mortality of children and women in India. In
addition, buying the costly fuel to power the lamps eats up a significant

percentage of their humble incomes.


Kerosene lamps produce a very weak source of light
cannot do their homework after the sun sets and parents are limited to the most
basic tasks which lowers their productivity and possibilities of generating
Distributing clean solar lighting systems in India’s urban poor

column1: Our mission is simple: To care for the world we love exploring.

There is no escaping the fact that the products we choose to purchase will have an impact on the planet lasting far longer than we will. Plastic bottles take between 450 - 1000 years to decompose, yet 1,000,000 plastic bottles are purchased around the world every minute (that's 20,000 a second, in case you were wondering). Of those 1,000,000, at most only 7% will be recycled and the true number is probably frighteningly lower. The environmental impact of this catastrophe is only just beginning to be felt, but it is often seen most acutely as we travel the world and witness places of incredible natural beauty choking in plastic waste.

Evolve was founded by an environmental science teacher who heard the passionate outrage of his students loud and clear. We MUST change, or the world as we know it will not survive.That's why the Evolve adventure towel is made from recycled plastic waste. Likewise, we are committed to using recycled materials whenever and however possible in all of our future products. We're determined to make high quality, stylish travel gear in a way that benefits the environment.

We're also committed to leaving a positive and lasting impact on the environment through charitable work and donations. We are in the process of identifying non-profit partners that work on the frontline of environmental protection, and a meaningful percentage of our future net profits will be donated to charities working to protect the environment.
We MUST change, for the sake of our planet

ARES: THE ULTIMATE GYM BACKPACK DISGUISED FOR WORK.

Find yourself carrying a laptop bag, duffel bag and more when heading to work with an intention of squeezing in an exercise? Made for working professionals who are accustomed to weaving workouts into their busy work schedules, the ARES Work + Gym backpack is the perfect companion designed with a professional, yet modern touch for work environments with hidden compartments that make it super durable and versatile for all workout needs!

The ARES Work + Gym Backpack is a versatile and sleek backpack that fits in great at work, with classic fabrics, harmonious design elements and optimized compartments that make it great for a wide range of workout environments as well. Designed with a blend of capacity and support in mind, the ARES backpack provides space for essential work tools such as a laptop, notebook, pens and more, while a hidden compartment houses your gym clothes, a water bottle and other items. There are also separate compartments for shoes and dirty clothing.

THE ULTIMATE BACKPACK THAT BLENDS IN WITH THE MODERN WORKING PROFESSIONAL.

THAT'S VERSATILE WITH ALL THE COMPARTMENTS YOU NEED FOR WORK AND WORKOUTS.

In the video the bag was packed with the following items:

If you need to go to the office, fit in a workout and jump on a train all in one day, then you’re going to need a backpack that can do it all. The ARES backpack is designed to fit in at work, but also spacious enough to store your gym kit and overnight essentials. Here is a breakdown of the ARES backpack features.

On the bottom of the bag, we have included a shoe compartment, where you can fit a pair of shoes (1 pair of US size 12 fits comfortably inside). The shoe compartment is isolated from the rest of the bag and is lined with a moisture-resistant nylon and special coating to ensure the smell does not seep through into the other compartments.

Spacious, sturdy and stylish, the ARES backpack comes with a front compartment that is spacious enough to fit all your gym essentials. It is sealed with a water-resistant zipper so your gear stays dry in wet weather.

 

But what do you do with your dirty clothes once you are done working out? ARES has a hidden compartment built into the gym compartment to store your dirty gym clothes until you get to your final destination. This compartment is also lined with a special coating to prevent any odors from escaping into other compartments.

More compartments, more storage, better organization - you can have it all. The ARES backpack has compartments for all your office essentials from power banks, notebooks and external hard drives, to pens, documents, your passport, keys, USB drives, cables and laptop chargers.
column3:
'>

Sometimes you just want quick access to your laptop. This comes especially convenient during security screenings in airports. ARES has a padded laptop compartment that can fit up to a 15"" Apple Macbook Pro.

Located on both sides of the bag is a side pocket that expands to carry your water bottle keeping you hydrated in the gym, on the road or in your office space as well as other small items.

If you travel with a roller bag, ARES is the perfect companion. We have built a durable sleeve to fit over the handle of your roller bag.

The exterior of the ARES gym/work bag is durable and made from ultra thin PU coated water-resistant 600 Nylon making each bag 100% waterproof, keeping all your gym and work essentials dry in any weather.  

To add an extra layer of protection, we have also integrated water-resistant zippers into the exterior of the bag to keep your gear protected in the rain and snow.

At the base of the bag, we have included a hidden quick access pocket for your keys, loose change or knick knacks.  

Keep your wallet, metro pass, loose change or keys always within reach with our pocket straps.

At 33 x 19 x 49cm this bag meets domestic and international carry-on standards.

Width: 12.9"" (33 cm) Depth: 7"" (19 cm) Height: 19.2"" (49 cm)

Volume: 30L

A sternum strap for stability for heavy loads or long trips as well as added comfort and support.

ARES has ergonomic padding to ensure that you can fill up the bag and it won't lose its shape against your back. We also used breathable mesh to reduce the heat the backpack creates against your body.

 

 

1. Choose a reward level.

You can choose only one reward level to back this project. You cannot choose two reward levels. You will get all items in that reward—you cannot swap things that you don't want for things that you do want. 

2. Relax, you're done for now.

All details like shipping information, color preference and add-on specifics will be collected via survey after this campaign has ended.

Interested in writing about our project? You can find a press release and images here. Need something else? Fancy a chat? Just email us at aresbag@outlook.com.

column1: The idea of this product came from a man who wished to project photos to the ceiling while lying in bed.

“If the projector can directly project photos and videos from mobile phone, and it also can be very small that almost cannot be detected, then I can watch the photos taken while hanging out with friends anywhere!”​
Then, one of our female team members said she would like to get one as well.

“Imagine... While I’m cooking in the kitchen, I can put my mobile phone directly on the table, and then project the children's programs for my kid. So I do not have to worry if my kid is watching inappropriate channel.”​
One of engineers also said: “If I can project the target on the wall, I can play darts anytime and anywhere!”
After brainstorming and combining almost 20 kinds of needs, we finally decided to create this amazing device!
In order to balance between safety and appearance, we will ensure the quality of our products before production. We are still working hard for product appearance design.

Most people use mobile phone more than 40 times a day, whether it is for work or simply surfing the Internet. Thus, we considered the balance between work and entertainment while designing ""Any Fun"". It should be unique, easy-to-use and ""FUN""!

Any Fun is a mobile displaying-out accessory makes sharing easier. Any Fun completely eliminates the set-up process while increasing mobility and simplicity. Therefore, don't worry about the complicated process of using Any Fun. Just plug and share!
Any Fun makes a shortcut to success.
★ Any Fun makes it possible to report to your customer or boss within 20 seconds even while taking the elevator.
★ Any Fun makes your children stay quite.
★ Any Fun makes you become a mobile expert and stole the show!
We wish to introduce this cool device as soon as possible
column2: therefore, we speed out our pace with 5 months to make it come true. Any Fun is super-fast and incredibly easy to use. Besides, Any Fun looks stylish and attractive.

Wanna show some interesting pictures and videos to your family &
Showing up at the meeting and want to have an awesome presentation in seconds?
Plug Any Fun into mobile phone using USB Type-C connection and wait for few seconds. Now you are ready to go!

✔ Samsung Galaxy S8
✔ HTC U11
✔ Huawei Mate 10
✔ iMac

MEGA1 is a professional designer and manufacturer of laser optical engine. That’s why our clients choose us as their manufacturing partners. We use laser beam scanning (LBS) technology to realize clear and ""focus-free"" projection, regardless of the angle and distance from the projection surface. With LBS, focus lens are not required. LBS can also be used for 3D structure scanning by combining ToF, and can be applied to a wide range of situations such as smart home, medical treatment and Automatic Guided Vehicle (AVG).
• Head Up Display: Direct project image in front of windshield (combiner free). Color saturation up to 120% NTSC. Brightness up to 20000nits. High contrast up to 5000:1. Large image(Above 7”)
• Wearable Devices: Focus free. Low power consumption. Screen size 3” to 200”
• Augmented Reality: Retina projection. Compact structure. Color saturation up to 120% NTSC
• 360 Degree Screen: Cylinder screen. Compact structure. No need cooling fan
• Smart Home For IoT Design: Screen-less display. Focus free. Small optical engine volume. Ultra-wide color saturation

After lots of work, we know we are designing the right product, but there is always more to do! We have a tight schedule to get almost everything in place, but we are also dedicated to delivering a flawless product.
However, there are still several risks that may lead to unexpected delays during production or delivery, including:

column2: >- Certification delays: In order to ensure the quality, our product must be tested and approved by various independent agencies.

>- Unforeseen production delays: We're partnering with experienced manufacturing experts, and we will work with our manufacturers in very close collaboration. Nevertheless, there is still the possibility of delay when manufacturing abroad. We promise to keep you informed on this.

column1: We are confident in our ability to deliver our product on time with great quality. We will keep updating, and we will be able to answer your questions: sales@mega1.com.tw

How to Travel For Free. Seriously.

When I spent 16 months vagabonding around Europe, I ended up visiting thirteen countries, over fifty cities, and spending waaay less money than if I had stayed home with a ""normal"" life.

Among countless unforgettable experiences, I’d housesat on the Mediterranean Sea, couchsurfed with a carpet salesman in Turkey, milked goats in Northern France, run from a camel in Israel, and foraged porcinis in Tuscany.
No matter whom I talked to about these experiences, everyone seemed to respond the same way:
column2: >“You did what? And spent whaaat? That’s impossible!”
column3:
> 

Travel isn’t just about relaxing on a beach. Studies have proven that it increases mental and physical health, it opens minds, forms friendships, and breaks barriers.

Travel can save the world.

If you want to explore this planet, you should be allowed that privilege. Think of the way things could change if everyone experienced new cultures and places on a more regular basis.

With my book, travel is about to become mindbogglingly possible for you, your friends, your family, and most importantly, for the future.

Bottom line?

How to Travel for Free: The Vagabond’s Bible will change the face of travel as we know it.
column4:
>

How You Can Help

Folks, we are so close to getting the book published
column5:
if everything goes to plan, I'll have it *finished* by September. So...

This is where you come in.

I will publish this book as cost-efficiently as possible, but the most important thing is that quality is not compromised.   

For example: That video you watched up there? It cost me $60.

Yes, that's mainly because I have AWESOME friends at Fanciful Fox Productions, but it's also proof positive that I know how to find the best team to help me reach a goal.

Let me make this clear: Your donations will go solely to the book’s production costs and I'll keep you updated every step of the way. Any extra finances will be donated to a fund vetted by CharityNavigator.org.

Most importantly, your help will lead to thousands of people all over the world to begin traveling more. You! You did that!

But all the free travel I've done hasn't exactly earned me any money (d'oh!), so donations will help cover...

column1: • An interactive companion website and community called VagabondsBible.com.

(I researched projected costs using lots of resources and experienced advisers, and here’s a great summary from MediaShift if you’re curious to read more.)

Because I believe what I know about free travel should be accessible to everyone, you'll get a free book if you donate $5 or more, and I’ll give away one book per every sold copy.

Apart from that, let's talk about...

Perks For You

Whatever you can donate,  thank you! And here's how I'll show it:
column2:
>

 

Free Travel, No Dumpster Diving!

Fact: I am no more adventurous, rich, or crazy than you are. There are simply secure and viable ways to make free travel happen.

How to Travel for Free: The Vagabond's Bible is a how-to book—think “dummy” guide interwoven with real-life stories—on hitting the road without breaking the bank. Inside you’ll find out how to fly, stay in hotels and homes, eat, and play tourist for free.

Grab a napkin and get that drool cleaned up why don'tya?

 

A Look Inside the Book...

Getting There
column11:
/>

•Finding cheap but delicious eats

•Best foods on-the-go

•Maximizing restaurant experiences
column17:
>•Accommodation hacks

Wanna help even MORE??

Times are tough, I get it, and I totally understand if you can't donate. I still appreciate you stopping by, watching the video, reading a bit, and just being so cool. 

But hey, here are some ways you can help FO' FREE!

column1: • E-MAIL this link to fellow travel lovers! https://igg.me/at/free-travel
• Subscribe to my blog at BossMeggan.com by clicking here!
• Say hi. I want to hear your thoughts, really! Call me, e-mail me, tweet me, whatever!

Happy trails!
